name: cancel
trans: 取消， 撤销； 删去

sentences.english: Our flight was cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 我们的航班取消了。

sentences.english: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.english: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.chinese: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取消， 撤销； 删去
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen

name: explosive
trans: 爆炸的； 极易引起争论的

sentences.english: Because the gas is highly explosive, it needs to be kept in high-pressure containers.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种气体极易爆炸，因此需要保存在高压容器内。

sentences.english: A small explosive device (= bomb ) was set off outside the UN headquarters today.
sentences.chinese: 今天有一枚小型炸弹在联合国总部外爆炸。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爆炸的； 极易引起争论的
detailed_translations.english: able or likely to explode
a substance that can cause an explosion

sentences.english: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

detailed_translations.english: many

name: govern
trans: 居支配地位， 占优势

sentences.english: the leaders who govern the country
sentences.chinese: 治理这个国家的领导人

sentences.english: The party had been governing for seven months.
sentences.chinese: 该党执政已经有七个月了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 居支配地位， 占优势

detailed_translations.english: to officially and legally control a country and make all the decisions about taxes, laws, public services etc

name: analyse
trans: 分析； 分解； 解析

sentences.english: She still needs to analyse the data.
sentences.chinese: 她仍需要分析这些数据。

sentences.english: You need to sit down and analyse why you feel so upset.
sentences.chinese: 你得坐下来想一想自己为什么会那么生气。

sentences.english: Joe had never tried to analyze their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 乔从未试图去理清他们的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分析； 分解； 解析
detailed_translations.english: to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it

name: discourage
trans: 使泄气， 使灰心； 阻止， 劝阻

sentences.english: You should not let one failure discourage you.
sentences.chinese: 你不该失败一次就灰心丧气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使泄气， 使灰心； 阻止， 劝阻
detailed_translations.english: to make someone less confident or less willing to do something

sentences.english: It’s amazing how closely Brian and Steve resemble each other.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩和史蒂夫真是惊人地相像。

sentences.english: He grew up to resemble his father.
sentences.chinese: 他长大了，很像他父亲。

detailed_translations.english: to look like or be similar to someone or something

name: remote
trans: 遥远的； 偏僻的； 关系疏远的； 脱离的； 微乎其微的； 孤高的， 冷淡的； 遥控的

sentences.english: a remote border town
sentences.chinese: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.english: a fire in a remote mountain area
sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

detailed_translations.chinese: 遥远的； 偏僻的； 关系疏远的； 脱离的； 微乎其微的； 孤高的， 冷淡的； 遥控的
detailed_translations.english: far from towns or other places where people live

sentences.english: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

detailed_translations.english: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

sentences.english: Let’s pretend we’re on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 我们假装自己是在月球上吧。

sentences.english: He’s not asleep – he’s just pretending.
sentences.chinese: 他并没睡着，不过是装睡而已。

sentences.english: To pretend ignorance of the situation would be irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 装作不知情是不负责任的做法。

sentences.english: I can’t marry her and to pretend otherwise would be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我不可以娶她，装作娶她无妨是不对的。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if something is true when in fact you know it is not, in order to deceive people or for fun

sentences.english: She filled the kettle and switched it on.
sentences.chinese: 她把水壶灌满，打开了开关。

sentences.english: The kettle’s boiling (= the water in it is boiling ).
sentences.chinese: 水壶里的水开了。

sentences.english: (= start boiling water in a kettle ), will you?
sentences.chinese: 烧壶水，好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a container with a lid, a handle, and a spout,used for boiling and pouring water

name: wreck
trans: 失事；残骸；精神或身体已垮的人

sentences.english: He was still alive when they pulled him from the wreck.
sentences.chinese: 他们把他从失事的车辆中拖出来时，他还活着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 失事；残骸；精神或身体已垮的人
detailed_translations.english: a ship that has sunk
to completely spoil something so that it cannot continue in a successful way

sentences.english: You’re drunk.
sentences.chinese: 你喝醉了。

sentences.english: David would get drunk and I would have to take him home and put him to bed.
sentences.chinese: 戴维常会喝醉，我就得把他弄回家放到床上。

detailed_translations.english: unable to control your behaviour, speech etc because you have drunk too much alcohol

name: calculate
trans: 计算； 估计； 计划

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算； 估计； 计划
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

name: persistent
trans: 坚持的， 不屈不挠的； 持续不断的； 反复出现的

sentences.english: persistent rumours
sentences.chinese: 持续流传的谣言

sentences.english: persistent headaches
sentences.chinese: 持续头疼

sentences.english: a persistent problem
sentences.chinese: 长期问题

sentences.english: persistent rain
sentences.chinese: 连绵的雨

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚持的， 不屈不挠的； 持续不断的； 反复出现的
detailed_translations.english: continuing to exist or happen, especially for longer than is usual or desirable

sentences.english: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.chinese: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.english: I only went for Kay’s sake.
sentences.chinese: 我是为了凯才去的。

sentences.english: I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

detailed_translations.english: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something

name: conceal
trans: 把…隐藏起来， 掩盖， 隐瞒

sentences.english: The shadows concealed her as she crept up to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她借着阴影蹑手蹑脚地走向房子。

sentences.english: The path was concealed by long grass.
sentences.chinese: 小路隐藏在长长的草里。

sentences.english: a concealed weapon
sentences.chinese: 藏匿的武器

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…隐藏起来， 掩盖， 隐瞒
detailed_translations.english: to hide something carefully

name: audience
trans: 听众， 观众， 读者

sentences.english: The audience began clapping and cheering.
sentences.chinese: 观众开始鼓掌欢呼。

sentences.english: One member of the audience described the opera as ‘boring’.
sentences.chinese: 有一名观众说这出歌剧“乏味”。

detailed_translations.chinese: 听众， 观众， 读者
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who come to watch and listen to someone speaking or performing in public

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a medium heat until it thickens. Meanwhile start boiling the water for the pasta.
sentences.chinese: 用中火把调味汁煮到变稠，同时烧水准备煮意大利面。

detailed_translations.english: while something else is happening

sentences.english: Different workers possess different skills.
sentences.chinese: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

sentences.english: He no longer possessed the power to frighten her.
sentences.chinese: 他再也吓不倒她了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular quality or ability

name: competent
trans: 有能力的， 能胜任的

sentences.english: A competent mechanic should be able to fix the problem.
sentences.chinese: 一名合格的机修工应该能够解决这个问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有能力的， 能胜任的
detailed_translations.english: having enough skill or knowledge to do something to a satisfactory standard

name: investment
trans: 投资， 投资额； 投入

sentences.english: We plan to buy some property as an investment.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算买些房地产作为投资。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投资， 投资额； 投入
detailed_translations.english: the use of money to get a profit or to make a business activity successful, or the money that is used

sentences.english: I always tried to remain neutral when they started arguing.
sentences.chinese: 他们争论起来的时候我总是努力保持中立。

sentences.english: Clive decided to adopt a neutral position.
sentences.chinese: 克莱夫决定采取中立立场。

sentences.english: The British government acted as a neutral observer during the talks.
sentences.chinese: 英国政府在会谈中扮演了中立观察员的角色。

detailed_translations.english: not supporting any of the people or groups involved in an argument or disagreement

name: scratch
trans: 抓痕， 划痕； 抓， 搔， 刮

sentences.english: John yawned and scratched his leg.
sentences.chinese: 约翰打了个呵欠，挠了挠腿。

sentences.english: Try not to scratch.
sentences.chinese: 尽量别挠。

detailed_translations.english: to rub your skin with your nails because it feels uncomfortable

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓痕， 划痕； 抓， 搔， 刮
detailed_translations.english: a small cut on someone’s skin

sentences.english: three optional courses
sentences.chinese: 三门选修课

sentences.english: The other excursions are optional.
sentences.chinese: 其他的短途旅行是自选项目。

detailed_translations.english: if something is optional, you do not have to do it or use it, but you can choose to if you want to

name: require
trans: 需要； 要求； 命令

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 需要； 要求； 命令
detailed_translations.english: to need something

sentences.english: a circular table
sentences.chinese: 圆桌

detailed_translations.english: shaped like a circle
a printed advertisement, notice etc that is sent to lots of people at the same time

name: analysis
trans: 分析， 分析报告； 分解； 解析

sentences.english: She’s been in analysis for three years.
sentences.chinese: 她接受精神分析治疗已经三年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分析， 分析报告； 分解； 解析
detailed_translations.english: a process in which a doctor makes someone talk about their past experiences, relationships etc in order to help them with mental or emotional problems

sentences.english: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.english: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.english: Edmund clicked his fingers (= made a short sound to get someone’s attention ) for John to follow him.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.english: Vogel clicked his heels (= hit the heels of his shoes together ) and bowed.
sentences.chinese: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。

sentences.english: Twist the lever and the gears click into place .
sentences.chinese: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound
a short hard sound

sentences.english: Strong colours are very fashionable at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 眼下流行艳丽的色彩。

detailed_translations.english: popular, especially for a short period of time

sentences.english: She devised a method for quicker communications between offices.
sentences.chinese: 她想出一种加快办公室之间通信联络的方法。

detailed_translations.english: to plan or invent a new way of doing something

sentences.english: The difference in quality was immediately apparent .
sentences.chinese: 质量的差异显而易见。

sentences.english: He left suddenly, for no apparent reason .
sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，他突然离开了。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

name: journalist
trans: 新闻工作者， 新闻记者

sentences.english: a well-known journalist and broadcaster
sentences.chinese: 一位著名的新闻记者兼播音员

detailed_translations.chinese: 新闻工作者， 新闻记者
detailed_translations.english: someone who writes news reports for newspapers, magazines, television, or radio

name: exposure
trans: 暴露， 揭露； 曝光

sentences.english: Exposure to lead is known to damage the brains of young children.
sentences.chinese: 已知接触铅会损害幼童的大脑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 暴露， 揭露； 曝光
detailed_translations.english: when someone is in a situation where they are not protected from something dangerous or unpleasant

name: temper
trans: 调和， 使缓和； 【冶】使回火

sentences.english: Pete hit his brother in a fit of temper .
sentences.chinese: 皮特一气之下打了他弟弟。

detailed_translations.english: the way you are feeling at a particular time, especially when you are feeling angry for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 调和， 使缓和； 【冶】使回火
detailed_translations.english: to make something less severe or extreme

sentences.english: protective clothing
sentences.chinese: 防护服

sentences.english: Sunscreen provides a protective layer against the sun’s harmful rays.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜提供了一层抵挡阳光中有害光线的防护层。

detailed_translations.english: used or intended for protection

name: sideways
trans: 从一边， 向一边； 在一边； 斜着， 侧身

sentences.english: A strong gust of wind blew the car sideways into the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 一阵狂风把汽车横着掀进了沟里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 从一边， 向一边； 在一边； 斜着， 侧身
detailed_translations.english: to or towards one side

sentences.english: a multicultural society
sentences.chinese: 一个多元文化的社会

detailed_translations.english: involving or including people or ideas from many different countries, races, or religions

name: object
trans: 实物， 物体； 目的， 目标； 对象， 客体； 宾语

sentences.english: If no one objects, I would like Mrs Harrison to be present.
sentences.chinese: 如果没人反对的话，我想请哈里森夫人出席。

detailed_translations.english: to feel or say that you oppose or disapprove of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 实物， 物体； 目的， 目标； 对象， 客体； 宾语
detailed_translations.english: a solid thing that you can hold, touch, or see but that is not alive

name: humble
trans: 谦逊的； 地位低下的； 简陋的

sentences.english: a modest and humble man
sentences.chinese: 一个谦卑的男人

detailed_translations.chinese: 谦逊的； 地位低下的； 简陋的
detailed_translations.english: not considering yourself or your ideas to be as important as other people’s

sentences.english: Read Chapter 11 as your homework.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是阅读第 11 章。

sentences.english: This chapter discusses power, and how people use it.
sentences.chinese: 这一章节讲权力，以及人们如何运用权力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts into which a book is divided

sentences.english: as they sailed into Portsmouth Harbour
sentences.chinese: 当他们驶入朴次茅斯港的时候

detailed_translations.english: an area of water next to the land where the water is calm, so that ships are safe when they are inside it
to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time

name: independent
trans: 独立的， 自主的； 无偏见的； 不相关联的

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立的， 自主的； 无偏见的； 不相关联的
detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

sentences.english: The president-elect followed in an open carriage drawn by six beautiful grey horses.
sentences.chinese: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with wheels that is pulled by a horse, used in the past

sentences.english: The car rolled over the edge of a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 汽车翻下了悬崖边。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of rock or a mountain with a very steep side, often at the edge of the sea or a river

sentences.english: The universe is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙是无限的。

detailed_translations.english: without limits in space or time

name: concede
trans: 承认， 承认…为真； 承认失败； 允许， 让予； 让步， 认输

sentences.english: ‘That’s the only possible solution.’ ‘Yes, I suppose so,’ Charles conceded.
sentences.chinese: “那是唯一可行的解决办法。”“对，我想是。”查尔斯承认道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认， 承认…为真； 承认失败； 允许， 让予； 让步， 认输
detailed_translations.english: to admit that something is true or correct, although you wish it were not true

name: elect
trans: 选举， 推选； 选择

sentences.english: the country’s first democratically elected government
sentences.chinese: 该国第一个民主选举产生的政府

sentences.english: a new method for electing the leader of the party
sentences.chinese: 选举党领导的新方式

detailed_translations.chinese: 选举， 推选； 选择
detailed_translations.english: to choose someone for an official position by voting

sentences.english: The group meets weekly.
sentences.chinese: 小组每周见面一次。

detailed_translations.english: Weekly is also an adverb
happening or done every week

sentences.english: How would you cope with unemployment and the resulting loss of income?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

detailed_translations.english: if something results from something else, it is caused by it
something that happens or exists because of something that happened before

sentences.english: He plays golf on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 他星期天都去打高尔夫球。

sentences.english: a round of golf
sentences.chinese: 一场高尔夫球赛

detailed_translations.english: a game in which the players hit a small white ball into holes in the ground with a set of golf clubs, using as few hits as possible

sentences.english: How can you be so selfish?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能这样自私？

sentences.english: selfish behaviour
sentences.chinese: 自私的行为

detailed_translations.english: caring only about yourself and not about other people – used to show disapproval

name: sexism
trans: 性别偏见， 性别歧视

sentences.english: sexism in the workplace
sentences.chinese: 工作场所的性别歧视

detailed_translations.chinese: 性别偏见， 性别歧视
detailed_translations.english: the belief that one sex is weaker, less intelligent, or less important than the other, especially when this results in someone being treated unfairly

name: commission
trans: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: headline
trans: 大字标题； 新闻提要

sentences.english: a paper carrying the front-page headline: ‘Space Aliens meet with President’
sentences.chinese: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

detailed_translations.chinese: 大字标题； 新闻提要
detailed_translations.english: the title of a newspaper report, which is printed in large letters above the report

name: connect
trans: 连接， 结合， 联系； 给…接通电话

sentences.english: We’d like two rooms with connecting doors (= doors that join the rooms ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们想要两个有门相通的房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接， 结合， 联系； 给…接通电话
detailed_translations.english: to join two or more things together

name: rational
trans: 理性的， 理智的； 合理的

sentences.english: Parents need to be fully informed so they can make a rational decision.
sentences.chinese: 父母需要充分了解情况，这样才可以作出合理的决定。

sentences.english: I’m sure there’s a rational explanation for all this.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这一切都有合理的解释。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something that has been officially agreed and chosen by a political party, a business, or another organization

trans: 编辑的，主笔的，编者的；社论的，社论式的

sentences.chinese: 编辑助理

摘要， 概要； 简历

trans: 重建， 改造； 复原

sentences.chinese: 有三名学生被提到，即约翰、萨拉和西尔维娅。

detailed_translations.english: used when saying the names of the people or things you are referring to

trans: 艺术的， 艺术家的； 富有艺术性的， 精美的； 精彩的

sentences.chinese: 艺术作品

sentences.english: Opinion about the artistic merit of his paintings has been mixed.
sentences.chinese: 对于他的绘画作品的艺术价值，人们褒贬不一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 艺术的， 艺术家的； 富有艺术性的， 精美的； 精彩的
detailed_translations.english: relating to art or culture

trans: 工会， 联盟； 联合， 团结； 一致

sentences.chinese: 你打算加入工会吗？

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["union members"]}
sentences.chinese: 工会会员

detailed_translations.chinese: 工会， 联盟； 联合， 团结； 一致
detailed_translations.english: an organization formed by workers to protect their rights

trans: 丰富的， 充足的； 大量的

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 充足的； 大量的
detailed_translations.english: more than enough in quantity

sentences.english: The government has failed to halt economic decline.
sentences.chinese: 政府没能阻止经济衰退。

sentences.english: Safety concerns have led them to halt work on the dam.
sentences.chinese: 出于安全方面的顾虑，他们已经停止水坝的施工。

a stop or pause

sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴乔夫没能使苏联各组成部分保持在一起。

one of several parts that together make up a whole machine, system etc

trans: 顾问； 会诊医师， 专科医生

sentences.chinese: 管理顾问

detailed_translations.chinese: 顾问； 会诊医师， 专科医生
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to give advice on a particular subject

sentences.english: a glorious sunset
sentences.chinese: 壮丽的日落景象

detailed_translations.english: the time of day when the sun disappears and night begins

sentences.english: The obvious way of reducing pollution is to use cars less.
sentences.chinese: 减少污染显而易见的办法就是少用汽车。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice or understand

trans: 说明， 图解， 例证

sentences.chinese: 这本书有62页插图。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明， 图解， 例证
detailed_translations.english: a picture in a book, article etc, especially one that helps you to understand it

trans: 假扮，化装，伪装；掩盖，掩饰

sentences.chinese: 他装扮成神父越境逃走了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假扮，化装，伪装；掩盖，掩饰

detailed_translations.chinese: 用来伪装的东西； 伪装， 掩饰
detailed_translations.english: something that you wear to change your appearance and hide who you are, or the act of wearing this

a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

trans: 外科， 外科手术； 手术室

detailed_translations.chinese: 外科， 外科手术； 手术室
detailed_translations.english: medical treatment in which a surgeon cuts open your body to repair or remove something inside

name: liberal
trans: 心胸宽大的， 慷慨的； 自由的， 自由主义的

sentences.chinese: 对两性关系比较开通的态度

detailed_translations.chinese: 心胸宽大的， 慷慨的； 自由的， 自由主义的

name: violent

sentences.english: violent clashes between the police and demonstrators
sentences.chinese: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.english: The riots ended in the violent deaths of three teenagers.

detailed_translations.english: involving actions that are intended to injure or kill people, by hitting them, shooting them etc

name: harmony
trans: 调和， 协调， 和谐

sentences.chinese: 《墨西哥玫瑰》的精彩和声演唱

sentences.english: three-part harmonies

detailed_translations.chinese: 调和， 协调， 和谐

trans: 解决， 解答； 决定， 决意

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of coldness

sentences.chinese: 新政府面临的难题是巨大的。

sentences.chinese: 我家的忠犬博吉

sentences.english: a faithful member of the church
sentences.chinese: 教会的忠实信徒

If you pad something, you put something soft in it or over it in order to make it less hard, to protect it, or to give it a different shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 超过， 胜过， 超出

sentences.chinese: 她的丰胸手术

trans: 工具， 器具， 用具
使生效， 履行， 实施

sentences.chinese: 政府许诺要实施新的制度来控制金融贷款机构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具， 器具， 用具

sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

sentences.chinese: 耶稣的门徒

sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.english: He was found guilty of attempted murder .
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.english: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder .
sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.english: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.
sentences.chinese: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.english: Police are searching for the murder weapon .
sentences.chinese: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.english: Detectives have launched a murder investigation .
sentences.chinese: 警方探员已经启动凶杀案调查。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of deliberately killing someone

name: pat

detailed_translations.english: exactly right for the occasion; apt
a friendly act of touching someone with your hand flat

name: fantasy
trans: 想象， 幻想； 想象的产物

sentences.chinese: 我过去常幻想着在巴黎与一位艺术家同住。

sentences.english: sexual fantasies
sentences.chinese: 性幻想

sentences.english: Young children sometimes can’t distinguish between fantasy and reality.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子有时不能区分幻想与现实。

sentences.english: He lived in a fantasy world of his own, even as a small boy.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还是个小孩子的时候，他就生活在一个幻想世界里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想象， 幻想； 想象的产物
detailed_translations.english: an exciting and unusual experience or situation you imagine happening to you, but which will probably never happen

sentences.english: a two-hundred horsepower engine
sentences.chinese: 两百马力的发动机

sentences.english: the superior horsepower of a Volkswagen
sentences.chinese: 大众汽车的强劲动力

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the power of an engine, or the power of an engine measured like this

name: visibility
trans: 可见度， 能见度； 可见性， 明显性

sentences.english: Visibility on the roads is down to 20 metres due to heavy fog.
sentences.chinese: 道路能见度因浓雾降至20米。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可见度， 能见度； 可见性， 明显性
detailed_translations.english: the distance it is possible to see, especially when this is affected by weather conditions

name: invitation
trans: 邀请， 招待； 请柬； 吸引， 诱惑

sentences.english: They were always dropping by, usually without invitation.
sentences.chinese: 他们常常来串门，通常不请自来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 邀请， 招待； 请柬； 吸引， 诱惑
detailed_translations.english: a written or spoken request to someone, inviting them to go somewhere or do something

name: paw
trans: 用爪子抓， 用蹄扒； 翻找

sentences.chinese: 他的马刨着地面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用爪子抓， 用蹄扒； 翻找
detailed_translations.english: if an animal paws a surface, it touches or rubs one place several times with its paw
an animal’s foot that has nails or  claw s

sentences.english: an enormous bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 巨大的花束

sentences.english: an enormous amount of money
sentences.chinese: 巨款

sentences.english: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.chinese: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

detailed_translations.english: very big in size or in amount

sentences.english: Plants use their roots to absorb moisture from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物利用根从土壤中吸收水分。

sentences.english: Your skin’s moisture content varies according to weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤的水分含量随着天气状况而变化。

detailed_translations.english: small amounts of water that are present in the air, in a substance, or on a surface

name: toast
trans: 烘， 烤； 向…祝酒， 为…干杯

sentences.english: I had a piece of toast for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我早饭吃了一片吐司。

detailed_translations.english: bread that has been heated so that it is brown on both sides and no longer soft

name: frustrate

sentences.chinese: 与生手共事着实让他沮丧。

sentences.english: the external appearance of the building
sentences.chinese: 大楼的外观

sentences.chinese: 他推开吃了一半的色拉走了。

sentences.english: Mark drew me aside and explained the problem.
sentences.chinese: 马克把我拉到一边给我解释这个问题。

sentences.english: She swept her thick hair aside.
sentences.chinese: 她把浓密的头发梳到一边。

detailed_translations.english: moved to one side or away from you

name: circumstance
trans: 情况， 条件； 境遇， 境况； 经济情况

sentences.english: The Soviet Union had been forced by circumstances to sign a pact with Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.english: I can’t imagine a circumstance in which I would be willing to steal.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象我在什么情况下会愿意去偷东西。

detailed_translations.chinese: 情况， 条件； 境遇， 境况； 经济情况
detailed_translations.english: the conditions that affect a situation, action, event etc

name: revise
trans: 修订， 修改； 复习

sentences.english: The college has revised its plans because of local objections.
sentences.chinese: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.english: We have revised our estimates of population growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们已修正了对人口增长的估计。

detailed_translations.chinese: 修订， 修改； 复习
detailed_translations.english: to change something because of new information or ideas

name: authority
trans: 官方； 权力； 当权者， 行政管理机构； 权威， 专家

sentences.english: an agreement between the US and Colombian authorities
sentences.chinese: 美国和哥伦比亚当局的一份协议

detailed_translations.chinese: 官方； 权力； 当权者， 行政管理机构； 权威， 专家
detailed_translations.english: the power you have because of your official position

name: creature
trans: 创造物， 产物； 生物， 动物， 家畜

sentences.english: all the living creatures in the sea
sentences.chinese: 海洋中所有的生物

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造物， 产物； 生物， 动物， 家畜
detailed_translations.english: anything that is living, such as an animal, fish, or insect, but not a plant

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event

sentences.english: In the Ohmic contacts of LED electrodes, carriers have different transmission mechanisms be- tween metal electrode and semiconductor.
sentences.chinese: 在LED电极欧姆接触中，载流子在金属电极和半导体间有不同的传输机制。

sentences.english: What was happening was this: in its pure state of repeating units of one titanium and two oxygen atoms, titanium dioxide is a semiconductor.
sentences.chinese: 发生的事是这样的：在纯净的一个钛和两个氧原子组成的重复单位下，二氧化钛是一种半导体。

sentences.english: Allegedly, in the fourth quarter of last year, NXP semiconductor company and a big client signed a licensing agreement, the client should be Apple Corp.
sentences.chinese: 据称，在去年四季度，NXP半导体公司和一个大客户签署了技术授权协议，这家大客户应该是苹果公司。

detailed_translations.english: a substance, such as  silicon  , that allows some electric currents to pass through it, and is used in electronic equipment

sentences.english: They tied a rope around my waist and pulled me up.
sentences.chinese: 他们在我腰间系了一根粗绳子，把我拉了上去。

sentences.english: The man was coiling a length of rope.
sentences.chinese: 那人正在卷一段绳子。

detailed_translations.english: very strong thick string, made by twisting together many thinner strings
to tie things together using rope

sentences.english: He can come with us, provided he pays for his own meals.
sentences.chinese: 只要他付自己的饭钱，就可以跟我们一起来。

name: instrument
trans: 仪器， 工具； 乐器

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

sentences.english: They ran short of gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 他们的汽油不够了。

sentences.english: It smelled like gasoline and flowers mixed together.
sentences.chinese: “咦~~~~”难闻死了，像是汽油和花香混在一起。

sentences.english: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.chinese: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from petroleum, used mainly for producing power in the engines of cars, trucks etc

name: indispensable
trans: 必不可少的， 必需的

sentences.english: Mobile phones have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 移动电话已经成为我们生活中的必需品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必不可少的， 必需的
detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is indispensable is so important or useful that it is impossible to manage without them

sentences.english: What size shirt does he wear – small, medium or large?
sentences.chinese: 他穿多大尺码的衬衫——小号、中号还是大号？

sentences.english: hair of medium length
sentences.chinese: 中等长短的头发

sentences.english: Fry the onions over a medium heat until they are golden.
sentences.chinese: 用中火把洋葱炸到金黄色。

detailed_translations.english: of middle size, level, or amount
a way of communicating information and news to people, such as newspapers, television etc

name: lens
trans: 透镜， 镜片， 镜头

sentences.english: a standard 50mm lens
sentences.chinese: 50毫米标准镜头

detailed_translations.chinese: 透镜， 镜片， 镜头
detailed_translations.english: the part of a camera through which the light travels before it reaches the film

name: wisdom
trans: 智慧， 才智； 名言

sentences.english: a man of great wisdom
sentences.chinese: 一个有大智慧的男人

sentences.english: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 智慧， 才智； 名言
detailed_translations.english: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life

name: fatal
trans: 致命的， 命运的； 重大的， 决定性的

sentences.english: potentially fatal diseases
sentences.chinese: 潜在致命的疾病

sentences.english: If it is not treated correctly, the condition can prove fatal (= be fatal ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果治疗不当，这种病可能会致命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 致命的， 命运的； 重大的， 决定性的
detailed_translations.english: resulting in someone’s death

sentences.english: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么地方的吸毒问题比美国更严重。

detailed_translations.english: not in any place or to any place

sentences.english: What do you suppose the killer’s motive was?
sentences.chinese: 你认为凶手的动机是什么？

sentences.english: The violence was clearly prompted by political motives.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴力事件显然是由政治动机引发的。

sentences.english: It’s not the kind of thing he’d do unless he had an ulterior motive (= a reason he kept hidden ) .
sentences.chinese: 他不会做这种事的，除非他另有隐情。

detailed_translations.english: the reason that makes someone do something, especially when this reason is kept hidden

name: romantic
trans: 浪漫的； 多情的； 有浪漫色彩的， 传奇性的； 不切实际的， 空想的

sentences.english: ‘Tom always sends me red roses on my birthday.’ ‘How romantic!’
sentences.chinese: “我过生日时汤姆总是给我送红玫瑰。”“多浪漫啊！”

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪漫的； 多情的； 有浪漫色彩的， 传奇性的； 不切实际的， 空想的
detailed_translations.english: showing strong feelings of love

name: motivate
trans: 作为…的动机； 激励， 激发

sentences.english: Was he motivated solely by a desire for power?
sentences.chinese: 他只是受到权欲的驱使吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的动机； 激励， 激发
detailed_translations.english: to be the reason why someone does something

name: spoil
trans: 损坏，糟蹋；宠坏，溺爱；变质

sentences.english: The whole park is spoiled by litter.
sentences.chinese: 整个公园环境都给垃圾破坏了。

sentences.english: We didn’t let the incident spoil our day.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有让这件事破坏我们一整天的气氛。

sentences.english: I don’t want to spoil your fun.
sentences.chinese: 我不想扫你的兴。

sentences.english: Why do you always have to spoil everything ?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么老是要把一切都弄糟呢？

detailed_translations.chinese: 损坏，糟蹋；宠坏，溺爱；变质
detailed_translations.english: to have a bad effect on something so that it is no longer attractive, enjoyable, useful etc
things taken by an army from a defeated enemy, or things taken by thieves

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

detailed_translations.english: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

sentences.english: Bacteria multiply quickly in warm food.
sentences.chinese: 细菌在温热的食物里繁殖得很快。

detailed_translations.english: to breed

name: ridge
trans: 脊， 山脊； 垄， 埂， 脊状突起

sentences.english: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着山脊小心前行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脊， 山脊； 垄， 埂， 脊状突起
detailed_translations.english: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain

sentences.english: The plan is to launch a pilot programme next summer.
sentences.chinese: 计划是在明年夏天实施一个试验性方案。

detailed_translations.english: A pilot plan or a pilot project is one that is used to test an idea before deciding whether to introduce it on a larger scale
someone who operates the controls of an aircraft or spacecraft
to guide an aircraft, spacecraft, or ship as its pilot

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

name: approval
trans: 赞成， 同意， 批准

sentences.english: The president has already given his approval to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.english: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.english: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.english: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.chinese: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.english: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.chinese: 需经议会批准的任命

detailed_translations.chinese: 赞成， 同意， 批准
detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

name: mobile
trans: 运动的； 流动的； 多变的

sentences.english: a more mobile workforce
sentences.chinese: 具有更强流动性的劳动力

sentences.english: People these days are much more socially mobile .
sentences.chinese: 如今人们的社会地位容易改变多了。

sentences.english: an upwardly mobile (= moving to a higher social scale ) professional
sentences.chinese: 步步高升的专业人士

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动的； 流动的； 多变的
detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move from one job, area, or social class to another

name: perform
trans: 做， 履行， 完成； 表演， 演出； 工作情况， 表现

sentences.english: Chenier and the band are performing at the Silver Palace tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.english: The children perform two plays each school year.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们一学年表演两部话剧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 做， 履行， 完成； 表演， 演出； 工作情况， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music

sentences.english: Baxter was rushed to the hospital with multiple stab wounds.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯特因多处刺伤被紧急送往医院。

sentences.english: Having multiple partners increases your risk of sexual diseases.
sentences.chinese: 性伴侣多会增加得性病的风险。

sentences.english: His new album includes multiple versions of the same songs.
sentences.chinese: 他的新专辑包括同一些歌曲的多种版本。

detailed_translations.english: many, or involving many things, people, events etc
a number that contains a smaller number an exact number of times

name: peak
trans: 达到高峰， 达到最大值

sentences.english: Sales peaked in August, then fell sharply.
sentences.chinese: 销售额8月份达到最高点，然后急速下降。

detailed_translations.chinese: 达到高峰， 达到最大值
detailed_translations.english: to reach the highest point or level
used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something
the time when something or someone is best, greatest, highest, most successful etc

name: evolution
trans: 进化， 演化， 发展

sentences.english: the theory of evolution
sentences.chinese: 进化论

detailed_translations.chinese: 进化， 演化， 发展
detailed_translations.english: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time

sentences.english: a family portrait
sentences.chinese: 全家福

sentences.english: She’s been commissioned to paint Jackson’s portrait .
sentences.chinese: 她已受托为杰克逊画肖像。

detailed_translations.english: a painting, drawing, or photograph of a person

name: halfway
trans: 半路地； 在中途， 在半途
中途的；部分的；不彻底的

sentences.english: He was halfway up the ladder.
sentences.chinese: 他梯子上到了一半。

detailed_translations.chinese: 半路地； 在中途， 在半途
detailed_translations.english: Halfway means in the middle of a place or between two points, at an equal distance from each of them

detailed_translations.chinese: 中途的；部分的；不彻底的
detailed_translations.english: at a middle point in space or time between two things

sentences.english: The film exposes the utter horror of war.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影揭示了战争的极端恐怖。

sentences.english: The report exposes the weaknesses of modern medical practice.
sentences.chinese: 报道揭露了现代医疗的不足之处。

detailed_translations.english: to show the truth about someone or something, especially when it is bad

name: concentrate
trans: 全神贯注，全力以赴；集中，聚集；浓缩

sentences.english: Construction of the aircraft is being concentrated at Prestwick.
sentences.chinese: 飞机制造正在向普雷斯特威克集中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全神贯注，全力以赴；集中，聚集；浓缩
detailed_translations.english: to be present in large numbers or amounts somewhere, or to cause people or things to be present in large numbers or amounts somewhere
a substance or liquid which has been made stronger by removing most of the water from it

name: magnet
trans: 磁铁， 磁体； 有吸引力的人或事物

sentences.english: Prospect Park, with its vast lake, is a magnet for all health freaks.
sentences.chinese: 拥有大片湖区的展望公园是所有健身迷的向往之地。

detailed_translations.chinese: 磁铁， 磁体； 有吸引力的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: a piece of iron or steel that can stick to metal or make other metal objects move towards itself

name: explosion
trans: 爆炸， 爆发， 炸裂； 激增， 扩大

sentences.english: We heard a loud explosion.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到一声巨大的爆炸声。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爆炸， 爆发， 炸裂； 激增， 扩大
detailed_translations.english: a loud sound and the energy produced by something such as a bomb bursting into small pieces

sentences.english: The new handle will have to be welded on.
sentences.chinese: 新的把手得焊上去。

detailed_translations.english: to join metals by melting their edges and pressing them together when they are hot

name: up-to-date
trans: 直到最近的， 现代的； 跟上时代的

sentences.english: ...the most up-to-date information available on foods today.
sentences.chinese: …今日有关食品的最新消息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直到最近的， 现代的； 跟上时代的
detailed_translations.english: modern or fashionable

name: complaint
trans: 抱怨， 怨言； 控告

sentences.english: There's been a record number of complaints about the standard of service.
sentences.chinese: 已有对服务水准的创纪录数量的投诉。

sentences.english: People have been reluctant to make formal complaints to the police.
sentences.chinese: 人们一直不愿正式向警方投诉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抱怨， 怨言； 控告
detailed_translations.english: A complaint is a statement in which you express your dissatisfaction with a situation

name: translation
trans: 翻译； 译文， 译本

sentences.english: She read the letter and gave us a rough translation (= she did not translate everything exactly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.english: I’ve only read ‘Madame Bovary’ in translation (= not in its original language ) .
sentences.chinese: 我只读过《包法利夫人》的翻译本。

sentences.english: Much of the book’s humour has been lost in translation (= is no longer effective when translated ) .
sentences.chinese: 本书的许多幽默元素已在翻译过程中丢失。

detailed_translations.chinese: 翻译； 译文， 译本
detailed_translations.english: when you translate something, or something that has been translated

sentences.english: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多癌症可以治愈。

sentences.english: She was told last year that she had cancer .
sentences.chinese: 去年她得知自己患了癌症。

sentences.english: He died of cancer last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月他死于癌症。

sentences.english: a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 一种能有效杀死癌细胞的新疗法

detailed_translations.english: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal

sentences.english: All personnel are to receive security badges.
sentences.chinese: 所有人员都将拿到安保徽章。

detailed_translations.english: the people who work in a company, organization, or military force

name: hopeless
trans: 没有希望的， 绝望的

sentences.english: We tried to stop the flames from spreading, but we knew it was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 我们试图阻止火势蔓延，但我们知道这是不可能的。

sentences.english: Getting your work published often seems a hopeless task .
sentences.chinese: 想让自己的作品出版似乎总是徒劳的。

sentences.english: I kept on struggling forward, even though I knew it was hopeless .
sentences.chinese: 虽然知道无望，我还是奋力挣扎向前。

detailed_translations.chinese: 没有希望的， 绝望的
detailed_translations.english: if something that you try to do is hopeless, there is no possibility of it being successful

name: outlook
trans: 观点， 看法； 展望， 前景

sentences.english: Exercise will improve your looks and your outlook.
sentences.chinese: 运动将会改善你的外在形象和人生态度。

detailed_translations.chinese: 观点， 看法； 展望， 前景
detailed_translations.english: your general attitude to life and the world

name: fountain
trans: 泉水； 喷泉； 源泉

sentences.english: He was a fountain of information on Asian affairs.
sentences.chinese: 他是亚洲事务的信息源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泉水； 喷泉； 源泉
detailed_translations.english: a structure from which water is pushed up into the air, used for example as decoration in a garden or park

name: offense
trans: 犯规， 违法行为； 冒犯， 得罪

sentences.english: The Bears are going to have to work on their offense this season.
sentences.chinese: 本赛季熊队必须要加强进攻了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯规， 违法行为； 冒犯， 得罪

name: breadth
trans: 宽度； 幅度， 幅面

sentences.english: We need to provide more breadth in the college curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要扩大学院课程的范围。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宽度； 幅度， 幅面
detailed_translations.english: the distance from one side of something to the other

name: catalog
trans: 将…编入目录， 将编目

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…编入目录， 将编目

name: channel
trans: 海峡， 水道， 航道； 渠道， 途径； 频道

sentences.english: the news on Channel 4
sentences.chinese: 第四频道播出的新闻

sentences.english: The kids are watching cartoons on the Disney Channel.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在看迪士尼频道的卡通片。

sentences.english: What channel is ‘ER’ on?
sentences.chinese: 《仁心仁术》在哪个频道播放？

sentences.english: He changed channels to watch the basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 他转换频道看篮球比赛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海峡， 水道， 航道； 渠道， 途径； 频道
detailed_translations.english: a television station and all the programmes that it broadcasts

sentences.english: His eyes were focussed straight ahead.
sentences.chinese: 他的双眼盯着正前方。

detailed_translations.english: to give special attention to one particular person or thing, or to make people do this
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is invisible cannot be seen

sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

sentences.english: roast chicken with peas and carrots
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡配豌豆胡萝卜

sentences.english: He has to take pills to control his blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他必须服药控制血压。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["sleeping pills"]}
sentences.chinese: 安眠药

sentences.chinese: 一瓶维生素片

detailed_translations.english: a small solid piece of medicine that you swallow whole

sentences.chinese: 他为了一个香烟广告攀岩折断了手腕。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body where your hand joins your arm

sentences.chinese: 我走近那幢房子的时候注意到楼上有灯光。

sentences.chinese: 她听到有脚步声走过来。

detailed_translations.english: to move towards or nearer to someone or something
movement towards or near to something

trans: 杜撰出来的人； 神话

detailed_translations.chinese: 杜撰出来的人； 神话
detailed_translations.english: an ancient story, especially one invented in order to explain natural or historical events

detailed_translations.english: a powder that is made by crushing wheat or other grain and is used for making bread, cakes etc

name: implication
trans: 含意， 暗示， 暗指； 卷入， 牵连

sentences.chinese: 它们被称作“超级电车”，这是暗指它们比先前的型号更先进。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which it is shown or suggested that someone or something is involved in a crime or a dishonest act

sentences.english: The favorite, of course, is camel.
sentences.chinese: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色。

sentences.english: I wonder what the ECL on a half-camel is.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道半骆驼的有效人物等级是多少。

sentences.english: Earth tones are definitely big for this season, and camel will fit in with trends such as Queen's Country, Town meets Country and the like seamlessly.
sentences.chinese: 大地色无疑是这一季的主打，驼色也非常适合“王室风范”“大都市遭遇乡村风尚”这些流行系列，并且配合得天衣无缝。

detailed_translations.english: a large desert animal with a long neck and either one or two  hump s (= large raised parts )  on its back

sentences.english: fierce fighting in the city
sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

detailed_translations.english: done with a lot of energy and strong feelings, and sometimes violence

name: bump
trans: 碰撞， 猛撞； 肿块； 隆起物

trans: 预订； 保留； 犹豫； 保留地

sentences.chinese: 预订晚餐

sentences.chinese: 每公斤多少钱？

sentences.chinese: 每晚收费40英镑的房间

sentences.english: Admission is £9.95 per adult.
sentences.chinese: 成人门票每位9.95英镑。

sentences.english: My car does 12 miles per litre (= for each litre of petrol ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的汽车每升汽油跑12英里。

sentences.english: The meal cost $25 per head (= for or by each person ) .
sentences.chinese: 那顿饭人均花费25美元。

detailed_translations.english: for each

trans: 继续进行； 行进， 前进

sentences.chinese: 我们必须先定义术语，然后再往下展开。

trans: 鉴于， 考虑到， 顾及

sentences.chinese: 考虑到对方实力强大，我们能攻进两球已经很不错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鉴于， 考虑到， 顾及
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you are thinking about a particular fact when you are giving your opinion

trans: 公司， 企业， 社团

sentences.chinese: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.english: multinational corporations
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司

sentences.english: the Siemens Corporation
sentences.chinese: 西门子公司

detailed_translations.chinese: 公司， 企业， 社团
detailed_translations.english: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization

sentences.chinese: 父母离婚过程中孩子两面都要依顺的痛苦

detailed_translations.english: the quality of remaining faithful to your friends, principles, country etc

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

trans: 不再考虑； 解雇， 解散； 驳回

sentences.chinese: 有人认为国家医疗政策一塌糊涂，政府对这种批评持否认态度。

detailed_translations.english: to remove someone from their job

trans: 提议， 建议， 提出； 提名， 推荐； 打算， 计划； 求婚

sentences.chinese: 目前由地方规划局提议的改革

sentences.chinese: 所提出的预算削减

detailed_translations.english: to suggest something as a plan or course of action

trans: 智力； 理解力； 情报

sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

detailed_translations.chinese: 智力； 理解力； 情报
detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

trans: 改革， 改良， 改造； 改正， 改过自新

sentences.chinese: 彻底改革税收制度的计划

detailed_translations.english: cold air that moves through a room and that you can feel

name: daylight
trans: 白昼， 日光， 黎明

sentences.chinese: 公园白天对公众开放。

sentences.english: If possible, it’s better to work in natural daylight.
sentences.chinese: 如果条件允许的话，最好在自然日光下工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 白昼， 日光， 黎明

trans: 安装， 设置； 使就职， 任命

sentences.chinese: 他们终于安装了新电脑网络。

sentences.chinese: 种族融合的问题

detailed_translations.english: the combining of two or more things so that they work together effectively

sentences.chinese: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the size of something or someone

训练， 指导， 辅导

sentences.chinese: 网球教练

sentences.english: the Norwegian national coach
sentences.chinese: 挪威国家队教练

detailed_translations.chinese: 长途公共汽车；教练，指导；旅客车厢

detailed_translations.chinese: 训练， 指导， 辅导

to feel that there is no hope at all

trans: 冠军， 得胜者； 捍卫者， 拥护者

sentences.chinese: …一位前奥运冠军。

sentences.english: Kasparov became world champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯帕罗夫成了世界冠军。

detailed_translations.english: A champion is someone who has won the first prize in a competition, contest, or fight

sentences.chinese: 我不在公共场合嚼口香糖。

detailed_translations.english: a type of glue used to stick light things such as paper together

sentences.chinese: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 电路， 线路； 环行， 巡行

trans: 消瘦， 衰弱； 痛苦， 悲哀； 渴望

sentences.chinese: 我渴望乡下的生活。

detailed_translations.english: If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it
a tall tree with long hard sharp leaves that do not fall off in winter

trans: 宏伟的， 壮丽的； 华丽的； 极好的

detailed_translations.chinese: 宏伟的， 壮丽的； 华丽的； 极好的

sentences.english: Dave’s a nice guy when you get to know him.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫是个好人，你了解他后就知道了。

sentences.english: Jake’s a real tough guy.
sentences.chinese: 杰克是个很厉害的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: a man

name: respectively
trans: 各自地， 各个地， 分别地

sentences.chinese: 茶杯和茶碟的价钱分别为5英镑和3英镑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各自地， 各个地， 分别地
detailed_translations.english: in the same order as the things you have just mentioned

sentences.english: protection money
sentences.chinese: 保护费

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is protected

sentences.english: He’s gone down the pub for a quick pint.
sentences.chinese: 他去小酒馆匆匆喝上一品脱啤酒。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring an amount of liquid, especially beer or milk. In Britain a pint is equal to 0.568 litres, and in the US it is equal to 0.473 litres.

name: restrict
trans: 限制， 约束， 限定

sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制， 约束， 限定
detailed_translations.english: to limit or control the size, amount, or range of something

trans: 立即的； 紧急的； 可以速食的

sentences.english: an instant success
sentences.chinese: 马到成功

sentences.chinese: 能立即查到客户信息的系统

sentences.chinese: 这些女人立刻就彼此厌恶起来。

sentences.english: The programme brought an instant response.
sentences.chinese: 节目立即引起了反响。

sentences.chinese: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立即的； 紧急的； 可以速食的

An instant is an extremely short period of time

name: conjunction
trans: 接合， 连接， 联合； 连词

sentences.chinese: 这些活页练习题专门用来与新课本配套使用。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of different things that have come together by chance

sentences.chinese: 我一直在费力地看一份不知所云的电脑打印稿。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

sentences.english: She needs to organize her ideas in a more orderly way.
sentences.chinese: 她需要把自己的想法组织得更有条理些。

detailed_translations.english: arranged or organized in a sensible or neat way

sentences.english: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立这样一个数据库要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money

sentences.english: Are you going to roast the chicken?
sentences.chinese: 这鸡你是准备烤的吗？

sentences.english: the delicious smell of meat roasting
sentences.chinese: 烤肉的香味

sentences.english: We caught a rabbit and roasted it over an open fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们捉到一只兔子，放在火上烧烤。

detailed_translations.english: to cook something, such as meat, in an  oven  or over a fire, or to cook in this way
roasted
a large piece of roasted meat

name: violence
trans: 猛烈， 激烈； 暴力

sentences.english: She spoke with a violence that surprised them both.
sentences.chinese: 她言辞激烈，令他们俩都很惊讶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛烈， 激烈； 暴力
detailed_translations.english: an angry way of speaking or reacting

name: succession
trans: 连续； 一连串； 接替， 继任， 继承

sentences.english: If the prince dies, the succession passes to his son.
sentences.chinese: 王子如果去世，就由他的儿子继承。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连续； 一连串； 接替， 继任， 继承
detailed_translations.english: the act of taking over an official job or position, or the right to be the next to take it

name: accordingly
trans: 因此， 所以； 照着

sentences.english: Some of the laws were contradictory. Accordingly, measures were taken to clarify them.
sentences.chinese: 有些法律相互矛盾，因此，采取了措施将其阐明。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something

name: consequence
trans: 结果， 后果； 重要， 重大

sentences.english: I don’t suppose it is of any consequence now.
sentences.chinese: 现在我觉得这事一点都无所谓了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结果， 后果； 重要， 重大
detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

name: product
trans: 产品， 产物； 乘积

sentences.english: The London factory assembles the finished product .
sentences.chinese: 伦敦工厂组装成品。

sentences.english: He works in marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 他从事营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.chinese: 产品， 产物； 乘积
detailed_translations.english: something that is grown or made in a factory in large quantities, usually in order to be sold

sentences.english: Steve was in a particularly bad mood when he got back.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫回来时情绪特别不好。

sentences.english: The restaurant is particularly popular with young people.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅尤其受到年轻人的欢迎。

sentences.english: We are hoping to expand our business, particularly in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望扩大业务，尤其是在欧洲。

sentences.english: British farmers, particularly those producing lamb, are very worried.
sentences.chinese: 英国农场主，尤其是养羊羔的农场主，非常担忧。

detailed_translations.english: more than usual or more than others

name: dominant
trans: 占优势的， 支配的， 统治的； 居高临下的， 高耸的

sentences.english: The dominant male gorilla is the largest in the group.
sentences.chinese: 领头的公猩猩是这群大猩猩中体形最大的一个。

sentences.english: Japan became dominant in the mass market during the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代日本在大众市场上开始占据优势。

sentences.english: its dominant position within the group
sentences.chinese: 它在该组织中的突出地位

detailed_translations.chinese: 占优势的， 支配的， 统治的； 居高临下的， 高耸的
detailed_translations.english: more powerful, important, or noticeable than other people or things

name: heading
trans: 标题， 题词， 题名； 新闻提要

sentences.english: chapter headings
sentences.chinese: 章节标题

detailed_translations.chinese: 标题， 题词， 题名； 新闻提要
detailed_translations.english: the title written at the beginning of a piece of writing, or at the beginning of part of a book

sentences.english: He killed his wife’s lover.
sentences.chinese: 他杀了妻子的情人。

sentences.english: Nicola and I were lovers.
sentences.chinese: 我和尼古拉以前是情人。

sentences.english: a pair of young lovers
sentences.chinese: 一对年轻的情侣

detailed_translations.english: someone’s lover is the person they are having a sexual relationship with but who they are not married to

sentences.chinese: 用醋和棕色纸张包扎。

sentences.english: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.chinese: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的。

sentences.english: Can we have some salt / pepper / vinegar / mustard, please?
sentences.chinese: 可以帮我加一些盐、胡椒粉、醋、芥末吗？

sentences.chinese: 他在考试时作弊，用了计算器。

sentences.chinese: 现在是退潮还是涨潮？

sentences.chinese: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.chinese: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

sentences.english: a narcotics cop

sentences.chinese: 他拿出警徽说自己是警察。

sentences.chinese: 我们最好在下个小镇加油。

sentences.chinese: 小货车加好了油，在地下停车场等着。

if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it

sentences.chinese: 南安普敦队的球迷对球队的前任教练很不友善。

sentences.chinese: 飞机的噪声使我们耳朵听不见了。

sentences.chinese: 用自己的飞机，你可以随时去你想去的地方，起降的机场通常也不对航空公司开放。

trans: 方式； 态度； 风度； 礼貌， 规矩

sentences.chinese: 小伙子

detailed_translations.english: a boy or young man

trans: 完全相同的， 同一的

sentences.chinese: 有几家慈善机构已向洪灾灾民送去了救援物资。

trans: 学院的； 学术的； 纯理论的， 不切实际的

sentences.chinese: 他没有学历。

sentences.chinese: 旨在提高学术水平的计划

sentences.chinese: 这家制鞋厂是本地区最大的雇主。

detailed_translations.english: if water laps something or laps against something such as the shore or a boat, it moves against it or hits it in small waves
a single journey arounda race track

trans: 矿物， 矿石， 矿物质

sentences.chinese: 该地区矿产非常丰富。

sentences.chinese: 我的老板是老一套的回答–“没坏的话就别修了！”

sentences.chinese: 有些房子的屋顶不堪积雪的重压塌陷了。

sentences.chinese: 他脸上的表情异常惊恐。

trans: 比较， 对照； 比拟， 比喻

detailed_translations.chinese: 大浪， 波涛； 高涨； 汹涌

sentences.english: She turned away from the window lest anyone see them.
sentences.chinese: 她转身离开窗边，免得有人看见他们。

sentences.english: her heroic efforts to save her family

sentences.chinese: 劳伦斯与命运的勇敢抗争

sentences.english: She portrayed him as a heroic figure .
sentences.chinese: 她把他描述为英雄人物。

detailed_translations.english: extremely brave or determined, and admired by many people

name: sway

sentences.chinese: 树木在和风中轻轻摇曳。

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly from one side to another

detailed_translations.chinese: 摇摆， 摇动； 起支配作用的影响
detailed_translations.english: power to rule or influence people

name: basis
trans: 基础， 根据； 原则

sentences.english: Their claim had no basis in fact (=  it was not true  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的说法没有事实根据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础， 根据； 原则
detailed_translations.english: the facts, ideas, or things from which something can be developed

name: tutor
trans: 当…导师， 当…家庭教师
导师；家庭教师，私人教师

sentences.english: He was privately tutored.
sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当…导师， 当…家庭教师

sentences.english: Senator Kennedy
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪参议员

detailed_translations.english: a member of the Senate or a senate

name: adventure
trans: 奇遇； 冒险， 冒险活动

sentences.english: a great adventure
sentences.chinese: 一大奇遇

sentences.english: Ahab’s adventures at sea
sentences.chinese: 亚哈的海上历险

sentences.english: an adventure story
sentences.chinese: 一个历险故事

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇遇； 冒险， 冒险活动
detailed_translations.english: an exciting experience in which dangerous or unusual things happen

sentences.chinese: 这支球队已经连胜五场了。

sentences.chinese: 历届政府都试图解决这个问题。

sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.english: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

name: ceremony
trans: 典礼， 仪式， 礼节

sentences.chinese: 婚礼

sentences.english: the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games
sentences.chinese: 奥运会开幕式

detailed_translations.chinese: 典礼， 仪式， 礼节
detailed_translations.english: an important social or religious event, when a traditional set of actions is performed in a formal way

sentences.chinese: 雇主有责任对所有员工一视同仁。

sentences.chinese: 你不必非要买更多的书。

sentences.english: the rights and obligations imposed on them by treaties

sentences.chinese: 政府必须为退伍军人支付医疗保健费用——这是我们对他们负有的义务。

sentences.english: a moral obligation to help the poor
sentences.chinese: 帮助穷人的道德义务

sentences.english: He stayed with the team out of a sense of obligation.
sentences.chinese: 他出于责任感而留在队里。

sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.chinese: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

sentences.chinese: 我很少到那家餐厅吃午饭。

sentences.english: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.chinese: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.english: an evil dictator responsible for the deaths of millions

sentences.english: his evil deeds
