detailed_translations.english: someone who is evil deliberately does very cruel things to harm other people
something that is very bad or harmful

name: governor
trans: 州长； 主管人员； 理事， 董事

sentences.english: a school governor
sentences.chinese: 学校董事

sentences.english: the hospital’s board of governors
sentences.chinese: 医院的董事会

detailed_translations.chinese: 州长； 主管人员； 理事， 董事
detailed_translations.english: a member of a committee that controls an organization or institution

name: twist
trans: 缠绕，盘绕；转动，旋动；捻，搓；歪曲，曲解；扭歪，扭伤；曲折前进；转身
扭弯； 转折， 转变； 弯曲， 曲折处

sentences.english: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缠绕，盘绕；转动，旋动；捻，搓；歪曲，曲解；扭歪，扭伤；曲折前进；转身
detailed_translations.english: to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 扭弯； 转折， 转变； 弯曲， 曲折处
detailed_translations.english: an unexpected feature or change in a situation or series of events

name: locate
trans: 探明， 找出； 把…设置在， 使…坐落于

sentences.english: We couldn’t locate the source of the radio signal.
sentences.chinese: 我们无法确定无线电信号的来源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探明， 找出； 把…设置在， 使…坐落于
detailed_translations.english: to find the exact position of something

sentences.english: Our goal is to unite the opposition parties and defeat the President.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是联合各反对党挫败总统。

detailed_translations.english: if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something

sentences.english: ...the ladies' lavatory.
sentences.chinese: …女厕所。

detailed_translations.english: a toilet or the room a toilet is in

sentences.english: The exterior walls need a new coat of paint.
sentences.chinese: 外墙需要刷新漆了。

detailed_translations.english: on the outside of something
the outside of something, especially a building

name: technique
trans: 技术， 技巧， 技能

sentences.english: He’s a great player, with brilliant technique.
sentences.chinese: 他是个伟大的球员，球技十分精湛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 技术， 技巧， 技能
detailed_translations.english: a special way of doing something

sentences.english: We flew over 200 combat missions in the war.
sentences.chinese: 我们在战争中执行过两百多次战斗飞行任务。

sentences.english: training in unarmed combat
sentences.chinese: 徒手格斗训练

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: They all trooped back to the house for a rest.
sentences.chinese: 他们都成群结队地回房子里休息。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people troop somewhere, they walk there together in a way that shows they are tired or bored
soldiers in an organized group

name: scenery
trans: 风景， 景色； 舞台布景

sentences.english: The best part of the trip was the fantastic scenery.
sentences.chinese: 此次旅行最精彩之处就是那美妙绝伦的风景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 风景， 景色； 舞台布景
detailed_translations.english: the natural features of a particular part of a country that you can see, such as mountains, forests, deserts etc

name: unity
trans: 单一， 统一， 团结； 和睦， 协调

sentences.english: economic unity
sentences.chinese: 经济统一

sentences.english: European unity
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的一体化

detailed_translations.chinese: 单一， 统一， 团结； 和睦， 协调
detailed_translations.english: when a group of people or countries agree or are joined together

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

name: pursue
trans: 继续； 从事； 追赶， 追踪； 追求

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.chinese: 继续； 从事； 追赶， 追踪； 追求
detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

sentences.english: The first letter she wrote me was less than a page long, and her second letter was similarly brief.
sentences.chinese: 她写给我的第一封信不到一页，第二封信也一样简短。

sentences.english: The cost of food and clothing has come down in recent years. Similarly, fuel prices have fallen quite considerably.
sentences.chinese: 吃穿的费用近年来下降了。 同样地，燃料价格也有大幅 回落。

detailed_translations.english: in a similar way

name: convey
trans: 表达， 传递； 运送， 输送

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表达， 传递； 运送， 输送
detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

name: muscle
trans: 肌肉， 体力； 力量， 实力

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: Rooney has pulled a muscle in his thigh and won’t play tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 鲁尼大腿肌肉拉伤，明天不能参赛了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 肌肉， 体力； 力量， 实力
detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: design
trans: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图

sentences.english: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

detailed_translations.english: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图
detailed_translations.english: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

name: extra
trans: 额外的事物， 额外费用

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

sentences.english: an extra special effort
sentences.chinese: 格外的努力

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize an adjective or adverb
more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number

detailed_translations.chinese: 额外的事物， 额外费用
detailed_translations.english: an amount of something, especially money, in addition to the usual, basic, or necessary amount

name: generous
trans: 慷慨的； 宽厚的； 大量的

sentences.english: a generous glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一大杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.chinese: 慷慨的； 宽厚的； 大量的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is generous is willing to give money, spend time etc, in order to help people or give them pleasure

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

sentences.english: There’s always a possibility that he might go back to Seattle.
sentences.chinese: 他也许会回到西雅图去，这种可能性一直存在。

sentences.english: the possibility of an enemy attack
sentences.chinese: 敌人进攻的可能性

sentences.english: There was no possibility of changing the voting procedure.
sentences.chinese: 改变投票程序是不可能的。

sentences.english: A peace settlement now looks like a real possibility .
sentences.chinese: 达成和平协议现在看来有很大的可能性。

sentences.english: Tomorrow, there’s a remote possibility of snow on high ground.
sentences.chinese: 明天高原地区下雪的可能性甚微。

sentences.english: They might get married – it’s not beyond the bounds of possibility .
sentences.chinese: 他们也许会结婚——这并非不可能。

sentences.english: The study raises the possibility that dieting is bad for your health.
sentences.chinese: 那项研究指出节食有可能损害健康。

detailed_translations.english: if there is a possibility that something is true or that something will happen, it might be true or it might happen

name: lane
trans: 小路； 跑道； 航道， 航线

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

detailed_translations.chinese: 小路； 跑道； 航道， 航线
detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

sentences.english: Add a crushed clove of garlic (= single section of it ).
sentences.chinese: 加一瓣压碎的大蒜。

detailed_translations.english: a plant like a small onion, used in cooking to give a strong taste

name: chief
trans: 首领， 长官； 酋长， 族长

sentences.english: One of the chief causes of crime today is drugs.
sentences.chinese: 毒品是如今犯罪的主要诱因之一。

sentences.english: Safety is our chief concern .
sentences.chinese: 安全问题是我们的头等大事。

sentences.english: The chief reason for this is that people are living longer.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为人们更长寿了。

sentences.english: his chief rival for the job
sentences.chinese: 和他竞争这份工作的主要对手

sentences.english: the prosecution’s chief witness
sentences.chinese: 控方的主要证人

sentences.english: She had many reasons for taking the money, but chief among them was revenge.
sentences.chinese: 她拿这笔钱的原因有很多，但最主要的是为了报复。

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 首领， 长官； 酋长， 族长
detailed_translations.english: the ruler of a tribe

name: accord
trans: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予

sentences.english: The punishments accorded with the current code of discipline.
sentences.chinese: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予
detailed_translations.english: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment

sentences.english: The return flight of the aircraft was delayed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的返回航程被推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: a plane or other vehicle that can fly

name: automatic
trans: 自动的，机械的；不假思索的，无意识的；必然的，自然的
自动手枪； 有自动装置的汽车

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的，机械的；不假思索的，无意识的；必然的，自然的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动手枪； 有自动装置的汽车
detailed_translations.english: a weapon that can fire bullets continuously

name: doubtful
trans: 难以预测的； 怀疑的

sentences.english: ‘Everything’s going to be all right, you’ll see.’ Jenny looked doubtful .
sentences.chinese: “一切都会顺顺当当的，你等着看好了。” 珍妮看起来不大相信的样子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难以预测的； 怀疑的
detailed_translations.english: not sure that something is true or right

sentences.english: Liz realized that, despite herself, she cared about Edward.
sentences.chinese: 利兹发现自己不由自主地在乎爱德华。

detailed_translations.english: if you do something despite yourself, you do it although you did not intend to

name: opening
trans: 口子， 洞， 孔； 开始； 空缺

sentences.english: the opening match of the season
sentences.chinese: 本赛季的首场比赛

sentences.english: the opening chapter of the book
sentences.chinese: 本书的第一章

sentences.english: the chairman’s opening remarks
sentences.chinese: 主席的开场白

detailed_translations.english: first or beginning

detailed_translations.chinese: 口子， 洞， 孔； 开始； 空缺
detailed_translations.english: a hole or space in something

sentences.english: By 1900, Britain was a mainly industrial society.
sentences.chinese: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to industry or the people working in it

sentences.english: The little boy made no effort to obey.
sentences.chinese: 这小男孩不肯服从。

sentences.english: ‘Sit!’ he said, and the dog obeyed him instantly.
sentences.chinese: “坐下！”他说道，那只狗马上就服从了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do

name: conduct
trans: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

name: stable
trans: 稳定的，不变的；沉稳的，持重的

sentences.english: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
sentences.chinese: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

sentences.english: Children like a stable environment.
sentences.chinese: 儿童喜欢稳定的环境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳定的，不变的；沉稳的，持重的
detailed_translations.english: steady and not likely to move or change
a building where horses are kept

name: lamb
trans: 羔羊， 小羊； 羔羊肉

sentences.english: roast lamb
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉

detailed_translations.chinese: 羔羊， 小羊； 羔羊肉
detailed_translations.english: a young sheep

sentences.english: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put your head on when you are sleeping

sentences.english: On Sunday the horses were harnessed to a heavy wagon for a day-long ride over the border.
sentences.chinese: 星期天这些马被套在一辆沉重的货车上，踏上长达一天的旅程越过边境。

detailed_translations.english: to put a harness on a horse
a set of leather bands used to control a horse or to attach it to a vehicle it is pulling

name: fantastic
trans: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

name: sketch
trans: 绘…的略图， 画…的素描； 概述

sentences.english: Holford sketched a 10-year programme for rebuilding the city.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔福德简单介绍了城市重建的十年规划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 绘…的略图， 画…的素描； 概述
detailed_translations.english: to draw a sketch of something
a simple, quickly made drawing that does not show much detail

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

name: respond
trans: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应

sentences.english: They are likely to respond positively to the president's request for aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
detailed_translations.english: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

sentences.english: Am I at risk because of some incident in my sexual past?
sentences.chinese: 我过去性生活中的某件事会使我处于危险境地吗？

sentences.english: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.chinese: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

detailed_translations.english: an event, especially one that is unusual, important, or violent

name: maintenance
trans: 维持； 保养； 抚养费

sentences.english: the cost of repairs and maintenance
sentences.chinese: 维修保养费

sentences.english: The theatres were closed on Saturday and Sunday for routine maintenance .
sentences.chinese: 戏院周六和周日关闭进行例行维护。

sentences.english: Engineers are carrying out essential maintenance work on the main line to Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 机修工正在对通往剑桥的干线进行必要的养护。

sentences.english: an evening class in car maintenance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保养的夜校课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 维持； 保养； 抚养费
detailed_translations.english: the repairs, painting etc that are necessary to keep something in good condition

name: marry
trans: 娶， 嫁； 为…证婚； 结婚， 结合

sentences.english: He married Bea in 1925.
sentences.chinese: 他在1925年娶了贝亚。

sentences.english: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.chinese: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.english: She married young (= at a young age ) .
sentences.chinese: 她结婚早。

sentences.english: People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.chinese: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.english: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 娶， 嫁； 为…证婚； 结婚， 结合
detailed_translations.english: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife

sentences.english: Her body was already starting to decay.
sentences.chinese: 她的尸体已经开始腐烂。

sentences.english: Most archaeological finds are broken, damaged, or decayed.
sentences.chinese: 大部分考古发现物都已破裂、损坏或腐烂。

sentences.english: decaying organic matter
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的有机物

detailed_translations.english: to be slowly destroyed by a natural chemical process, or to make something do this
the natural chemical change that causes the slow destruction of something

name: absorb
trans: 吸收； 吸引…的注意， 使全神贯注； 把…并入， 同化

sentences.english: Plants absorb nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸收养分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸收； 吸引…的注意， 使全神贯注； 把…并入， 同化
detailed_translations.english: to take in liquid, gas, or another substance from the surface or space around something

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

name: concern
trans: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

name: circulate
trans: 循环， 流通； 流传， 散布， 传播

sentences.english: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.chinese: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.english: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

detailed_translations.chinese: 循环， 流通； 流传， 散布， 传播
detailed_translations.english: to move around within a system, or to make something do this

name: liberty
trans: 自由； 许可， 准许； 过于随便， 放肆

sentences.english: ...the ideal of equality and the appreciation of liberty.
sentences.chinese: …对平等的向往及对自由的欣赏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自由； 许可， 准许； 过于随便， 放肆
detailed_translations.english: Liberty is the freedom to live your life in the way that you want, without interference from other people or the authorities

sentences.english: The car is liable to overheat on long trips.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车跑长途容易过热。

detailed_translations.english: likely to be affected by a particular kind of problem, illness etc

sentences.english: a cargo plane
sentences.chinese: 货机

detailed_translations.english: the goods that are being carried in a ship or plane

name: confidential
trans: 秘密的， 机密的； 亲信的

sentences.english: a confidential government report
sentences.chinese: 一份机密的政府报告

sentences.english: Doctors are required to keep patients’ records completely confidential .
sentences.chinese: 医生必须对病人的病历完全保密。

sentences.english: The information will be regarded as strictly confidential (= completely confidential ) .
sentences.chinese: 这一信息将被视为绝对机密。

detailed_translations.chinese: 秘密的， 机密的； 亲信的
detailed_translations.english: spoken or written in secret and intended to be kept secret

name: drift
trans: 漂流； 大意， 主旨； 趋势

sentences.english: Smoke drifted up from the jungle ahead of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们前方的丛林里有烟升起。

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly on water or in the air

detailed_translations.chinese: 漂流； 大意， 主旨； 趋势
detailed_translations.english: a slow change or development from one situation, opinion etc to another

name: element
trans: 成分， 要素， 元素； 基础， 纲要； 自然力

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成分， 要素， 元素； 基础， 纲要； 自然力
detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

sentences.english: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order

sentences.english: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.chinese: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: all humans considered as a group

name: abundant
trans: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

sentences.english: I found Mark at the hospital, pacing restlessly up and down .
sentences.chinese: 我看见马克在医院里焦躁不安地踱来踱去。

detailed_translations.english: to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous
the speed at which something happens or is done

sentences.english: ‘No!’ she exclaimed in shock.
sentences.chinese: “不！”她惊呼道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something suddenly and loudly because you are surprised, angry, or excited

sentences.english: The probable cause of the fire was faulty wiring.
sentences.chinese: 起火的原因很可能是电路故障。

sentences.english: Success is highly probable .
sentences.chinese: 成功的希望相当大。

detailed_translations.english: likely to exist, happen, or be true

sentences.english: Rain was forecast for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

detailed_translations.english: to make a statement saying what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now
a description of what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

name: uncover
trans: 揭露， 暴露； 揭开…的盖子

sentences.english: Customs officials uncovered a plot to smuggle weapons into the country.
sentences.chinese: 海关官员侦破了一个走私武器入境的阴谋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 揭露， 暴露； 揭开…的盖子
detailed_translations.english: to find out about something that has been kept secret

name: recognize
trans: 认出， 识别； 承认； 赏识， 表彰， 报偿

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 识别； 承认； 赏识， 表彰， 报偿
detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

name: pack
trans: 捆扎，把…打包；使挤在一起，塞满

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Have you finished packing yet?
sentences.chinese: 你行李收拾完了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 捆扎，把…打包；使挤在一起，塞满
detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
a small container, usually made of paper, that something is sold in

name: restraint
trans: 抑制， 限制， 克制； 约束措施， 约束条件

sentences.english: The police were praised for their restraint in handling the demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 警方因对待示威者时所表现出的克制而受到赞扬。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抑制， 限制， 克制； 约束措施， 约束条件
detailed_translations.english: calm sensible controlled behaviour, especially in a situation when it is difficult to stay calm

name: input
trans: 输入；投入的资金；输入的数据

sentences.english: If the input data specified it, the file will close and the process terminates.
sentences.chinese: 如果输入数据指定，该文件就会关闭，数据处理终止。

detailed_translations.chinese: 输入；投入的资金；输入的数据
detailed_translations.english: information that is put into a computer
to put information into a computer

sentences.english: She stood nervously in the wings waiting for her cue.
sentences.chinese: 她紧张地站在台侧等待出场的提示。

detailed_translations.english: an action or event that is a signal for something else to happen
to give someone a sign that it is the right moment for them to speak or do something, especially during a performance

sentences.english: That is one electron volt.
sentences.chinese: 就是一单位的电子伏特。

sentences.english: If I multiply these two, what is the coulomb times a volt?
sentences.chinese: 如果我把这两个乘起来，库仑乘以伏特是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the force of an electric current

name: reality
trans: 现实， 实际； 真实

sentences.english: the distinction between fantasy and reality
sentences.chinese: 幻想和现实之间的区别

sentences.english: TV is used as an escape from reality .
sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府已经脱离了现实。

sentences.english: political realities
sentences.chinese: 政治现实

sentences.english: The paperless office may one day become a reality .
sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现实， 实际； 真实
detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

name: stereotype
trans: 陈规，老套，固定的模式；铅版
把…浇铸成铅版； 对…形成固定看法

sentences.english: There's always been a stereotype about successful businessmen.
sentences.chinese: 对成功的商人们总有一种成见。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陈规，老套，固定的模式；铅版
把…浇铸成铅版； 对…形成固定看法

sentences.english: And, with the rise of online education, you can even enroll in certified programs that allow you to learn and improve your career during your off-hours.
sentences.chinese: 并且，随着在线教育的崛起，你甚至可以参加认证课程，在下班工夫里学习和改善本人的职业生涯。

name: offend
trans: 冒犯， 伤害…的感情； 使厌恶； 违反

sentences.english: His remarks deeply offended many Scottish people.
sentences.chinese: 他的话严重冒犯了许多苏格兰人。

sentences.english: The careful language is designed not to offend.
sentences.chinese: 使用谨慎的语言是为了不得罪人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冒犯， 伤害…的感情； 使厌恶； 违反
detailed_translations.english: to make someone angry or upset by doing or saying something that they think is rude, unkind etc

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

name: resign
trans: 辞去， 放弃； 使听从， 使顺从

sentences.chinese: 一位医院主管因为有人声称他的职位是骗来的而辞职了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

detailed_translations.chinese: 辞去， 放弃； 使听从， 使顺从
detailed_translations.english: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

sentences.english: I bathed, washed my hair, and got dressed.
sentences.chinese: 我洗了澡，洗了头，然后穿上衣服。

sentences.english: He bathed the children and put them to bed.
sentences.chinese: 他给孩子们洗了澡，然后把他们弄上床。

detailed_translations.english: to wash yourself or someone else in a bath

name: workman
trans: 工人， 劳动者， 工匠

sentences.english: In University Square workmen are building a steel fence.
sentences.chinese: 在大学广场工人们正在筑一个钢栅栏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工人， 劳动者， 工匠
detailed_translations.english: someone who does physical work such as building, repairing things etc

name: sophisticated
trans: 老于世故的； 高级的； 精密的， 复杂的； 高雅的

sentences.english: sophisticated software
sentences.chinese: 很先进的软件

sentences.english: a highly sophisticated weapons system
sentences.chinese: 非常精密的武器系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 老于世故的； 高级的； 精密的， 复杂的； 高雅的
detailed_translations.english: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

sentences.english: a picture of sunrise over Mount Fuji
sentences.chinese: 富士山日出的照片

detailed_translations.english: the time when the sun first appears in the morning

name: entertainment
trans: 娱乐， 文娱节目， 表演会； 招待， 款待， 请客

sentences.english: The town provides a wide choice of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.english: There will be live entertainment (= performed then, not recorded ) throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 现场表演将持续一整天。

sentences.english: The dolphins give good entertainment value (= a lot of amusement and interest ).
sentences.chinese: 海豚具有很高的娱乐价值。

detailed_translations.chinese: 娱乐， 文娱节目， 表演会； 招待， 款待， 请客
detailed_translations.english: things such as films, television, performances etc that are intended to amuse or interest people

sentences.english: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that has official information on it

sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.english: pictures of starving children
sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.english: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
