trans: 电池， 蓄电池； 排炮， 炮组； 一系列， 一套

sentences.english: You have to take the top off to change the batteries .
sentences.chinese: 你得把顶盖拿掉才能更换电池。

sentences.english: When the red light comes on, you should recharge the battery .
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮起的时候你就应该给电池充电了。

sentences.english: The car’s got a flat battery .
sentences.chinese: 汽车的蓄电池没电了。

sentences.english: a battery-operated hairdryer
sentences.chinese: 使用电池的吹风机

detailed_translations.chinese: 电池， 蓄电池； 排炮， 炮组； 一系列， 一套
detailed_translations.english: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy

name: chase
trans: 追逐， 追赶； 追求

sentences.english: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶； 追求
detailed_translations.english: to quickly follow someone or something in order to catch them

sentences.english: I met her quite by accident (=  completely by accident  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我遇见她完全是偶然。

sentences.english: The discovery was made almost by accident.
sentences.chinese: 这项发现几乎纯属意外。

sentences.english: The pilot, whether by accident or design (=  whether it was planned or not planned  ) , made the plane do a sharp turn.
sentences.chinese: 不知是有意还是无意，那名飞行员让飞机来了个急转弯。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that is not planned or intended

name: marine
trans: 海的， 海生的； 海事的， 海军的， 海运的

sentences.english: the enormous variety of marine life
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.english: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals
sentences.chinese: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.english: marine biology
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学

sentences.english: A small number of Marines were wounded.
sentences.chinese: 几名海军陆战队士兵受了伤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海的， 海生的； 海事的， 海军的， 海运的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there
A marine is a member of an armed force, for example the U.S. Marine Corps or the Royal Marines, who is specially trained for military duties at sea as well as on land.

name: clay
trans: 黏土， 泥土； 肉体

sentences.english: ...the heavy clay soils of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: …佐治亚州厚重的黏土的土壤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 黏土， 泥土； 肉体
detailed_translations.english: a type of heavy sticky earth that can be used for making pots, bricks etc

name: anyway
trans: 无论如何， 至少； 不论以何种方式， 无论从什么角度

sentences.english: Let’s think about it for a while, for a few days anyway.
sentences.chinese: 让我们想一想，至少考虑几天。

sentences.english: There seems to have been a technical problem – anyway, that’s what they told me.
sentences.chinese: 好像出了技术故障，至少他们是这么跟我说的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论如何， 至少； 不论以何种方式， 无论从什么角度
detailed_translations.english: used when adding something that corrects or slightly changes what you have just said

name: promote
trans: 促进， 增进， 发扬； 提升； 宣传， 推销

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 促进， 增进， 发扬； 提升； 宣传， 推销
detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

name: routine
trans: 例行公事，惯例，惯常的程序

sentences.english: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

sentences.english: routine maintenance work
sentences.chinese: 例行的维修工作

sentences.english: a routine operation
sentences.chinese: 常规操作

detailed_translations.english: happening as a normal part of a job or process

detailed_translations.chinese: 例行公事，惯例，惯常的程序
detailed_translations.english: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do

sentences.english: a bomb attack
sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.english: a knife attack
sentences.chinese: 持刀攻击

sentences.english: an arson attack
sentences.chinese: 纵火袭击

sentences.english: victims of racial attacks
sentences.chinese: 种族袭击的受害者

detailed_translations.english: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place
to start using guns, bombs etc against an enemy in a war

name: humour
trans: 幽默， 诙谐， 幽默感

sentences.english: his humour and charm
sentences.chinese: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.english: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.chinese: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.english: English humour
sentences.chinese: 英国式幽默

sentences.english: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.english: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.chinese: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.english: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幽默， 诙谐， 幽默感
detailed_translations.english: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability

name: divorce
trans: 离婚； 分离， 脱离

sentences.english: David’s parents divorced when he was six.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的父母在他六岁时离婚了。

sentences.english: My father threatened to divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲威胁说要和她离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
detailed_translations.english: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
the legal ending of a marriage

name: currency
trans: 通货， 货币； 通行， 流行

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通货， 货币； 通行， 流行
detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

sentences.english: We walked along by the side of the canal.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着运河边往前走。

sentences.english: the Panama Canal
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河

detailed_translations.english: a long passage dug into the ground and filled with water, either for boats to travel along, or to take water to a place

name: attach
trans: 缚， 系， 贴； 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有

sentences.english: When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.chinese: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚， 系， 贴； 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有
detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, but only if someone agrees to do a particular thing or accept a particular idea

name: distribute
trans: 分发， 分送； 分布

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

detailed_translations.chinese: 分发， 分送； 分布
detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

sentences.english: slender ankles
sentences.chinese: 纤细的脚踝

detailed_translations.english: the joint between your foot and your leg

name: convict
trans: 证明…有罪， 宣判…有罪

sentences.english: a convicted murderer
sentences.chinese: 已定罪的谋杀犯

detailed_translations.chinese: 证明…有罪， 宣判…有罪
detailed_translations.english: to prove or officially announce that someone is guilty of a crime after a  trial  in a law court
someone who has been proved to be guilty of a crime and sent to prison

name: legislation
trans: 法律， 法规； 立法， 法律的制定

sentences.english: This is a very important piece of legislation (= law ).
sentences.chinese: 这是一条非常重要的法规。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法律， 法规； 立法， 法律的制定
detailed_translations.english: a law or set of laws

name: clause
trans: 条款； 从句， 分句

sentences.english: A confidentiality clause was added to the contract.
sentences.chinese: 合同中加上了一项保密条款。

detailed_translations.chinese: 条款； 从句， 分句
detailed_translations.english: a part of a written law or legal document covering a particular subject of the whole law or document

name: quiz
trans: 智力竞赛，问答比赛；小测验

sentences.english: a love quiz in a magazine
sentences.chinese: 杂志上的爱情问答

sentences.english: a general knowledge quiz
sentences.chinese: 常识问答竞赛

detailed_translations.chinese: 智力竞赛，问答比赛；小测验
detailed_translations.english: a competition or game in which people have to answer questions
to ask someone a lot of questions

name: participate
trans: 参与， 参加； 分享

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.chinese: 参与， 参加； 分享
detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

name: ingredient
trans: 组成部分， 成分； 原料； 要素， 因素

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 组成部分， 成分； 原料； 要素， 因素
detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

sentences.english: Ethiopia has no surplus food.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

detailed_translations.english: more than what is needed or used
an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used

name: correspondence
trans: 信件， 函件； 通信， 通信联系； 符合， 一致， 相似

sentences.english: A secretary came in twice a week to deal with his correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 一个秘书每个星期来两次处理他的信件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 信件， 函件； 通信， 通信联系； 符合， 一致， 相似
detailed_translations.english: the letters that someone sends and receives, especially official or business letters

name: refresh
trans: 振作精神， 恢复活力

sentences.english: A shower will refresh you.
sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 振作精神， 恢复活力
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

sentences.english: The new librarian is a friend of mine.
sentences.chinese: 这位新来的图书管理员是我的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in a library

sentences.english: an intimate friend of Picasso’s
sentences.chinese: 毕加索的一个密友

sentences.english: an intimate relationship
sentences.chinese: 亲密的关系

sentences.english: She’s on intimate terms with people in government.
sentences.chinese: 她与政府官员关系密切。

detailed_translations.english: having an extremely close friendship
a close personal friend
to make people understand what you mean without saying it directly

sentences.english: a news reporter
sentences.chinese: 新闻记者

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to write about news events for a newspaper, or to tell people about them on television or on the radio

name: declaration
trans: 宣布， 宣告； 宣言， 声明； 申报

sentences.english: a ceasefire declaration
sentences.chinese: 停火声明

sentences.english: Under Islamic law it was possible to divorce by simple declaration.
sentences.chinese: 从前按照伊斯兰法律，作简单的声明就可以离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣布， 宣告； 宣言， 声明； 申报
detailed_translations.english: an important official statement about a particular situation or plan, or the act of making this statement

sentences.english: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information .
sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.english: He refused to disclose the identity of the politician.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

detailed_translations.english: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret

sentences.english: The U.S. Constitution promises freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: a course on philosophy and religion
sentences.chinese: 关于哲学和宗教的课程

detailed_translations.english: a belief in one or more gods

name: diagram
trans: 图解， 图表， 简图

sentences.english: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 图表， 简图
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

sentences.english: The wolf clawed at the tree and howled the whole night.
sentences.chinese: 那只狼在那颗树上抓挠，还嗥叫了整整一个晚上。

detailed_translations.english: to tear or pull at something, using claws or your fingers
a sharp curved nail on an animal, bird, or some insects

sentences.english: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
sentences.chinese: 遭受了五天的严刑拷打之后，他死了。

detailed_translations.english: an act of deliberately hurting someone in order to force them to tell you something, to punish them, or to be cruel
to deliberately hurt someone in order to force them to give you information, to punish them, or to be cruel

name: prayer
trans: 祷告， 祈祷； 祷文； 祈求， 祈望

sentences.english: Our thoughts and prayers are with you at this difficult time.
sentences.chinese: 在这艰难时期我们时刻思念你，为你祈祷。

sentences.english: The children said their prayers and got into bed.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们做完祷告后上床睡觉了。

sentences.english: God has answered your prayer .
sentences.chinese: 上帝应许了你的祷告。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祷告， 祈祷； 祷文； 祈求， 祈望
detailed_translations.english: words that you say when praying to God or gods

name: tragedy
trans: 悲剧， 惨事， 惨案； 悲剧艺术

sentences.english: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 悲剧， 惨事， 惨案； 悲剧艺术
detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

name: charm
trans: 迷人的特性，魅力；符咒，咒文

sentences.english: "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs," the 1937 Disney classic, has lost none of its original charm.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼1937年的经典之作《白雪公主和七个小矮人》从未丧失其最初的魅力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的特性，魅力；符咒，咒文
detailed_translations.english: Charm is the quality of being pleasant or attractive
to attract someone and make them like you, sometimes in order to make them do something for you

sentences.english: Narouz clapped his hands and a servant entered.
sentences.chinese: 纳鲁兹拍了拍手，一名佣人走了进来。

sentences.english: Mandy laughed and clapped her hands in delight.
sentences.chinese: 曼迪笑了，高兴得拍起手来。

detailed_translations.english: if you clap your hands, you hit your hands together a few times to attract someone’s attention or to show that you are pleased
the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

sentences.english: His face turned purple with rage.
sentences.chinese: 他气得脸色发紫。

detailed_translations.english: having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue

name: quit
trans: 停止， 放弃； 离开， 辞

sentences.english: The landlord gave them notice to quit the premises within seven days.
sentences.chinese: 房东通知他们七天之内搬出去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 停止， 放弃； 离开， 辞
detailed_translations.english: to leave a house or apartment that you have been renting

sentences.english: A small car is more economical to run.
sentences.chinese: 开小型汽车比较省油。

sentences.english: good-quality clothes at economical prices
sentences.chinese: 物美价廉的衣服

detailed_translations.english: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any

sentences.english: a prosperous landowner
sentences.chinese: 富裕的土地拥有者

detailed_translations.english: rich and successful

sentences.english: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

detailed_translations.english: to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny

sentences.english: a cabinet meeting
sentences.chinese: 内阁会议

sentences.english: a member of the Cabinet
sentences.chinese: 内阁成员

detailed_translations.english: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

name: chart
trans: 用图表表示， 在图上表示

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: optical
trans: 眼的， 光学的， 视觉的

sentences.english: microscopes and other optical instruments
sentences.chinese: 显微镜和其他光学仪器

detailed_translations.chinese: 眼的， 光学的， 视觉的
detailed_translations.english: relating to machines or processes which are concerned with light, images, or the way we see things

name: fashion
trans: 样子， 方式； 时尚； 流行款式

sentences.english: Young people are very concerned with fashion
sentences.chinese: 年轻人很关注时尚。

sentences.english: Hats like that just aren’t the fashion.
sentences.chinese: 那样的帽子不流行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 样子， 方式； 时尚； 流行款式
detailed_translations.english: a style of clothes, hair etc that is popular at a particular time

sentences.english: Your father took out insurance to cover the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them money, especially regularly, and they pay the costs if something bad happens, for example if you become ill or your car is damaged

name: preface
trans: 序言， 前言， 引言

sentences.english: ...the preface to Kelman's novel.
sentences.chinese: …凯尔曼小说的前言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 序言， 前言， 引言
detailed_translations.english: an introduction at the beginning of a book or speech

name: principle
trans: 原则， 原理， 道义； 基本信念， 信条

sentences.english: The general principle is that education should be available to all children up to the age of 16.
sentences.chinese: 总的原则是，16 岁以下儿童都应该能接受教育。

sentences.english: He called for a return to first principles (= the most important ideas ) of road safety for children.
sentences.chinese: 他呼吁回归儿童道路安全的根本原则。

sentences.english: Similar principles apply in the case of older children (= the principles are the same as others that have been mentioned ) .
sentences.chinese: 类似的原则也适用于年纪大些的儿童。

detailed_translations.chinese: 原则， 原理， 道义； 基本信念， 信条
detailed_translations.english: the basic idea that a plan or system is based on

sentences.english: She lifted the lid of the box and displayed the contents.
sentences.chinese: 她把盒盖掀起，展示了里边的东西。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for the open part of a pot, box, or other container

name: tedious
trans: 冗长乏味的， 沉闷的

sentences.english: The work was tiring and tedious.
sentences.chinese: 这工作既累人又枯燥。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冗长乏味的， 沉闷的
detailed_translations.english: something that is tedious continues for a long time and is not interesting

name: source
trans: 河的源头， 根源； 来源， 出处

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 河的源头， 根源； 来源， 出处
detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

name: secure
trans: 安全的，可靠的；牢固的，稳固的；无忧虑的，安心的
得到， 获得； 使安全， 保卫； 缚牢

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安全的，可靠的；牢固的，稳固的；无忧虑的，安心的
detailed_translations.english: a situation that is secure is one that you can depend on because it is not likely to change

detailed_translations.chinese: 得到， 获得； 使安全， 保卫； 缚牢
detailed_translations.english: to get or achieve something that will be permanent, especially after a lot of effort

name: domestic
trans: 本国的； 家庭的； 驯养的

sentences.english: Unfortunately his domestic life wasn’t very happy.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，他的家庭生活并不幸福。

detailed_translations.chinese: 本国的； 家庭的； 驯养的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

name: deception
trans: 欺骗； 诡计， 骗局

sentences.english: She didn’t have the courage to admit to her deception.
sentences.chinese: 她没有勇气承认自己的欺骗行为。

sentences.english: He was convicted of obtaining money by deception .
sentences.chinese: 他被判犯有诈骗钱财罪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欺骗； 诡计， 骗局
detailed_translations.english: the act of deliberately making someone believe something that is not true

name: basically
trans: 基本上， 从根本上说

sentences.english: Basically, I’m just lazy.
sentences.chinese: 说穿了，我就是懒。

sentences.english: Well, basically, it’s a matter of filling in a few forms.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，其实也就是填几张表的事。

sentences.english: I used to see him every night, basically.
sentences.chinese: 基本上，我以前每天晚上都见他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基本上， 从根本上说
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize the most important reason or fact about something, or a simple explanation of something

name: donation
trans: 捐款， 捐赠物； 捐赠， 赠送

sentences.english: There have been generous donations from EU funds.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟基金给予了慷慨的捐款。

detailed_translations.chinese: 捐款， 捐赠物； 捐赠， 赠送
detailed_translations.english: something, especially money, that you give to a person or an organ-ization in order to help them

name: avenue
trans: 林荫道， 道路， 大街

sentences.english: Fifth Avenue
sentences.chinese: 第五大街

sentences.english: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.chinese: 沙夫茨伯里街

detailed_translations.chinese: 林荫道， 道路， 大街
detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

sentences.english: People who travel by rail still read an immense amount.
sentences.chinese: 人们坐火车旅行时仍然会读很多书。

sentences.english: Regular visits from a social worker can be of immense value to old people living alone.
sentences.chinese: 对于独居老人来说，社工的经常探望很重要。

detailed_translations.english: extremely large

name: budget
trans: 低廉的， 收费公道的

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

name: given
trans: 规定的，特定的；假设的；已知的；有癖好的，有倾向的

sentences.english: On any given day in the Houston area, half the hospital beds are empty.
sentences.chinese: 在休斯敦地区，任何一天医院的床位都有一半是空的。

sentences.english: The rules are to be followed in any given situation.
sentences.chinese: 这些规则在任何情况下都要遵守。

detailed_translations.chinese: 规定的，特定的；假设的；已知的；有癖好的，有倾向的
detailed_translations.english: any particular time, situation, amount etc that is being used as an example
taking something into account

sentences.english: ...bales of hay.
sentences.chinese: …一捆捆的干草。

detailed_translations.english: long grass that has been cut and dried, used as food for cattle

name: chest
trans: 胸腔， 胸膛； 箱子

sentences.english: Her heart was pounding in her chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的心在胸口怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: a hairy chest
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的胸部

detailed_translations.chinese: 胸腔， 胸膛； 箱子
detailed_translations.english: the front part of your body between your neck and your stomach

name: tension
trans: 紧张， 不安； 拉紧； 张力， 拉力

sentences.english: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧张， 不安； 拉紧； 张力， 拉力
detailed_translations.english: the feeling that exists when people or countries do not trust each other and may suddenly attack each other or start arguing

sentences.english: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
sentences.chinese: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.english: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要记录足够的数据，才能得出明确的结论。

sentences.english: He’d shown definite signs of resigning himself to the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他明显表现出安于这种状况的样子。

detailed_translations.english: clearly known, seen, or stated

name: reflection
trans: 映像， 倒影； 反射； 反映， 表达； 非议； 沉思， 反省

sentences.english: Can you see your reflection in the glass?
sentences.chinese: 你能看到玻璃里你的影像吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 映像， 倒影； 反射； 反映， 表达； 非议； 沉思， 反省
detailed_translations.english: an image that you can see in a mirror, glass, or water

sentences.english: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
sentences.chinese: 试验的最后结果无法预测。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future

sentences.english: a beautiful campus in New England
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰的一个美丽校园

detailed_translations.english: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

sentences.english: You need to see a solicitor.
sentences.chinese: 你需要找个律师。

sentences.english: a small firm of solicitors
sentences.chinese: 一家小型律师事务所

detailed_translations.english: a type of lawyer in Britain who gives legal advice, prepares the necessary documents when property is bought or sold, and defends people, especially in the lower courts of law

name: cheerful
trans: 快乐的， 愉快的； 使人感到愉快的

sentences.english: a bright cheerful Italian restaurant
sentences.chinese: 一家明亮宜人的意大利餐馆

sentences.english: There was a cheerful picture on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 墙上有一张赏心悦目的画。

sentences.english: The house has a cheerful atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子有一种令人愉快的气氛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快乐的， 愉快的； 使人感到愉快的
detailed_translations.english: something that is cheerful makes you feel happy because it is so bright or pleasant

name: merit
trans: 长处，优点，价值；功劳，成绩

sentences.english: The merit of the report is its realistic assessment of the changes required.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告的优点就是它对所要求的变动进行了实事求是的评估。

sentences.english: The great merit of the project is its flexibility and low cost.
sentences.chinese: 该项目最大的优点是它的灵活性和低成本。

sentences.english: Each of these approaches to teaching has its merits .
sentences.chinese: 这些教学方法每一种都有其优点。

sentences.english: Tonight’s meeting will weigh up the relative merits of the two candidates.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的会议将对两位候选人的相对优点进行考量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 长处，优点，价值；功劳，成绩
detailed_translations.english: an advantage or good feature of something
to be good, important, or serious enough for praise or attention

sentences.english: Rachel, you must have misunderstood her! Ellie would never say something like that.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔，你一定是误会她了！埃莉绝不会说那样的话。

sentences.english: Don’t misunderstand me. She’s a very nice person when you get to know her.
sentences.chinese: 不要误解我的意思。你了解她后就会知道她是个很好的人。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to understand someone or something correctly

sentences.english: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.english: It was his guilty conscience that made him offer to help.
sentences.chinese: 他是因为良心上过意不去才提出帮忙的。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong

name: measure
trans: 分量； 尺寸； 量具； 计量单位； 量度， 测量； 措施， 办法

sentences.english: The rainfall was measured over a three-month period.
sentences.chinese: 对三个月内的降雨量进行了测量。

detailed_translations.english: to find the size, length, or amount of something, using standard units such as  inch es  ,metres etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 分量； 尺寸； 量具； 计量单位； 量度， 测量； 措施， 办法
detailed_translations.english: an action, especially an official one, that is intended to deal with a particular problem

name: overall
trans: 全面的， 总体的， 全部的

sentences.english: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.english: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.english: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全面的， 总体的， 全部的
detailed_translations.english: considering or including everything

name: receipt
trans: 发票， 收据； 收入， 进款； 收到， 接到

sentences.english: Keep your receipt in case you want to bring it back.
sentences.chinese: 保留收据以备退货之需。

sentences.english: Can you give me a receipt?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我一个收条吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 发票， 收据； 收入， 进款； 收到， 接到
detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that you are given which shows that you have paid for something

name: assume
trans: 假定， 假设， 臆断； 承担， 担任； 呈现

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。

sentences.english: When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
sentences.chinese: 到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假定， 假设， 臆断； 承担， 担任； 呈现
detailed_translations.english: to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof

sentences.english: salt and pepper
sentences.chinese: 盐和胡椒粉

detailed_translations.english: a powder that is used to add a hot taste to food
if something is peppered with things, it has a lot of those things in it or on it

sentences.english: "Data" is the Latin plural form of "datum."
sentences.chinese: “”是“”的拉丁语复数形式。

detailed_translations.english: a plural word or form shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘we’ is a plural  pronoun  .
a form of a word that shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘dogs’ is the plural of ‘dog’

sentences.english: a doctoral thesis
sentences.chinese: 博士论文

detailed_translations.english: done as part of work for the university degree of doctor

name: concept
trans: 概念， 观念， 设想

sentences.english: a new concept in business travel
sentences.chinese: 商务旅行的新理念

sentences.english: our basic concepts of decent human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 我们对得体的人类行为的基本观念

sentences.english: It’s very simple, once you grasp the concept .
sentences.chinese: 你一旦掌握了这个概念之后就很简单了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念， 设想
detailed_translations.english: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

name: resistant
trans: 抵抗的， 抗…的， 耐…的

sentences.english: Some people are very resistant to the idea of exercise.
sentences.chinese: 一些人对锻炼的主意非常抵制。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抵抗的， 抗…的， 耐…的
detailed_translations.english: not damaged or affected by something

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.chinese: 学说外语要下功夫。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental energy that is needed to do something

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

name: disaster
trans: 灾难， 灾祸， 天灾； 彻底的失败

sentences.english: One hundred and twenty people died in China’s worst air disaster .
sentences.chinese: 有120人在中国这起最惨烈的空难事故中丧生。

sentences.english: the economic consequences of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster
sentences.chinese: 切尔诺贝利核灾难给经济带来的后果

sentences.english: The 1987 hurricane was the worst natural disaster to hit England for decades.
sentences.chinese: 1987年的飓风是英格兰数十年来遭遇的最为严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Their expedition nearly ended in disaster , when one of the climbers slid off the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一名登山者从山上滑落，他们的探险活动险些以灾难告终。

sentences.english: The drought could spell disaster for wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 干旱可能会对野生生物造成灾难。

sentences.english: Disaster struckwhen two men were killed during their parachute jumps.
sentences.chinese: 灾难突然降临，两名男子在跳伞过程中丧生。

sentences.english: The peace process was on the brink of disaster .
sentences.chinese: 和平进程到了灾难的边缘。

sentences.english: Luckily the pilot saw the other plane just in time, and a disaster was narrowly averted .
sentences.chinese: 幸好驾驶员及时看到了另一架飞机，侥幸避免了一场灾难。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灾难， 灾祸， 天灾； 彻底的失败
detailed_translations.english: a sudden event such as a flood, storm, or accident which causes great damage or suffering

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

sentences.english: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

detailed_translations.english: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun

sentences.english: The grocer deals in tea, coffee, spices and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 该杂货店经销茶叶、咖啡、佐料等商品。

sentences.english: The grocer sells wine and spirits.
sentences.chinese: 这位食品商出售葡萄酒和烈性酒。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells food and other things used in the home

sentences.english: She sat there staring into space (= looking for a long time at nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那里，出神地凝视前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something or someone for a long time without moving your eyes, for example because you are surprised, angry, or bored

name: painful
trans: 疼痛的， 引起疼痛的； 困难的； 令人不快的

sentences.english: stiff painful joints
sentences.chinese: 僵硬疼痛的关节

sentences.english: Is your arm very painful?
sentences.chinese: 你的手臂很疼吗？

sentences.english: The neck becomes swollen and painful to the touch (= hurts when you touch it ) .
sentences.chinese: 脖子肿起来了，一碰就疼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 疼痛的， 引起疼痛的； 困难的； 令人不快的
detailed_translations.english: if a part of your body is painful, it hurts

name: vote
trans: 票，选票；选举，投票，表决；表决结果，投票总数

sentences.english: In 1918 British women got the right to vote.
sentences.chinese: 1918年，英国妇女获得了选举权。

detailed_translations.english: to show which person or party you want, or whether you support a plan, by marking a piece of paper, raising your hand etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 票，选票；选举，投票，表决；表决结果，投票总数
detailed_translations.english: an act of voting in an elec­tion or meeting, or the choice that you make when you vote

name: steady
trans: 稳的，平稳的；稳定的，持续的；稳固的

sentences.english: The plane steadied, and the passengers relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机平稳后，乘客们松了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: to hold someone or something so they become more balanced or controlled, or to become more balanced or controlled

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳的，平稳的；稳定的，持续的；稳固的
detailed_translations.english: continuing or developing gradually or without stopping, and not likely to change

name: enhance
trans: 提高， 增加， 加强

sentences.english: Good lighting will enhance any room.
sentences.chinese: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.english: The publicity has enhanced his reputation.
sentences.chinese: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提高， 增加， 加强
detailed_translations.english: to improve something

name: enclose
trans: 围住， 圈起； 附上； 把…装入信封

sentences.english: Please enclose a cheque with your order.
sentences.chinese: 请随订单附上支票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 围住， 圈起； 附上； 把…装入信封
detailed_translations.english: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter

name: convention
trans: 习俗， 惯例； 公约； 会议

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

detailed_translations.chinese: 习俗， 惯例； 公约； 会议
detailed_translations.english: a formal agreement, especially between countries, about particular rules or behaviour

name: disease
trans: 病， 疾病； 不健全； 弊端

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全； 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

name: center
trans: 圆心， 正中； 中心

sentences.english: In this example, you rotate a square on its center, but do not fill the square.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，您会以中心为原点旋转一个正方形，但不填充这个正方形。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圆心， 正中； 中心

name: suspicion
trans: 怀疑， 疑心， 猜疑； 一点儿， 少量

sentences.english: I can’t say for definite who did it, but I certainly have my suspicions .
sentences.chinese: 我不能确切说是谁干的，但我肯定有怀疑的对象。

sentences.english: Police suspicions were confirmed when the stolen property was found in his flat.
sentences.chinese: 失窃物品在他公寓里找到，警方的怀疑得到了证实。

sentences.english: I wondered how I could leave early without arousing anyone’s suspicions .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道怎么才能早点离开而又不引起别人的怀疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀疑， 疑心， 猜疑； 一点儿， 少量
detailed_translations.english: a feeling you have that someone is probably guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

sentences.english: the growing demand to purchase goods on credit
sentences.chinese: 不断增长的赊账购物的需求

sentences.english: Where did you purchase the car?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里买的车？

detailed_translations.english: to buy something
something you buy, or the act of buying it

sentences.english: Her country suffered through her refusal to accept change.
sentences.chinese: 她的国家因为她拒绝接受变革而受了害。

detailed_translations.english: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something

sentences.english: a laboratory technician
sentences.chinese: 实验室技术人员

sentences.english: a hospital technician
sentences.chinese: 医院技术人员

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to check equipment or machines and make sure that they are working properly

name: generic
trans: 【生物】 属的， 类的； 一般的， 普通的

sentences.english: Parmesan is a generic term used to describe a family of hard Italian cheeses.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔马干酪是一个用来描述一类坚硬的意大利奶酪的通用名称。

detailed_translations.chinese: 【生物】 属的， 类的； 一般的， 普通的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a whole group of things rather than to one thing

name: genius
trans: 天才， 天赋， 天资； 天才人物

sentences.english: The film reveals Fellini’s genius.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片展现了费里尼的天赋。

sentences.english: a work of pure genius
sentences.chinese: 天才之作

detailed_translations.chinese: 天才， 天赋， 天资； 天才人物
detailed_translations.english: a very high level of intelligence, mental skill, or ability, which only a few people have

name: alike
trans: 一样地， 相似地； 同样程度地

sentences.english: The twins were dressed alike.
sentences.chinese: 这对双胞胎穿着相似。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一样地， 相似地； 同样程度地
detailed_translations.english: in a similar way
very similar

sentences.english: The fund was set up to try to save the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 设立基金以挽救大教堂。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is collected and kept for a particular purpose
to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc

name: gravity
trans: 重力， 引力； 严重性； 严肃， 庄重

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

detailed_translations.chinese: 重力， 引力； 严重性； 严肃， 庄重
detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

name: quotation
trans: 引文， 引语， 语录； 报价， 牌价， 行情

sentences.english: The following quotation is taken from a nineteenth century travel diary.
sentences.chinese: 下文引自19世纪的一篇旅行日记。

sentences.english: a dictionary of quotations
sentences.chinese: 引语词典，语录汇编

detailed_translations.chinese: 引文， 引语， 语录； 报价， 牌价， 行情
detailed_translations.english: a sentence or phrase from a book, speech etc which you repeat in a speech or piece of writing because it is interesting or amusing

name: finance
trans: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况

sentences.english: The concerts are financed by the Arts Council.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会由艺术协会出资举办。

detailed_translations.english: to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc

name: studio
trans: 画室， 摄影室； 播音室， 录音室， 摄影棚

sentences.english: a TV studio
sentences.chinese: 电视演播室

sentences.english: a recording studio in Nashville
sentences.chinese: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

detailed_translations.chinese: 画室， 摄影室； 播音室， 录音室， 摄影棚
detailed_translations.english: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded

sentences.english: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
sentences.chinese: 服务员用托盘端来饮料。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc

sentences.english: Benedict pointed downward again with his stick.
sentences.chinese: 贝内迪克特又用他的拐杖向下指了指。

detailed_translations.english: If you move or look downward, you move or look toward the ground or a lower level
moving or pointing towards a lower position

sentences.english: I like peas more than cabbage .
sentences.chinese: 比起卷心菜我更喜欢豌豆。

sentences.english: We have cabbage and mutton.
sentences.chinese: 我们有卷心菜和羊肉。

sentences.english: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves

name: regulate
trans: 管理， 控制； 调整， 调节

sentences.english: strict rules regulating the use of chemicals in food
sentences.chinese: 限制化学品在食物中使用的严格规定

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理， 控制； 调整， 调节
detailed_translations.english: to control an activity or process, especially by rules

name: palm
trans: 手掌， 掌状物； 棕榈树

sentences.english: He held the pebble in the palm of his hand .
sentences.chinese: 他把那颗卵石握在手心里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 手掌， 掌状物； 棕榈树
detailed_translations.english: the inside surface of your hand, in which you hold things

sentences.english: At the South Pole, in a region of continuous darkness, humans could access water to produce hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 月球南极是一个持续黑暗的区域，在这里，人类能够接触到水，以生产氢和氧。

sentences.english: So what we can actually directly compare is the dissociation energy or the bond strength of nitrogen versus hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 因此实际上我们可以直接进行比较，对氮分子与氢分子的离解能，或键的强度。

sentences.english: All of these from the group one and two through the group five and six elements, but what about elements, what about molecules like hydrogen, or nitrogen, or maybe oxygen?
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是来自于第一主族和第二组主族，到第五主族和第六组主族的悬殊，那么元素呢，比如氢气，氮气或氧气那样的分子呢？

detailed_translations.english: Hydrogen is a colourless gas that is the lightest and commonest element in the universe

sentences.english: infant formula milk
sentences.chinese: 婴(幼)儿配方奶

detailed_translations.english: intended for babies or very young children
a baby or very young child

sentences.english: She does not like the hen that pecks all day.
sentences.chinese: 她不喜欢这个整天啄来啄去的母鸡。

sentences.english: A little red hen once found a grain of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 一次，一只红色的小母鸡找到了一粒小麦。

sentences.english: What Jones and her colleagues wanted to learn is whether a happy hen in fact produces a better product.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯和她的同事们希望弄明白，是否一只幸福的母鸡确实产出更好的产品。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

name: whoever
trans: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁

sentences.english: I’ll take whoever wants to go.
sentences.chinese: 谁想去我就带谁去。

sentences.english: When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
sentences.chinese: 你看完书以后，就给克里斯廷或谢利，或者随便谁都行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁
detailed_translations.english: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc

sentences.english: They degrade into carbon and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 他们能被降解成碳和氧。

sentences.english: All by itself, this shift lowers the carbon intensity of an economy.
sentences.chinese: 单是这种变迁本身，就会降低一个经济体的碳强度。

sentences.english: I dread to think what the carbon footprint must be like of moving that coal but we have no choice.
sentences.chinese: 我都不敢想象为了运这些煤产生了多少碳足迹，但我们没有选择。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists in a pure form as diamonds,  graphite  etc, or in an impure form as coal, petrol etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol C

name: unload
trans: 卸， 卸货； 下客； 退出子弹； 卸下胶卷

sentences.english: Unload everything from the boat and clean it thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 从小船上卸下所有的货物并彻底地清洗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 卸， 卸货； 下客； 退出子弹； 卸下胶卷
detailed_translations.english: to remove the film from a camera

sentences.english: You can make a payment in any bank.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在任何一家银行付款。

sentences.english: They fell behind on their mortgage payments.
sentences.chinese: 他们未按期支付按揭还款。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that has been or must be paid

name: specifically
trans: 特别地， 特定地； 明确地， 具体地

sentences.english: advertising that specifically targets children
sentences.chinese: 专门针对儿童的广告

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别地， 特定地； 明确地， 具体地
detailed_translations.english: relating to or intended for one particular type of person or thing only

name: controversial
trans: 引起争论的， 有争议的

sentences.english: the controversial issue of welfare reform
sentences.chinese: 福利改革这一有争议的话题

sentences.english: a highly controversial (= very controversial ) plan to flood the valley in order to build a dam
sentences.chinese: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

sentences.english: He is a controversial figure (= person who does controversial things ) in the art world.
sentences.chinese: 他是艺术界极具争议的人物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引起争论的， 有争议的
detailed_translations.english: causing a lot of disagreement, because many people have strong opinions about the subject being discussed

name: attain
trans: 达到， 获得， 完成

sentences.english: More women are attaining positions of power.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的女性获得要职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 达到， 获得， 完成
detailed_translations.english: to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time

name: trap
trans: 陷阱，捕捉器；圈套，诡计；困境

sentences.english: The only way to catch mice is to set a trap .
sentences.chinese: 抓老鼠的唯一办法就是放置捕鼠器。

sentences.english: He stepped into a bear trap covered in snow.
sentences.chinese: 他踩到了埋在雪里的一个捕熊夹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陷阱，捕捉器；圈套，诡计；困境
detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment for catching animals
to catch an animal or bird using a trap

name: gallery
trans: 画廊， 美术馆； 楼座； 旁听席； 回廊， 走廊

sentences.english: an exhibition of African art at the Hayward Gallery
sentences.chinese: 海沃德美术馆的非洲艺术展览

detailed_translations.chinese: 画廊， 美术馆； 楼座； 旁听席； 回廊， 走廊
detailed_translations.english: a large building where people can see famous pieces of art

sentences.english: ...a shop from which an uncle had sold hardware and timber.
sentences.chinese: …一家叔叔曾经在那里卖五金器具和木材的店铺。

detailed_translations.english: computer machinery and equipment, as opposed to the programs that make computers work

name: deputy
trans: 副职， 副手； 代表， 代理人

sentences.english: ...Jack Lang, France's minister for culture, and his deputy, Catherine Tasca.
sentences.chinese: …法国文化部长杰克·朗和他的副手凯瑟琳·塔斯卡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 副职， 副手； 代表， 代理人
detailed_translations.english: someone who is directly below another person in rank, and who is officially in charge when that person is not there

name: warmth
trans: 暖和， 温暖； 热烈， 热情， 热心

sentences.english: She went further into the room, drawn by the warmth of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她被火的温暖吸引着，走进了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 暖和， 温暖； 热烈， 热情， 热心
detailed_translations.english: the heat something produces, or when you feel warm

name: supreme
trans: 最高的， 最大的； 极度的， 最重要的

sentences.english: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的， 最大的； 极度的， 最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

sentences.english: the ambulance service
sentences.chinese: 救护车服务

sentences.english: the ambulance service
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我们需要叫救护车吗？

detailed_translations.english: a special vehicle that is used to take people who are ill or injured to hospital

name: priority
trans: 优先， 重点； 优先考虑的事

sentences.english: I want to start work on the garden but the house must take priority .
sentences.chinese: 我想开始整修花园，不过还是先得打扫屋子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优先， 重点； 优先考虑的事
detailed_translations.english: the right to be given attention first and before other people or things

sentences.english: The bank sloped down sharply to the river.
sentences.chinese: 那座堤岸陡峭地朝着那条河倾斜下去。

detailed_translations.english: if the ground or a surface slopes, it is higher at one end than the other
a piece of ground or a surface that slopes

name: philosophy
trans: 哲学， 哲理， 人生哲学

sentences.english: Emma studies philosophy at university.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 哲学， 哲理， 人生哲学
detailed_translations.english: the study of the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil, etc

sentences.english: preventive health programs
sentences.chinese: 预防性的保健计划

detailed_translations.english: intended to stop something you do not want to happen, such as illness, from happening

sentences.english: This job is so boring. I wish I could do something more creative.
sentences.chinese: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.english: I teach creative writing at Trinity College.
sentences.chinese: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.english: the creative process of writing a poem
sentences.chinese: 写诗的创作过程

sentences.english: Diaghilev did his great creative work in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄亚格列夫在法国编创了富有创新性的伟大作品。

sentences.english: a creative solution to the problem
sentences.chinese: 这一问题的创新性解决方法

detailed_translations.english: involving the use of imagination to produce new ideas or things

sentences.english: the junior football club
sentences.chinese: 青少年足球俱乐部

detailed_translations.english: relating to sport for young people below a particular age
a child who goes to a junior school

name: allocate
trans: 分配， 分派， 把…拨给

sentences.english: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.chinese: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分配， 分派， 把…拨给
detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made

sentences.english: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有茶水和饼干供应。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

sentences.english: a discussion of marriage from the standpoint of women
sentences.chinese: 从女性角度对婚姻的探讨

detailed_translations.english: a way of thinking about people, situations, ideas etc

sentences.english: ...the worship of the ancient Roman gods.
sentences.chinese: …对古罗马众神的敬奉。

detailed_translations.english: Worship is also a noun
to admire and love someone very much

name: lawn
trans: 草地， 草坪， 草场

sentences.english: I spent all morning mowing the lawn (= cutting the grass ).
sentences.chinese: 我整个上午都在修剪草坪。

sentences.english: a carefully tended lawn
sentences.chinese: 受到细心呵护的草坪

detailed_translations.chinese: 草地， 草坪， 草场
detailed_translations.english: an area of ground in a garden or park that is covered with short grass

name: primary
trans: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的

sentences.english: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.english: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 人身安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的
detailed_translations.english: most important

sentences.english: a roaring log fire
sentences.chinese: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

detailed_translations.english: a thick piece of wood from a tree
to make an official record of events, facts etc

name: solar
trans: 太阳的， 日光的； 太阳能的

sentences.english: a solar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 日食

detailed_translations.chinese: 太阳的， 日光的； 太阳能的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the sun

name: consume
trans: 消费， 吃完， 喝光； 毁灭； 使着迷， 充满

sentences.english: Only 27% of the paper we consume is recycled.
sentences.chinese: 我们消耗的纸张只有 27% 得到回收利用。

sentences.english: A smaller vehicle will consume less fuel.
sentences.chinese: 汽车小耗费燃料也少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 消费， 吃完， 喝光； 毁灭； 使着迷， 充满
detailed_translations.english: to use time, energy, goods etc

name: formation
trans: 形成， 构成， 形成物； 队形， 排列

sentences.english: We now know a lot more about the early stages of planetary formation.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在对行星形成过程的早期阶段有了更多的了解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成， 构成， 形成物； 队形， 排列
detailed_translations.english: the process of starting a new organization or group

sentences.english: He pulled off layer upon layer of clothing (= many layers of clothing ).
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服一件件地脱掉。

detailed_translations.english: an amount or piece of a material or substance that covers a surface or that is between two other things

sentences.english: a triangle of land
sentences.chinese: 一块三角地

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

sentences.english: an accidental discharge of toxic waste
sentences.chinese: 有毒废料的意外排放

sentences.english: Buy an insurance policy that covers accidental damage .
sentences.chinese: 购买一份意外损害保单。

detailed_translations.english: happening without being planned or intended

name: assure
trans: 使确信； 确保， 向…保证

sentences.english: The document is genuine, I can assure you .
sentences.chinese: 我能向你保证，这文件是真的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使确信； 确保， 向…保证
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried

name: consult
trans: 请教； 查阅； 商议

sentences.english: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.
sentences.chinese: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 请教； 查阅； 商议
detailed_translations.english: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Nature is a recurrent theme (= a theme that appears repeatedly ) in Frost’s poetry.
sentences.chinese: 大自然是弗罗斯特诗作中反复出现的一个主题。

sentences.english: Most of Kurt’s other pictures were variations on the same theme .
sentences.chinese: 库尔特的其他大部分画作都是同一主题的变奏。

detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

name: smash
trans: 粉碎，打烂；狠打，猛击；破灭，失败；猛撞，猛冲
破碎 ； 猛击， 猛撞； 轰动的演出， 巨大的成功

sentences.english: Vandals had smashed all the windows.
sentences.chinese: 破坏分子打碎了所有的窗子。

sentences.english: Firemen had to smash the lock to get in.
sentences.chinese: 消防员不得不砸锁而入。

sentences.english: Several cups fell to the floor and smashed to pieces .
sentences.chinese: 有几个杯子掉到地上摔得粉碎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉碎，打烂；狠打，猛击；破灭，失败；猛撞，猛冲
detailed_translations.english: to break into pieces violently or noisily, or to make something do this by dropping, throwing, or hitting it

detailed_translations.chinese: 破碎 ； 猛击， 猛撞； 轰动的演出， 巨大的成功
detailed_translations.english: the loud sound of something breaking

sentences.english: He’s merely a boy – you can’t expect him to understand.
sentences.chinese: 他只是个孩子——你不要指望他能理解。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how small or unimportant something or someone is

name: contradiction
trans: 矛盾， 不一致； 否认， 反驳

sentences.english: apparent contradictions in the defendant’s testimony
sentences.chinese: 被告证词中的明显矛盾

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾， 不一致； 否认， 反驳
detailed_translations.english: a difference between two statements, beliefs, or ideas about something that means they cannot both be true

name: fuss
trans: 忙乱； 大惊小怪， 小题大做； 烦恼， 过于忧虑

sentences.english: James said he’d better be getting back or there’d be a fuss .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯说他最好回来，否则就会有人小题大做了。

sentences.english: The Steamatic enables you to clean any carpet with the minimum of fuss .
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽清洁器可以让你轻轻松松地清洁地毯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忙乱； 大惊小怪， 小题大做； 烦恼， 过于忧虑
detailed_translations.english: anxious behaviour or activity that is usually about unimportant things

name: wealth
trans: 财富， 财产； 丰富

sentences.english: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.chinese: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

detailed_translations.chinese: 财富， 财产； 丰富
detailed_translations.english: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns

name: editor
trans: 编辑， 编者， 校订者

sentences.english: the editor of a book of essays on modern poetry
sentences.chinese: 现代诗歌论文集的编者

detailed_translations.chinese: 编辑， 编者， 校订者
detailed_translations.english: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it

sentences.english: The wine is aged in oak barrels.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

detailed_translations.english: a large curved container with a flat top and bottom, made of wood or metal, and used for storing beer, wine etc

name: means
trans: 方法， 手段， 工具； 金钱， 财产

sentences.english: The only means of communication was sign language.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的交流方法是手语。

sentences.english: The window was our only means of escape .
sentences.chinese: 跳窗是我们唯一的逃生方法。

sentences.english: Do you have any means of identification ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.english: art as a means of expression
sentences.chinese: 作为一种表达方式的艺术

sentences.english: Homework should not be used as a means of controlling children.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业不应该作为约束儿童的手段。

sentences.english: I had no means of telling him I would be late.
sentences.chinese: 我没有办法告诉他我会迟到。

sentences.english: Brian was prepared to use any means to get what he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩准备不择手段地得到他想要的。

sentences.english: They had entered the country by unlawful means .
sentences.chinese: 他们通过非法途径进入了这个国家。

sentences.english: the means by which performance is assessed
sentences.chinese: 评估表现的手段

detailed_translations.chinese: 方法， 手段， 工具； 金钱， 财产
detailed_translations.english: a way of doing or achieving something

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much
a strong hope or wish

name: survive
trans: 从…逃出，幸免于；从中挺过来；比…活得长

sentences.english: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.english: She survived the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.english: people who survive cancer
sentences.chinese: 癌症幸存者

detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…逃出，幸免于；从中挺过来；比…活得长
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

name: efficient
trans: 效率高的； 有能力的

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 效率高的； 有能力的
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

sentences.english: an initial investment of £5,000
sentences.chinese: 5,000英镑的初始投资

sentences.english: The initial response has been encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 最初的反应情况很乐观。

detailed_translations.english: happening at the beginning
the first letter of someone’s first name

sentences.english: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are mentioning a fact that you wish was not true

name: consistent
trans: 坚持的， 一贯的； 一致的， 符合的

sentences.english: She’s the team’s most consistent player.
sentences.chinese: 她是该队中表现最为稳定的选手。

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚持的， 一贯的； 一致的， 符合的
detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

name: reverse
trans: 撤销，推翻；反向，倒转；彻底改变
反向的， 相反的， 倒转的
相反，对立面；反面，背面，后面；挫折，逆境

sentences.english: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.english: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 这种错误的态度会得到恰好相反的结果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 撤销，推翻；反向，倒转；彻底改变
detailed_translations.english: to change something, such as a decision, judgment, or process so that it is the opposite of what it was before

detailed_translations.chinese: 反向的， 相反的， 倒转的
detailed_translations.english: Reverse means opposite from what you expect or to what has just been described

detailed_translations.chinese: 相反，对立面；反面，背面，后面；挫折，逆境
detailed_translations.english: the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned

name: heterogeneity
trans: 异种， 异质， 不同成分

sentences.english: Such political communities are characterized by heterogeneity and difference with no shared object of design.
sentences.chinese: 这样的政治共同体的特征是不会共享别人的设计的异质性和区别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 异种， 异质， 不同成分

sentences.english: The treaty hung like a sword of Damocles over French politics.
sentences.chinese: 这个条约好像一把达摩克利斯之剑悬在法国政坛之上。

detailed_translations.english: a weapon with a long pointed blade and a handle

sentences.english: He gave up a permanent job in order to freelance.
sentences.chinese: 他放弃了固定工作，为的是当一名自由职业者。

sentences.english: a permanent change in your eating habits
sentences.chinese: 饮食习惯的永久改变

sentences.english: The blindness that the disease causes will be permanent.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病引起的失明是永久性的。

sentences.english: Miller soon became a permanent fixture (= someone or something that is always there ) on the team.
sentences.chinese: 米勒很快就成为球队的固定队员。

detailed_translations.english: continuing to exist for a long time or for all the time in the future

name: barely
trans: 仅仅， 只不过， 几乎不

sentences.english: She was barely aware of his presence.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎没有注意到他的存在。

sentences.english: Joe and his brother are barely on speaking terms.
sentences.chinese: 乔和他哥哥几乎不说话。

detailed_translations.chinese: 仅仅， 只不过， 几乎不
detailed_translations.english: almost not

name: summarize
trans: 概括， 概述， 总结

sentences.english: The authors summarize their views in the introduction.
sentences.chinese: 作者在序言里概述了他们的观点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概括， 概述， 总结
detailed_translations.english: to make a short statement giving only the main information and not the details of a plan, event, report etc

name: chap
trans: 小伙子， 男人， 家伙

sentences.english: a decent sort of chap
sentences.chinese: 一个正派的小伙子

detailed_translations.chinese: 小伙子， 男人， 家伙
detailed_translations.english: a man, especially a man you know and like

name: facility
trans: 设备； 容易； 场所

sentences.english: What recreational facilities are now available?
sentences.chinese: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

detailed_translations.chinese: 设备； 容易； 场所
detailed_translations.english: Facilities are buildings, pieces of equipment, or services that are provided for a particular purpose

name: beam
trans: 面露喜色； 定向发出， 播送

sentences.english: ...high-energy laser beams.
sentences.chinese: …高能激光束。

detailed_translations.english: a long heavy piece of wood or metal used in building houses, bridges etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 面露喜色； 定向发出， 播送

sentences.english: independent organizations and alliances
sentences.chinese: 独立组织和联盟

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something

name: civilization
trans: 文明， 文化； 开化

sentences.english: modern American civilization
sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

detailed_translations.chinese: 文明， 文化； 开化
detailed_translations.english: a society that is well organized and developed, used especially about a particular society in a particular place or at a particular time

name: fiction
trans: 小说； 虚构， 杜撰

sentences.english: romantic fiction
sentences.chinese: 爱情小说

sentences.english: historical fiction
sentences.chinese: 历史小说

detailed_translations.chinese: 小说； 虚构， 杜撰
detailed_translations.english: books and stories about imaginary people and events

name: possession
trans: 有， 所有； 所有物

sentences.english: That information is not in our possession.
sentences.chinese: 那则信息不归我们所有。

sentences.english: How did the painting come into your possession (= how did you get it ) ?
sentences.chinese: 这幅画是怎么到你手上的？

sentences.english: The finance company now has possession of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这家金融公司目前拥有这所房子。

sentences.english: We didn’t take possession of (= get and start using ) the car until a few days after the auction.
sentences.chinese: 拍卖会过后几天我们才正式拿到那辆车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有， 所有； 所有物
detailed_translations.english: if something is in your possession, you own it, or you have obtained it from somewhere

name: replace
trans: 代替， 取代； 更换， 调换； 把…放回原处

sentences.english: I’m replacing Sue on the team.
sentences.chinese: 我将接替队里的休。

sentences.english: Lectures have replaced the old tutorial system.
sentences.chinese: 课堂授课取代了旧式的导师制。

detailed_translations.chinese: 代替， 取代； 更换， 调换； 把…放回原处
detailed_translations.english: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

name: appointment
trans: 任命； 约定； 约会； 委任的职位

sentences.english: All consultations are by appointment only .
sentences.chinese: 就诊必须预约。

detailed_translations.chinese: 任命； 约定； 约会； 委任的职位
detailed_translations.english: an arrangement for a meeting at an agreed time and place, for a particular purpose

sentences.english: She stood there with her hands on her hips glaring at him.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那里，双手叉腰瞪着他。

sentences.english: The old lady had fallen and broken her hip.
sentences.chinese: 那老妇人摔了一跤，髋部骨折。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts on each side of your body between the top of your leg and your waist

sentences.english: He marched off, whistling a merry tune.
sentences.chinese: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that you hope someone will have a happy time at Christmas

sentences.english: Before the dam was built, Campbell River used to flood in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 大坝建好之前，坎贝尔河常在春季发大水。

detailed_translations.english: a special wall built across a river or stream to stop the water from flowing, especially in order to make a lake or produce electricity
to stop the water in a river or stream from flowing by building a special wall across it

sentences.english: a pessimistic view of life
sentences.chinese: 对人生的悲观看法

detailed_translations.english: expecting that bad things will happen in the future or that something will have a bad result

sentences.english: the American Commander, General Otis
sentences.chinese: 美军指挥官奥蒂斯将军

sentences.english: our platoon commander
sentences.chinese: 我们的排长

detailed_translations.english: an officer of any rank who is in charge of a group of soldiers or a particular military activity

name: bloom
trans: 花，开花，开花期；青春焕发

sentences.english: These plants bloom in spring.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物在春天开花。

sentences.english: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.chinese: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.english: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.chinese: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

detailed_translations.english: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open

detailed_translations.chinese: 花，开花，开花期；青春焕发
detailed_translations.english: a flower or flowers

sentences.english: There is a major problem with parking in London.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦，停车是个很大的问题。

sentences.english: The loss of their goalkeeper through injury was a major setback for the team.
sentences.chinese: 守门员因伤缺阵使该队的实力大打折扣。

sentences.english: He underwent major heart surgery recently.
sentences.chinese: 他最近做了心脏大手术。

sentences.english: It could have sparked a major confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 此事险些导致一场严重的冲突。

detailed_translations.english: having very serious or worrying results
an officer of middle rank in the British or US army or  marine s  ,or in the US air force

name: zone
trans: 地区， 区域， 范围

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地区， 区域， 范围
detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

name: emphasis
trans: 强调； 重点， 重要性

sentences.english: a change of emphasis in government policy
sentences.chinese: 政府政策重心的变化

detailed_translations.chinese: 强调； 重点， 重要性
detailed_translations.english: special attention or importance

name: interrupt
trans: 打断， 打扰， 中断

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打断， 打扰， 中断
detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

sentences.english: a feasible solution
sentences.chinese: 可行的解决方法

detailed_translations.english: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work

name: prescribe
trans: 开； 吩咐采用； 规定， 指定

sentences.english: What punishment does the law prescribe for this crime?
sentences.chinese: 法律规定这种罪行应受何处罚？

detailed_translations.chinese: 开； 吩咐采用； 规定， 指定
detailed_translations.english: to state officially what should be done in a particular situation

sentences.english: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.english: baked beans
sentences.chinese: 烘豆

sentences.english: Soak the beans overnight.
sentences.chinese: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.english: kidney beans
sentences.chinese: 芸豆

sentences.english: green beans
sentences.chinese: 青刀豆，四季豆

detailed_translations.english: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.

sentences.english: The pans were in their accustomed places.
sentences.chinese: 那些锅在老地方。

detailed_translations.english: usual

name: combination
trans: 结合， 联合； 化合

sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合， 联合； 化合
detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

name: obtain
trans: 获得； 通用， 流行； 存在

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 获得； 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

sentences.english: The new ship will be powered by two gas turbines and four diesel engines.
sentences.chinese: 那艘新轮船将由2台燃气涡轮机和4台柴油机驱动。

detailed_translations.english: an engine or motor in which the pressure of a liquid or gas moves a special wheel around

name: repeatedly
trans: 一再， 再三， 多次地

sentences.english: Graham was repeatedly warned not to work so hard.
sentences.chinese: 格雷厄姆一再被提醒工作不要这么拼命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一再， 再三， 多次地
detailed_translations.english: many times

name: curiosity
trans: 好奇， 好奇心； 奇物， 奇事， 珍品

sentences.english: I opened the packet just to satisfy my curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.english: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.chinese: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.english: She decided to follow him out of curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.english: Margaret looked at him with curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.english: a man of immense intellectual curiosity
sentences.chinese: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.english: It was idle curiosity that made me ask.
sentences.chinese: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。

detailed_translations.chinese: 好奇， 好奇心； 奇物， 奇事， 珍品
detailed_translations.english: the desire to know about something

name: gross
trans: 总的； 严重的； 粗俗的； 臃肿的

sentences.english: The company was guilty of gross negligence.
sentences.chinese: 该公司犯了重大的失职罪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 总的； 严重的； 粗俗的； 臃肿的
detailed_translations.english: clearly wrong and unacceptable

trans: 车间， 作坊， 创作室； 研讨会， 讲习班

sentences.chinese: 鼓手马库斯马贝尔格瑞夫为年轻艺术家们举办了一场爵士乐研讨会。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

name: resist
trans: 抵抗， 反抗， 抵制； 抗， 耐； 忍住， 拒受…的影响

sentences.chinese: 他们只要3美元，我怎能不买？

detailed_translations.english: to stop yourself from having something that you like very much or doing something that you want to do

sentences.chinese: 给我一包大包的和一瓶两公升的低糖“雪碧”汽水。

sentences.chinese: 生产一公升的非有机牛奶所需能源，比生产一公升的有机牛奶还要多出三倍以上。

sentences.chinese: 这些东西必须被密封放置在一个有冲压密封圈的，最大容量为一公升（一夸脱）的透明塑料袋中。

name: format
trans: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式

sentences.english: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.chinese: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式

to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

name: sacrifice
trans: 牺牲； 供奉； 祭品

sentences.chinese: 牧师献祭了一只鸡。

detailed_translations.english: to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important
