detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important

sentences.english: illegal drugs
sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.english: They were involved in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

name: stimulate
trans: 刺激， 激励， 激发

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激， 激励， 激发
detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them excited about and interested in something

sentences.english: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.chinese: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.english: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.chinese: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.english: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.chinese: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

detailed_translations.english: made or done officially or publicly

sentences.english: He never even stopped to congratulate me.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至没有过来向我祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: ...silk and satin in every shade of the rainbow.
sentences.chinese: …如彩虹般五颜六色的丝绸与锦缎。

detailed_translations.english: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain

sentences.english: Soak the clothes in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 把衣服浸泡在冷水里。

sentences.english: Let the pans soak; I’ll wash them later.
sentences.chinese: 把锅泡着吧，我过一会儿再洗。

detailed_translations.english: if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean

name: soar
trans: 猛增， 剧增； 高飞， 升腾； 高涨； 高耸， 屹立

sentences.english: Her temperature soared.
sentences.chinese: 她的体温骤然升高。

sentences.english: The price of petrol has soared in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 最近几个星期汽油价格猛涨。

sentences.english: soaring unemployment
sentences.chinese: 急剧上升的失业率

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛增， 剧增； 高飞， 升腾； 高涨； 高耸， 屹立
detailed_translations.english: to increase quickly to a high level

sentences.english: ...an insurance salesman.
sentences.chinese: …一位男保险推销员。

detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to persuade people to buy his company’s products

name: interference
trans: 干涉， 干预， 阻碍

sentences.english: Industrial relations should be free from state interference.
sentences.chinese: 劳资关系应不受政府干预。

detailed_translations.chinese: 干涉， 干预， 阻碍
detailed_translations.english: an act of interfering

sentences.english: Fruit and vegetables are high in fibre content .
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜的纤维素含量很高。

sentences.english: food that is high in dietary fibre
sentences.chinese: 富含膳食纤维的食物

detailed_translations.english: the parts of plants that you eat but cannot  digest  . Fibre helps to keep you healthy by moving food quickly through your body.

name: sustain
trans: 保持， 使持续下去； 供养， 维持； 支持， 支撑； 经受， 遭受

sentences.english: She found it difficult to sustain the children’s interest.
sentences.chinese: 她发现很难保持孩子们的兴趣。

sentences.english: He was incapable of sustaining close relationships with women.
sentences.chinese: 他无法和女人维持亲密关系。

sentences.english: the policies necessary to sustain economic growth
sentences.chinese: 维持经济增长必需的政策

detailed_translations.chinese: 保持， 使持续下去； 供养， 维持； 支持， 支撑； 经受， 遭受
detailed_translations.english: to make something continue to exist or happen for a period of time

name: entertain
trans: 使欢乐； 招待， 请客

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 使欢乐； 招待， 请客
detailed_translations.english: to invite people to your home for a meal, party etc, or to take your company’s customers somewhere to have a meal, drinks etc

name: altitude
trans: 海拔， 高度； 高处

sentences.english: The aircraft had reached its cruising altitude of about 39,000 feet.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海拔， 高度； 高处
detailed_translations.english: the height of an object or place above the sea

sentences.english: We’d classify Drabble’s novels under ‘Romance’.
sentences.chinese: 我们把德拉布尔的小说归类为“言情小说”。

sentences.english: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
sentences.chinese: 各个家庭按父亲的职业分类。

detailed_translations.english: to decide what group something belongs to

sentences.english: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

detailed_translations.english: Ease is the state of being very comfortable and able to live as you want, without any worries or problems
if something unpleasant eases, or if you ease it, it gradually improves or becomes less

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

name: colony
trans: 殖民地； 侨居地， 聚居地； 群体， 集群

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.chinese: 殖民地； 侨居地， 聚居地； 群体， 集群
detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

sentences.english: ...a professor of mathematics at Boston College.
sentences.chinese: …一位波士顿大学的数学教授。

detailed_translations.english: the science of numbers and of shapes, including  algebra  ,  geometry  , and  arithmetic

name: wagon
trans: 四轮马车， 大篷车； 铁路货车， 客货两用车

sentences.english: In the wagon.
sentences.chinese: 在货车里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 四轮马车， 大篷车； 铁路货车， 客货两用车
detailed_translations.english: a strong vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying heavy loads and usually pulled by horses

sentences.english: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.english: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

detailed_translations.english: in, at, or to another place

name: penetrate
trans: 透入， 渗入， 进入； 刺穿； 洞察， 了解

sentences.english: bullets that penetrate thick armour plating
sentences.chinese: 穿过厚装甲的子弹

sentences.english: Sunlight barely penetrated the dirty windows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光几乎照不进那些肮脏的窗户。

detailed_translations.chinese: 透入， 渗入， 进入； 刺穿； 洞察， 了解
detailed_translations.english: to enter something and pass or spread through it, especially when this is difficult

name: principal
trans: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角

sentences.english: His principal reason for making the journey was to visit his family.
sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.english: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.english: the principal character in the book
sentences.chinese: 书里的主人公

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

name: tend
trans: 照管， 照料， 护理

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

sentences.english: Thank you. You’ve been exceedingly kind.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，你真是太好了。

detailed_translations.english: extremely

name: specimen
trans: 样本， 标本， 样品

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.chinese: 样本， 标本， 样品
detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

name: relief
trans: 轻松， 宽慰； 缓解； 调剂， 消遣； 接替

sentences.english: I felt a huge surge of relief and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，大感欣慰。

sentences.english: No one was hurt, and we all breathed a sigh of relief .
sentences.chinese: 没有人受伤，我们都松了一口气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻松， 宽慰； 缓解； 调剂， 消遣； 接替
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of comfort when something frightening, worrying, or painful has ended or has not happened

name: dimension
trans: 尺寸， 尺度； 方面， 特点； 面积， 规模

sentences.english: You can have a spiritual dimension to your life without being religious.
sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尺寸， 尺度； 方面， 特点； 面积， 规模
detailed_translations.english: a part of a situation or a quality involved in it

name: introduction
trans: 介绍， 引进； 引言

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 介绍， 引进； 引言
detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

sentences.english: the Israeli-Egyptian peace process
sentences.chinese: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.english: Repetition can help the learning process.
sentences.chinese: 重复对学习过程会有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions that are done in order to achieve a particular result
to make food, materials, or goods ready to be used or sold, for example by preserving or improving them in some way

sentences.english: Plato, Aristotle, and other Greek philosophers
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图、亚里士多德和其他希腊哲学家

detailed_translations.english: someone who studies and develops ideas about the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil etc

name: restore
trans: 恢复， 使回复； 修复， 整修； 归还， 交还

sentences.english: She was hoping that the Mediterranean climate would restore her to full health.
sentences.chinese: 她希望地中海的气候能使她的身体完全复原。

sentences.english: The National Guard was called in to restore order (= make people stop fighting and breaking the law ) when riots broke out.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱爆发后，国民警卫队被调来恢复秩序。

sentences.english: initiatives to restore peace in the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 恢复中东和平的倡议

detailed_translations.chinese: 恢复， 使回复； 修复， 整修； 归还， 交还
detailed_translations.english: to make something return to its former state or condition

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

name: alternative
trans: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
替换物，选择；选择的自由

sentences.english: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.chinese: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
detailed_translations.english: an alternative idea, plan etc is different from the one you have and can be used instead

detailed_translations.chinese: 替换物，选择；选择的自由
detailed_translations.english: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else

sentences.english: The onlookers were shouting, cheering, and waving banners.
sentences.chinese: 观众挥动着横幅，又是叫喊又是欢呼。

detailed_translations.english: a belief or principle

name: concentration
trans: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩， 浓度

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩， 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

sentences.english: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

detailed_translations.english: to experience something, especially problems or opposition
an occasion when you meet someone, or do something with someone you do not know

name: soda
trans: 碳酸钠， 纯碱； 汽水， 苏打水

sentences.english: a Scotch and soda
sentences.chinese: 一杯加苏打水的苏格兰威士忌

detailed_translations.chinese: 碳酸钠， 纯碱； 汽水， 苏打水
detailed_translations.english: water that contains bubbles and is often added to alcoholic drinks

sentences.english: a colleague of mine from the bank
sentences.chinese: 我在银行的一位同事

sentences.english: She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with – used especially by professional people

name: gratitude
trans: 感激， 感谢， 感恩

sentences.english: Tears of gratitude filled her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她眼里充满感激的泪水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感激， 感谢， 感恩
detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being grateful

name: approve
trans: 赞成， 称许； 批准

sentences.english: The conference approved a proposal for a referendum.
sentences.chinese: 会议通过了举行全民公决的提议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赞成， 称许； 批准
detailed_translations.english: to officially accept a plan, proposal etc

sentences.english: The interaction between user and expert system arising from the expert system 's use.
sentences.chinese: 使用专家系统而发生的用户和专家系统之间的交互作用。

sentences.english: He understood the interaction of particles of matter, and that's important to set the stage for the Rutherford experiment in Manchester about 10 years later.
sentences.chinese: 他理解物质粒子之间的相互作用，这点很重要，对于10年后他在曼彻斯特搭设，用于卢瑟福实验的平台来说。

detailed_translations.english: a process by which two or more things affect each other

sentences.english: This meat’s so tough I can hardly chew it!
sentences.chinese: 这肉太老了，我几乎嚼不动！

detailed_translations.english: to bite food several times before swallowing it

name: interfere
trans: 干涉， 干预， 妨碍

sentences.english: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 干涉， 干预， 妨碍
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: uneasy
trans: 心神不安的， 忧虑的

sentences.english: She eventually fell into an uneasy sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她终于睡着了，但睡得并不踏实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心神不安的， 忧虑的
detailed_translations.english: worried or slightly afraid because you think that something bad might happen

name: tolerate
trans: 忍受， 容忍； 容许， 承认

sentences.english: We simply will not tolerate vigilante groups on our streets.
sentences.chinese: 我们决不容许有自行惩办犯罪的组织出现在我们的街头。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忍受， 容忍； 容许， 承认
detailed_translations.english: to allow people to do, say, or believe something without criticizing or punishing them

sentences.english: the developmental stages of childhood
sentences.chinese: 儿童时期的各个发育阶段

sentences.english: Higher education is a continuing developmental process .
sentences.chinese: 高等教育是一个持续的发展过程。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the development of someone or something

sentences.english: stacks of dirty dishes
sentences.chinese: 一摞摞脏盘子

sentences.english: Mrs. Cathiard was stacking the clean bottles in crates.
sentences.chinese: 卡提亚夫人当时正在把干净的瓶子堆放到板条箱里。

detailed_translations.english: a neat pile of things
If you stack a number of things, you arrange them in neat piles

name: underline
trans: 在…下面画线； 强调， 使…突出

sentences.english: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…下面画线； 强调， 使…突出
detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

name: innocent
trans: 清白的； 幼稚的； 没有恶意的

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 清白的； 幼稚的； 没有恶意的
detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime

sentences.english: I was shocked by the doctor’s lack of compassion .
sentences.chinese: 我对这个医生如此缺乏同情心感到震惊。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of sympathy for someone who is suffering, and a desire to help them

sentences.english: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters.
sentences.chinese: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a set of letters, arranged in a particular order, and used in writing

sentences.english: They demanded a free parliament and press.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求议会自由和新闻自由。

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who are elected to make a country’s laws and discuss important national affairs

sentences.english: We need to carry out a proper evaluation of the new system.
sentences.chinese: 我们要对新系统进行合理的评估。

sentences.english: They took some samples of products for evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 他们抽取了一些产品样本以作评估。

detailed_translations.english: a judgment about how good, useful, or successful something is

name: crack
trans: 爆裂； 噼啪地响； 打， 击

sentences.english: Thunder cracked overhead.
sentences.chinese: 雷声在头顶炸响。

sentences.english: He cracked his whip and galloped off.
sentences.chinese: 他甩了个响鞭策马而去。

sentences.english: Dennis rubbed his hands together and cracked his knuckles .
sentences.chinese: 丹尼斯搓着双手，把指关节弄得咯咯响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爆裂； 噼啪地响； 打， 击
detailed_translations.english: to make a quick loud sound like the sound of something breaking, or to make something do this
a very narrow space between two things or two parts of something

name: bind
trans: 捆绑， 包扎； 装订； 约束； 使结合， 使黏合

sentences.english: The monks are bound by vows of silence.
sentences.chinese: 僧侣们必须遵守保持缄默的誓言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 捆绑， 包扎； 装订； 约束； 使结合， 使黏合
detailed_translations.english: if you are bound by an agreement, promise etc, you must do what you have agreed to do or promised to do

sentences.english: trim suburban gardens
sentences.chinese: 修剪齐整的郊区花园

detailed_translations.english: neat and well cared for
to move the sails of a boat in order to go faster

name: appreciate
trans: 重视， 赏识； 领会， 体会； 感谢； 增值

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重视， 赏识； 领会， 体会； 感谢； 增值
detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

sentences.english: Good oral hygiene and regular dental care are important, whatever your age.
sentences.chinese: 无论年龄大小，良好的口腔卫生和定期的牙齿保健都非常重要。

detailed_translations.english: relating to your teeth

sentences.english: The snow had a predictable effect on traffic.
sentences.chinese: 这场雪对交通造成的影响可以预见。

sentences.english: an entertaining but predictable film
sentences.chinese: 一部有趣但老套的电影

sentences.english: Logan’s reaction was predictable.
sentences.chinese: 洛根的反应可想而知。

detailed_translations.english: if something or someone is predictable, you know what will happen or what they will do – sometimes used to show disapproval

name: diverse
trans: 不一样的， 相异的； 多种多样的

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.chinese: 不一样的， 相异的； 多种多样的
detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

sentences.english: a railway company
sentences.chinese: 铁路公司

detailed_translations.english: a system of tracks along which trains run, or a system of trains

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

name: rally
trans: 集合， 团结； 恢复， 重新振作

sentences.english: an attempt to rally support for the party
sentences.chinese: 为政党争取支持的努力

detailed_translations.chinese: 集合， 团结； 恢复， 重新振作
detailed_translations.english: to come together, or to bring people together, to support an idea, a political party etc
a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc

sentences.english: Smoking is the prime cause of lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是引发肺部疾病的首要原因。

sentences.english: Our prime concern is providing jobs for all young school leavers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是为所有的年轻毕业生提供工作。

sentences.english: He was named as the prime suspect in the murder investigation.
sentences.chinese: 在那宗谋杀案的调查中他被定为主要嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Good management is of prime importance in business.
sentences.chinese: 良好的经营管理在商业领域尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: most important
the time in your life when you are strongest and most active
to prepare someone for a situation so that they know what to do

name: happen
trans: 发生； 碰巧， 恰好

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: We’ll still be friends, whatever happens.
sentences.chinese: 不管发生什么，我们仍然是朋友。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发生； 碰巧， 恰好
detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.english: a special occasion when people celebrate something such as a religious event, and there is often a public holiday

name: mild
trans: 温柔的； 温暖的； 轻微的

sentences.english: We had an exceptionally mild winter last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年冬天我们这里异常暖和。

sentences.english: a mild climate
sentences.chinese: 温和的气候

detailed_translations.chinese: 温柔的； 温暖的； 轻微的
detailed_translations.english: fairly warm

name: profile
trans: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

sentences.english: a loyal supporter of the team
sentences.chinese: 球队的忠实支持者

sentences.english: her many years of loyal service to the company
sentences.chinese: 她在公司多年的忠诚服务

sentences.english: loyal customers
sentences.chinese: 忠实客户

detailed_translations.english: always supporting your friends, principles, country etc

name: preference
trans: 喜爱， 偏爱； 偏爱的事物； 优先

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喜爱， 偏爱； 偏爱的事物； 优先
detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: impact
trans: 影响， 作用， 冲击

sentences.english: The force of the impact knocked the breath out of her.
sentences.chinese: 撞击力使她喘不过气来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

name: active
trans: 活跃的， 积极的； 主动的； 起作用的

sentences.english: games for active youngsters
sentences.chinese: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.english: She’s over 80, but is still very active.
sentences.chinese: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活跃的， 积极的； 主动的； 起作用的
detailed_translations.english: always busy doing things, especially physical or mental activities

sentences.english: My dorm always has the best parties.
sentences.chinese: 我的宿舍总是有最好的派对。

sentences.english: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.english: I saw her around campus occasionally - she lived in the same dorm as a girl I dated that year, but nothing noteworthy ever really happened.
sentences.chinese: 我偶尔会在学校里看到她——她跟我那年交往的一个女孩住在同一个宿舍，但是从来没发生过什么值得注意的事。

detailed_translations.english: a  dormitory

name: whichever
trans: 无论哪个， 无论哪些

sentences.english: Letting taxes rise abruptly would hurt not only the recovery but also whichever party the electorate ended up blaming.
sentences.chinese: 突然的增税不但会妨害经济复苏，而且无论哪个政党这样做都会受到选民指责。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论哪个， 无论哪些

name: court
trans: 法院， 法庭； 庭院； 宫廷； 球场

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

投掷；使猛然倒下；表达；把…定于特定程度；定调

name: statue
trans: 塑像， 雕像， 铸像

sentences.english: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 塑像， 雕像， 铸像
detailed_translations.english: an image of a person or animal that is made in solid material such as stone or metal and is usually large

name: being
trans: 存在； 生物， 生命

sentences.english: a law that first came into being in 1912
sentences.chinese: 于1912年制定的一条法律

detailed_translations.chinese: 存在； 生物， 生命
detailed_translations.english: to start to exist

name: sensitive
trans: 敏感的， 灵敏的， 神经过敏的； 容易生气的， 易受伤害的

sentences.english: a very sensitive child
sentences.chinese: 一个很敏感的小孩

detailed_translations.chinese: 敏感的， 灵敏的， 神经过敏的； 容易生气的， 易受伤害的
detailed_translations.english: easily upset or offended by events or things that people say

sentences.english: ‘I don’t see why I should take the blame for this!’ she protested.
sentences.chinese: “我不明白为什么我要对此承担责任！”她抗议道。

detailed_translations.english: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something
something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products

name: classification
trans: 分类， 分级， 分类法； 类别， 级别

sentences.english: the classification of wines according to quality
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒按品质的分类

sentences.english: There are five job classifications.
sentences.chinese: 有五种工作类别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分类， 分级， 分类法； 类别， 级别
detailed_translations.english: a process in which you put something into the group or class it belongs to

name: vacant
trans: 空的， 未被占用的； 空缺的； 茫然的， 空虚的

sentences.english: Only a few apartments were still vacant.
sentences.chinese: 只有几套公寓仍然空着。

sentences.english: There was only a vacant lot (= empty unused area of land in a city ) where her house used to be.
sentences.chinese: 她以前房子所在的地方只剩下一块空地了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 空的， 未被占用的； 空缺的； 茫然的， 空虚的
detailed_translations.english: a vacant seat, building, room or piece of land is empty and available for someone to use

sentences.english: ...a nuclear physicist.
sentences.chinese: …一位核物理学家。

detailed_translations.english: a scientist who has special knowledge and training in  physics

sentences.english: The room affords a beautiful view over the city.
sentences.chinese: 这房间可以俯瞰城市美景。

sentences.english: The new law will afford protection to employees.
sentences.chinese: 新法律将为雇员提供保障。

detailed_translations.english: to provide something or allow something to happen

name: underground
trans: 在地下，往地下；秘密地，不公开地
地下的；秘密的，不公开的

sentences.english: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.english: nuclear waste buried deep underground
sentences.chinese: 深埋在地下的核废物

detailed_translations.chinese: 在地下，往地下；秘密地，不公开地
detailed_translations.english: under the earth’s surface

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下的；秘密的，不公开的
detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth
a railway system under the ground

name: curse
trans: 天谴； 祸害， 祸根

sentences.english: Gilbert was cursing under his breath.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔伯特在低声咒骂。

detailed_translations.english: to swear

detailed_translations.chinese: 天谴； 祸害， 祸根
detailed_translations.english: something that causes trouble, harm etc

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

sentences.english: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

sentences.english: Do you like baseball?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢打棒球吗?。

sentences.english: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball .
sentences.chinese: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s

name: interval
trans: 间隔， 间距； 幕间休息

sentences.english: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
sentences.chinese: 他离开房间，过了一会儿就带回来一条消息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 间隔， 间距； 幕间休息
detailed_translations.english: the period of time between two events, activities etc

sentences.english: You should be able to evaluate your own work.
sentences.chinese: 你应该能够评估自己的工作。

sentences.english: We need to evaluate the success of the campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我们要评估一下这次运动是否成功。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to evaluate the effectiveness of different treatments.
sentences.chinese: 要对各种治疗方法的效果作出评估会很难。

detailed_translations.english: to judge how good, useful, or successful something is

sentences.english: ...quality tools and machinery.
sentences.chinese: …优质工具和机械。

detailed_translations.english: You can use machinery to refer to machines in general, or machines that are used in a factory or on a farm

name: status
trans: 地位， 身份； 情形， 状况

sentences.english: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的婚姻状况是什么？

detailed_translations.chinese: 地位， 身份； 情形， 状况
detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

sentences.english: He used his left hand as a shield against the reflecting sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他用左手遮挡反射过来的阳光。

detailed_translations.english: something that protects a person or thing from harm or damage
to protect someone or something from being harmed or damaged

name: upset
trans: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

name: inference
trans: 推断结果， 结论； 推论， 推理， 推断

sentences.english: There were two inferences to be drawn from her letter.
sentences.chinese: 从她的来信可以得到两种推论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断结果， 结论； 推论， 推理， 推断
detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true, based on information that you have

sentences.english: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

sentences.english: A smile curved her lips.
sentences.chinese: 她笑了，嘴唇弯成一道弧线。

detailed_translations.english: to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this
a line that gradually bends like part of a circle

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot

name: skim
trans: 撇去， 掠过， 擦过； 浏览， 略读

sentences.english: Julie skimmed the sports page.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉浏览了体育版。

detailed_translations.chinese: 撇去， 掠过， 擦过； 浏览， 略读
detailed_translations.english: to remove something from the surface of a liquid, especially floating fat, solids, or oil

sentences.english: Homelessness is not a new phenomenon .
sentences.chinese: 无家可归已不是什么新现象。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens or exists in society, science, or nature, especially something that is studied because it is difficult to understand

name: notify
trans: 通知， 告知， 报告

sentences.english: The skipper notified the coastguard of the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 船长通知了海岸警卫队这一灾难。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通知， 告知， 报告
detailed_translations.english: to formally or officially tell someone about something

sentences.english: Was my name mentioned at all?
sentences.chinese: 我的名字被提到过吗？

sentences.english: Some of the problems were mentioned in his report.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些问题在他的报告里提到了。

sentences.english: (= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.chinese: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.english: As I mentioned earlier , there have been a lot of changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 正如我刚才所说的，最近变化很大。

sentences.english: She mentioned in passing (= mentioned in a quick unimportant way ) that you had just been to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 她只是随口提了一下你刚刚去过罗马。

detailed_translations.english: to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details

sentences.english: Tears streamed down their faces.
sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts
a natural flow of water that moves across the land and is narrower than a river

name: laundry
trans: 洗衣房， 洗衣店； 待洗的衣服， 洗好的衣服

sentences.english: She did the laundry (= washed the clothes etc ) and hung it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

sentences.english: Ben was folding laundry.
sentences.chinese: 本正在叠洗好的衣服。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗衣房， 洗衣店； 待洗的衣服， 洗好的衣服
detailed_translations.english: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed

sentences.english: It is unjust that a privileged few should continue to accumulate wealth.
sentences.chinese: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

name: heave
trans: 举起，提起，拉起，拖；扔；发出
举起； 起伏， 升降

sentences.english: Michael’s shoulders heaved with silent laughter.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔憋着不笑出声来，双肩直抖。

sentences.english: The sea heaved up and down beneath the boat.
sentences.chinese: 船的下面大海波涛汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: to move up and down with very strong movements

detailed_translations.chinese: 举起，提起，拉起，拖；扔；发出
detailed_translations.english: to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort

detailed_translations.chinese: 举起； 起伏， 升降
detailed_translations.english: a strong rising or falling movement

sentences.english: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.english: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.english: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.english: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

sentences.english: The food she eats nourishes both her and the baby.
sentences.chinese: 她吃的食物为她和婴儿提供营养。

detailed_translations.english: To nourish a person, animal, or plant means to provide them with the food that is necessary for life, growth, and good health

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

sentences.english: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.chinese: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor

name: cigarette
trans: 香烟， 纸烟， 卷烟

sentences.english: a packet of cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 一包香烟

detailed_translations.chinese: 香烟， 纸烟， 卷烟
detailed_translations.english: a thin tube of paper filled with finely cut tobacco that people smoke

name: torch
trans: 火炬， 火把； 手电筒

sentences.english: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 火炬， 火把； 手电筒
detailed_translations.english: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand

name: positive
trans: 确实的， 明确的； 积极的， 肯定的

sentences.english: At least something positive has come out of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 至少这个情况也产生了一些积极的东西。

sentences.english: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.chinese: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.english: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.chinese: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.english: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.chinese: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.english: It’s been a difficult time but, on the positive side , I feel physically fine.
sentences.chinese: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.english: Women should be portrayed in a more positive light .
sentences.chinese: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的， 明确的； 积极的， 肯定的
detailed_translations.english: good or useful

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
sentences.chinese: 孩子最喜欢的玩具

sentences.english: What’s your favourite colour?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢什么颜色？

sentences.english: a favorite spot for picnickers
sentences.chinese: 野餐者最喜欢的地方

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

sentences.english: Could we have the menu, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把菜单给我们，好吗？

sentences.english: a three course set menu
sentences.chinese: 三道菜的套餐

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

name: prospect
trans: 前景， 前途， 可能性； 景象， 景色； 可能成为主顾的人； 有希望的候选人

sentences.english: He had prospected for minerals everywhere from the Gobi Desert to the Transvaal.
sentences.chinese: 他在世界各地探过矿，从戈壁沙漠到德兰士瓦。

detailed_translations.english: to examine an area of land or water, in order to find gold, silver, oil etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 前景， 前途， 可能性； 景象， 景色； 可能成为主顾的人； 有希望的候选人
detailed_translations.english: the possibility that something will happen

sentences.english: The coastline can now be monitored by radar.
sentences.chinese: 现在能用雷达监测海岸线了。

sentences.english: We could see the plane quite clearly on the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that uses radio waves to find the position of things and watch their movement

sentences.english: Refugees were streaming across the border.
sentences.chinese: 难民正涌过边境。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["refugee camps"]}
sentences.chinese: 难民营

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been forced to leave their country, especially during a war, or for political or religious reasons

sentences.english: recycled aluminium cans
sentences.chinese: 再生铝罐

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that is very light and is used to make cans, cooking pans, window frames etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Al

name: comparable
trans: 可比较的； 类似的； 比得上的

sentences.english: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
sentences.chinese: 同样大小的汽车在国外要贵得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可比较的； 类似的； 比得上的
detailed_translations.english: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison

sentences.english: ...a University professor who specializes in the history of the Russian empire.
sentences.chinese: …一位专门研究沙俄历史的大学教授。

name: rotate
trans: 旋转， 转动； 轮流

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 地球每24小时绕地轴自转一周。

sentences.english: Rotate the pan halfway through the baking time.
sentences.chinese: 烘烤到一半时把盘子转一下。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转， 转动； 轮流
detailed_translations.english: to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this

name: instance
trans: 例子， 实例， 事例

sentences.english: We need to rethink the way we consume energy. Take, for instance, our approach to transport.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要重新考虑我们使用能源的方式，例如我们的运输方式。

detailed_translations.chinese: 例子， 实例， 事例
detailed_translations.english: for example

sentences.english: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听歌剧。

sentences.english: an opera singer
sentences.chinese: 歌剧演员

detailed_translations.english: a musical play in which all of the words are sung

name: presumably
trans: 大概， 可能， 据推测

sentences.english: It’s raining, which presumably means that your football match will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 下雨了，这可能意味着你们的足球比赛要取消。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大概， 可能， 据推测
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you think something is probably true

sentences.english: Well, at least I can face them all with a clear conscience (= the knowledge that you have done nothing wrong ) .
sentences.chinese: 好吧，至少我可以问心无愧地面对他们所有人。

sentences.english: I can’t tell you what to do – it’s a matter of conscience (= something that you must make a moral judgment about ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你怎么办——这是良心问题。

sentences.english: a crisis of conscience among medical staff (= a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what is the right thing to do )
sentences.chinese: 医务人员中的良心危机

detailed_translations.english: the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is morally right or wrong

name: subject
trans: 题目； 学科； 主语

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: practically
trans: 几乎， 简直； 实际上

sentences.english: He'd known the old man practically all his life.
sentences.chinese: 他几乎从小就认识那位老人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 几乎， 简直； 实际上
detailed_translations.english: Practically means almost, but not completely or exactly

name: recognition
trans: 认出， 识别； 承认； 赏识， 表彰， 报偿

sentences.english: He has achieved recognition and respect as a scientist.
sentences.chinese: 作为科学家，他得到人们的赞赏和尊敬。

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 识别； 承认； 赏识， 表彰， 报偿
detailed_translations.english: the act of realizing and accepting that something is true or important

sentences.english: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

name: blade
trans: 刀刃， 刀片， 叶片

sentences.english: a razor blade
sentences.chinese: 剃刀刀片

detailed_translations.chinese: 刀刃， 刀片， 叶片
detailed_translations.english: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon

name: arrangement
trans: 整理， 排列， 安排； 准备工作

sentences.english: Have you made all your travel arrangements?
sentences.chinese: 你的旅行都安排好了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 整理， 排列， 安排； 准备工作
detailed_translations.english: plans and preparations that you must make so that something can happen

name: revenue
trans: 收入， 收益； 税收， 岁入

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收入， 收益； 税收， 岁入
detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

sentences.english: Strip the beds and wash the sheets.
sentences.chinese: 把床单撤下来清洗。

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
a long narrow piece of paper, cloth etc

name: solution
trans: 解决； 解决办法； 溶液

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

detailed_translations.chinese: 解决； 解决办法； 溶液
detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

name: continuous
trans: 连续不断的； 延伸的

sentences.english: continuous economic growth
sentences.chinese: 持续的经济增长

sentences.english: a continuous flow of information
sentences.chinese: 源源不断的信息

detailed_translations.chinese: 连续不断的； 延伸的
detailed_translations.english: continuing to happen or exist without stopping

name: opponent
trans: 对手， 敌手， 对抗者

sentences.english: Graf’s opponent in today’s final will be Sukova.
sentences.chinese: 格拉芙今天的决赛对手将是苏科娃。

sentences.english: He is admired even by his political opponents.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至受到政敌的钦佩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对手， 敌手， 对抗者
detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

sentences.english: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.chinese: 加快经济增长速度的措施

detailed_translations.english: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect

name: backward
trans: 向后的，倒的；落后的，进步慢的

sentences.english: The diver flipped over backward into the water.
sentences.chinese: 跳水运动员向后翻转跳入水中。

sentences.english: He took two steps backward.
sentences.chinese: 他往后退了两步。

detailed_translations.english: If you move or look backward, you move or look in the direction that your back is facing

detailed_translations.chinese: 向后的，倒的；落后的，进步慢的
detailed_translations.english: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you

name: grain
trans: 谷物， 谷粒； 颗粒； 少量， 微量

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒； 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

sentences.english: a kitchen maid
sentences.chinese: 厨房女佣人

detailed_translations.english: a female servant, especially in a large house or hotel

name: residence
trans: 住处， 住宅； 居住； 居住资格

sentences.english: Rome was his main place of residence .
sentences.chinese: 罗马是他的主要居住地。

detailed_translations.chinese: 住处， 住宅； 居住； 居住资格
detailed_translations.english: the state of living in a place

name: credit
trans: 信贷，赊欠；赞扬，荣誉；学分；信任
相信； 把…记入贷方； 把…归于

sentences.english: The store agreed to let him have credit.
sentences.chinese: 商店同意他赊购。

sentences.english: What’s the credit limit on your Visa card?
sentences.chinese: 你的维萨卡信用额度是多少？

detailed_translations.chinese: 信贷，赊欠；赞扬，荣誉；学分；信任
detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a shop, bank etc that allows you to buy something and pay for it later

detailed_translations.chinese: 相信； 把…记入贷方； 把…归于
detailed_translations.english: to add money to a bank account

name: regardless
trans: 不顾后果地； 不管怎样， 无论如何

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不顾后果地； 不管怎样， 无论如何
detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

name: intensive
trans: 加强的； 精深的， 透彻的； 精耕细作的

sentences.english: a one-week intensive course in English
sentences.chinese: 为期一周的英语强化课程

sentences.english: a day of intensive negotiations
sentences.chinese: 紧张谈判的一天

detailed_translations.chinese: 加强的； 精深的， 透彻的； 精耕细作的
detailed_translations.english: involving a lot of activity, effort, or careful attention in a short period of time

name: alter
trans: 改变， 变更， 变动

sentences.english: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.chinese: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.english: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.chinese: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.english: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

detailed_translations.chinese: 改变， 变更， 变动
detailed_translations.english: to change, or to make someone or something change

name: combine
trans: 结合， 联合； 化合
联合企业； 联合收割机

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合， 联合； 化合
detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

sentences.english: advice on how to reach your ideal weight
sentences.chinese: 如何达到理想体重的建议

sentences.english: The scheme offers an ideal opportunity for youngsters to get training.
sentences.chinese: 该计划为年轻人提供了获得培训的极好机会。

sentences.english: With so much rain, conditions are far from ideal.
sentences.chinese: 雨水这么多，天气情况很不理想。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable that something could possibly be
a principle about what is morally right or a perfect standard that you hope to achieve

name: bearing
trans: 举止， 风度； 方位， 方向感； 影响

sentences.english: Exercise has a direct bearing on how healthy you are.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼直接影响你的身体状况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 风度； 方位， 方向感； 影响
detailed_translations.english: the way in which you move, stand, or behave, especially when this shows your character

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

name: occur
trans: 发生， 出现， 存在； 被想起， 被想到

sentences.english: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发生， 出现， 存在； 被想起， 被想到
detailed_translations.english: to happen

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

sentences.english: Deer brought the broom.
sentences.chinese: 小鹿带来了扫帚。

sentences.english: The lobby is empty but for the postman and his broom.
sentences.chinese: 大厅里除了邮差和他的扫帚以外别无他人。

detailed_translations.english: a large brush with a long handle, used for sweeping floors

name: establishment
trans: 建立， 设立， 确立； 企业； 当权人物

sentences.english: a top class training establishment
sentences.chinese: 一流的培训机构

detailed_translations.chinese: 建立， 设立， 确立； 企业； 当权人物
detailed_translations.english: the act of starting an organization, relationship, or system

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats
to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

sentences.english: flowers waving in the breeze
sentences.chinese: 在微风中摇曳的花儿

detailed_translations.english: to walk somewhere in a calm confident way
a gentle wind

name: trash
trans: 垃圾，废物；拙劣的文学作品；没用的人，社会渣滓，败类

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 垃圾，废物；拙劣的文学作品；没用的人，社会渣滓，败类
detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc
to destroy something completely, either deliberately or by using it too much

sentences.english: Gerry’s ambition was to become a portrait painter.
sentences.chinese: 格里的志向是成为一名肖像画家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who paints pictures

sentences.english: The creature is a tiny centipede, just 10 millimetres long.
sentences.chinese: 那个生物是一只很小的蜈蚣，只有10毫米长。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length. There are 1,000 millimetres in one metre.

name: horn
trans: 角； 号角； 警报器

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角； 号角； 警报器
detailed_translations.english: the hard pointed thing that grows, usually in pairs, on the heads of animals such as cows and goats

sentences.english: a heart specialist
sentences.chinese: 心脏专科医生

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it

name: infer
trans: 推论， 推断； 猜想

sentences.english: I inferred from what she said that you have not been well.
sentences.chinese: 我从她的话里推断出你身体一直不大好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推论， 推断； 猜想
detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

name: compass
trans: 罗盘， 指南针； 圆规； 界限， 范围

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.chinese: 罗盘， 指南针； 圆规； 界限， 范围
detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

name: background
trans: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

name: sore
trans: 痛的；恼火的；急剧的，剧烈的

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 痛的；恼火的；急剧的，剧烈的
detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

name: dispose
trans: 处理， 解决； 使倾向于

sentences.english: Chinese vases are disposed around the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 中国花瓶摆放在展馆四周。

detailed_translations.chinese: 处理， 解决； 使倾向于
detailed_translations.english: to deal with or settle

sentences.english: The bedside lamp glowed dimly.
sentences.chinese: 床头灯发出暗淡的光。

sentences.english: The fireplace was still glowing with the remains of last night’s fire.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉中，隔夜的余烬依然在微微发光。

sentences.english: The red tip of his cigarette was glowing in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 他那红红的烟头在黑暗中幽幽发光。

sentences.english: The moisturizer gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.chinese: 这种润肤霜给我脸上带来了持续整天的一种健康的红光。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or  reflect  a soft steady light
A glow is a pink colour on a person's face, usually because they are healthy or have been exercising

sentences.english: red velvet curtains
sentences.chinese: 红色的丝绒窗帘

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hanging cloth that can be pulled across to cover a window, divide a room etc

sentences.english: Foster joined in the laughter.
sentences.chinese: 福斯特也跟着笑了起来。

sentences.english: He looked shocked, then burst into laughter (= started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他一脸的震惊，接着便放声大笑起来。

detailed_translations.english: when people laugh, or the sound of people laughing

name: constitution
trans: 宪法， 章程； 组成； 设立

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宪法， 章程； 组成； 设立
detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

sentences.english: a story that blends fact and legend
sentences.chinese: 事实与传说相糅合的一个故事

detailed_translations.english: to combine different things in a way that produces an effective or pleasant result, or to become combined in this way

name: certificate
trans: 证书， 证件， 执照

sentences.english: a degree certificate
sentences.chinese: 学位证书

detailed_translations.chinese: 证书， 证件， 执照
detailed_translations.english: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true

name: mess
trans: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

name: sour
trans: 酸的；馊的，酸味的；脾气坏的
变酸， 变馊； 变得乖戾

sentences.english: Rachel sampled the wine. It was sour.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

sentences.english: sour cherries
sentences.chinese: 酸樱桃

detailed_translations.chinese: 酸的；馊的，酸味的；脾气坏的
detailed_translations.english: having a sharp acid taste, like the taste of a  lemon  or a fruit that is not ready to be eaten

detailed_translations.chinese: 变酸， 变馊； 变得乖戾
detailed_translations.english: if milk sours, or if something sours it, it begins to have an unpleasant sharp taste

sentences.english: His name was deleted from the list.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字从名单上删掉了。

sentences.english: I deleted the file by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我误删了这个文件。

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that has been written down or stored in a computer

name: nonsense
trans: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行动

sentences.english: ‘I’m a prisoner in my own home.’ ‘Nonsense!’
sentences.chinese: “我在自己家里就像个囚犯。”“胡说！”

sentences.english: If you ask me, these modern teaching methods are a load of nonsense (= a lot of nonsense ).
sentences.chinese: 要我说，这些现代教学方法全是一派胡言。

sentences.english: He was talking utter nonsense as usual.
sentences.chinese: 他像平常一样又在胡说八道了。

sentences.english: By 1832 the idea had become an economic nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 到了1832年，那种观点已经成为经济学的谬论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行动
detailed_translations.english: ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid

sentences.english: We’ve decided to stain the shelves blue.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把架子涂成蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to change the colour of something, especially something made of wood, by using a special liquid
a mark that is difficult to remove, especially one made by a liquid such as blood, coffee, or ink

name: transform
trans: 使改观， 改革； 变换， 把…转换成

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使改观， 改革； 变换， 把…转换成
detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

sentences.english: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.english: the Conservative leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 保守党的领导人角逐

sentences.english: The next leadership election is due in November.
sentences.chinese: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc

name: genuine
trans: 真的， 真正的； 真诚的

sentences.english: ‘Did he really?’ Her surprise seemed genuine.
sentences.chinese: “他真的这样？”她好像是真的惊讶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 真诚的
detailed_translations.english: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body

name: physical
trans: 身体的； 物理的； 物质的， 有形的

sentences.english: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.chinese: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.chinese: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.english: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.chinese: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.english: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.english: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
sentences.chinese: 他对健身着了迷。

detailed_translations.chinese: 身体的； 物理的； 物质的， 有形的
detailed_translations.english: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions

name: fulfil
trans: 履行， 实现， 完成； 满足， 使满意

sentences.english: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream .
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

sentences.english: Being deaf hasn’t stopped Karen fulfilling her ambition to be a hairdresser.
sentences.chinese: 失聪并没有阻止卡伦实现当美发师的抱负。

sentences.english: It was then that the organization finally began to fulfill the hopes of its founders.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时，该组织才终于开始实现其创办人的愿望。

detailed_translations.chinese: 履行， 实现， 完成； 满足， 使满意
detailed_translations.english: if you fulfil a hope, wish, or aim, you achieve the thing that you hoped for, wished for etc

name: wicked
trans: 坏的， 令人厌恶的； 淘气的， 顽皮的

sentences.english: the wicked stepmother in ‘Hansel and Gretel’
sentences.chinese: 《糖果屋》中那个恶毒的继母

detailed_translations.chinese: 坏的， 令人厌恶的； 淘气的， 顽皮的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is morally wrong

trans: 唯一的， 独一无二的； 极不寻常的， 极好的

trans: 葬礼， 丧礼， 丧葬

trans: 提高，使增长；推动，激励；替…做广告，宣扬

sentences.chinese: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

sentences.chinese: 她喜欢穿上盛装，戴上极为昂贵的珠宝首饰。

trans: 超越； 过量， 过度

sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

detailed_translations.english: a way of thinking about something, especially one which is influenced by the type of person you are or by your experiences

sentences.chinese: 他以前从未与人有过性关系。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people or two groups feel about each other and behave towards each other

trans: 等同， 平等， 相等

sentences.chinese: …性别平等。

trans: 破坏， 毁灭， 消灭

sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme
sentences.chinese: 筑路工程造成的环境破坏

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭， 消灭

sentences.chinese: 身边没有秘书记录口授内容。

detailed_translations.english: when you say words for someone to write down

trans: 极其， 非常； 僵硬地
硬的，僵直的；不灵活的；拘谨的，生硬的；费劲的；强烈的

sentences.chinese: 安娜试图装出感兴趣的样子。实际上她都厌烦透了。

name: expression
trans: 词语； 表达； 表情

sentences.english: Student leaders are demanding greater freedom of expression (= the right to say what you think without being punished ).
sentences.chinese: 学生领袖要求得到更多的言论自由。

detailed_translations.chinese: 词语； 表达； 表情
detailed_translations.english: something you say, write, or do that shows what you think or feel

name: invade
trans: 入侵， 侵略， 侵袭

sentences.chinese: 2,000年前古罗马人入侵了英国。

detailed_translations.english: to enter a country, town, or area using military force, in order to take control of it

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

name: childhood
trans: 童年， 幼年， 早期

sentences.english: She had a happy childhood.
sentences.chinese: 她有过一个快乐的童年。

sentences.english: He was remembering a story heard in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 他一直记着童年时听过的一个故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 童年， 幼年， 早期

sentences.english: a pack of wolves
sentences.chinese: 一群狼

detailed_translations.english: a wild animal that looks like a large dog and lives and hunts in groups

sentences.english: I am in accordance with him in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 在这件事情上我同他是一致的。

sentences.english: We assure you that the quality of our goods will be in accordance with that of the samples.
sentences.chinese: 我们向你方保证，我们货物的质量一定与样品的质量一致。

sentences.english: If your pursuit of personal career and ideal are in accordance with ours, if you are seeking for the pleasure from sharing the same ambitions, please join us!
sentences.chinese: 如果您想谋求个人事业、理想与公司的事业和理想高度一致，如果您追求的是志同道合的工作愉悦，请加入我们！

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

detailed_translations.english: including every possible detail

name: appeal
trans: 感染力， 吸引力； 呼吁， 上诉

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉。

name: democracy
trans: 民主， 民主制； 民主国家

sentences.english: a return to democracy after 16 years of military rule
sentences.chinese: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

detailed_translations.chinese: 民主， 民主制； 民主国家
detailed_translations.english: a system of government in which every citizen in the country can vote to elect its government officials
