name: condemn
trans: 谴责， 指责； 判…刑， 宣告…有罪

sentences.english: Politicians were quick to condemn the bombing.
sentences.chinese: 政治家们立即对爆炸事件进行了谴责。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谴责， 指责； 判…刑， 宣告…有罪
detailed_translations.english: to say very strongly that you do not approve of something or someone, especially because you think it is morally wrong

name: beast
trans: 兽， 野兽， 牲畜； 凶残的人， 令人厌憎的人

sentences.english: You beast! Let go!
sentences.chinese: 你这畜生，放开我！

detailed_translations.chinese: 兽， 野兽， 牲畜； 凶残的人， 令人厌憎的人
detailed_translations.english: an animal, especially a large or dangerous one

sentences.english: We offer financial assistance to students.
sentences.chinese: 我们向学生提供经济援助。

sentences.english: Can I be of any assistance (=  can I help you  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 我能帮什么忙吗？

detailed_translations.english: help or support

name: commerce
trans: 商业， 贸易； 社交

sentences.english: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.chinese: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业， 贸易； 社交
detailed_translations.english: the buying and selling of goods and services

sentences.english: I gestured toward the boathouse, and he looked inside.
sentences.chinese: 我朝停船小屋打手势，他在里面看了看。

detailed_translations.english: to move your hand, arm, or head to tell someone something, or show them what you mean
a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel

name: admit
trans: 承认， 供认； 准许…进入

sentences.english: ‘Okay, so maybe I was a little bit scared,’ Jenny admitted.
sentences.chinese: “行了，也许我是有点害怕。”珍妮承认道。

sentences.english: I must admit , I didn’t actually do anything to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，实际上我并没有帮她什么忙。

sentences.english: Admit it! I’m right, aren’t I?
sentences.chinese: 承认吧！我对了，是不是？

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认， 供认； 准许…进入
detailed_translations.english: to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right

sentences.english: ...a book of love poems.
sentences.chinese: …一本爱情诗集。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

name: interest
trans: 兴趣；利益，利害关系；利息

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兴趣；利益，利害关系；利息
detailed_translations.english: if you have an interest in something or someone, you want to know or learn more about them
to make someone want to pay attention to something and find out more about it

sentences.english: the Gulf of Mexico
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥湾

detailed_translations.english: a large area of sea partly enclosed by land

sentences.english: He was a painter and poet.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位画家兼诗人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes poems

name: definition
trans: 定义， 释义， 定界； 清晰， 鲜明

sentences.english: a dictionary definition
sentences.chinese: 词典里的释义

detailed_translations.chinese: 定义， 释义， 定界； 清晰， 鲜明
detailed_translations.english: a phrase or sentence that says exactly what a word, phrase, or idea means

sentences.english: He hadn’t shaved for days.
sentences.chinese: 他已经好几天没刮脸了。

sentences.english: Brian had cut himself shaving .
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩刮胡子时割破了脸。

detailed_translations.english: to cut off hair very close to the skin, especially from the face, using a  razor
if a man has a shave, he cuts off the hair on his face close to his skin using a  razor

name: organic
trans: 有机体的， 有机物的

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.chinese: 有机体的， 有机物的
detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

name: summary
trans: 概括的， 概要的； 实时的， 即决的

sentences.english: a summary execution
sentences.chinese: 立即处决

detailed_translations.chinese: 概括的， 概要的； 实时的， 即决的
detailed_translations.english: done immediately, and not following the normal process
a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details

name: apply
trans: 适用； 申请， 请求； 涂， 敷， 施
应用，实施；使用；涂敷；把…施于

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用； 申请， 请求； 涂， 敷， 施
detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施；使用；涂敷；把…施于
detailed_translations.english: to use something such as a method, idea, or law in a particular situation, activity, or process

sentences.english: I felt very inferior among all those academics.
sentences.chinese: 与那些大学教师在一起，我自惭形秽。

sentences.english: wine of inferior quality
sentences.chinese: 劣质葡萄酒

sentences.english: inferior goods
sentences.chinese: 质量低劣的商品

detailed_translations.english: not good, or not as good as someone or something else
someone who has a lower position or rank than you in an organization

sentences.english: The steamer will go west by north.
sentences.chinese: 这艘轮船将向西偏北方向航行。

sentences.english: To welcome the steamer, a long line of honor guards marched all in step.
sentences.chinese: 为了欢迎轮船的到来，一支仪仗队步调合拍的行进着。

sentences.english: Gerald was fickle, in a week he would be in love with some girl he met on the steamer .
sentences.chinese: 杰拉尔德是三心二意；不出一星期他就会爱上他在轮船上遇见的某个姑娘。

detailed_translations.english: a  steamship

sentences.english: He has recently been promoted to Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 他最近晋升为经理助理。

sentences.english: a recently published biography
sentences.chinese: 一部最近出版的传记

sentences.english: Jerry lived in Cairo until quite recently .
sentences.chinese: 直至不久之前杰里一直住在开罗。

sentences.english: More recently, he’s appeared in a number of British films.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他出演了多部英国电影。

detailed_translations.english: not long ago

name: overlook
trans: 忽视； 宽恕； 俯瞰

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: Nobody could overlook the fact that box office sales were down.
sentences.chinese: 谁也无法忽视票房销售额在下降这个事实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忽视； 宽恕； 俯瞰
detailed_translations.english: to not notice something, or not see how important it is

sentences.english: politicians who are trying to get the minority vote
sentences.chinese: 努力争取少数族群选票的政治家

sentences.english: a British Labour politician
sentences.chinese: 英国工党政治家

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in politics, especially an elected member of the government

name: incredible
trans: 不能相信的， 不可信的； 难以置信的， 不可思议的； 惊人的

sentences.english: It’s incredible that he survived the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见萨莉后，汤姆的变化之大简直令人难以置信。

sentences.english: I find it almost incredible that no one noticed these errors.
sentences.chinese: 没人发现这些错误，真让我无法相信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能相信的， 不可信的； 难以置信的， 不可思议的； 惊人的
detailed_translations.english: too strange to be believed, or very difficult to believe

name: dramatic
trans: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 突然的

sentences.english: A superb goal by Owen earned United a dramatic victory yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天欧文的一个超级入球为联队赢得了激动人心的胜利。

sentences.english: Some of the most dramatic events in American history happened here.
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上一些最震撼人心的事件发生在这里。

sentences.english: the dramatic scenery of the Grand Canyon
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的壮丽景致

detailed_translations.chinese: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 突然的
detailed_translations.english: exciting or impressive

sentences.english: The use of mosquito lure female mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 运用蚊子的趋光性引诱雌蚊。

sentences.english: Can I go to the theatre?"asked a mosquito to her mother. "Yes, but.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去电影院吗？”一只蚊子问妈妈。“可以，但是要小心。

sentences.english: He crushes it, with one hydraulic hand, almost unconsciously, like someone swatting a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 他下意识地地用液压手将它拍个稀烂，就像拍死一只蚊子。

detailed_translations.english: a small flying insect that sucks the blood of people and animals, sometimes spreading the disease  malaria
a musical instrument usually with six strings that you play by pulling the strings with your fingers or with a  plectrum (= small piece of plastic, metal etc )

name: layout
trans: 布局， 安排， 设计

sentences.english: All the flats in the building had the same layout.
sentences.chinese: 大楼里所有的公寓布局都是一样的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 布局， 安排， 设计
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a town, garden, or building is arranged

name: artificial
trans: 人工的， 人为的； 矫揉造作的； 模拟的

sentences.english: artificial flowers
sentences.chinese: 假花

sentences.english: artificial light
sentences.chinese: 人造光

sentences.english: artificial fertilizers
sentences.chinese: 化肥

detailed_translations.chinese: 人工的， 人为的； 矫揉造作的； 模拟的
detailed_translations.english: not real or not made of natural things but made to be like something that is real or natural

sentences.english: As she listened, she played an imaginary piano on her knees.
sentences.chinese: 她边听边在膝盖上作弹钢琴状。

sentences.english: We must protect older people from harm, whether it is real or imaginary.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须保护老人免受伤害，无论这伤害是真实的还是假想的。

detailed_translations.english: not real, but produced from pictures or ideas in your mind

name: removal
trans: 除去， 消除； 移动， 搬迁

sentences.english: stain removal
sentences.chinese: 去污

detailed_translations.chinese: 除去， 消除； 移动， 搬迁
detailed_translations.english: when you get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

name: formula
trans: 公式， 方程式； 原则， 方案； 配方

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公式， 方程式； 原则， 方案； 配方
detailed_translations.english: a method or set of principles that you use to solve a problem or to make sure that something is successful

name: comment
trans: 评论，意见，注释；闲话，议论

sentences.english: So far, Mr. Cook has not commented on these reports.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，库克先生还未对这些报告进行过评论。

detailed_translations.english: to express an opinion about someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: 评论，意见，注释；闲话，议论
detailed_translations.english: an opinion that you express about someone or something

name: revolt
trans: 反叛，起义；反抗，违抗；厌恶，生反感

sentences.english: He was revolted by the smell.
sentences.chinese: 那气味让他恶心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 反叛，起义；反抗，违抗；厌恶，生反感
detailed_translations.english: if people revolt, they take strong and often violent action against the government, usually with the aim of taking power away from them
strong and often violent action by a lot of people against their ruler or government

sentences.english: He reached into the bin with a look of disgust on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把手伸进垃圾箱，脸上带着厌恶的表情。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of dislike, annoyance, or disapproval

name: stem
trans: 堵住， 止住， 停住

sentences.english: All my problems stem from drink.
sentences.chinese: 我所有的问题都是酗酒引起的。

detailed_translations.english: If a condition or problem stems from something, it was caused originally by that thing
the long thin part of a plant, from which leaves, flowers, or fruit grow

detailed_translations.chinese: 堵住， 止住， 停住
detailed_translations.english: to stop the flow of a liquid

sentences.english: We had three days of spring sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

detailed_translations.english: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

name: achievement
trans: 完成； 成就， 成绩

sentences.english: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.chinese: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 完成； 成就， 成绩
detailed_translations.english: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts

name: mechanic
trans: 技工， 机修工； 力学， 机械学； 过程， 方法， 技术性细节

sentences.english: a garage mechanic
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂的技工

detailed_translations.chinese: 技工， 机修工； 力学， 机械学； 过程， 方法， 技术性细节
detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled at repairing motor vehicles and machinery

name: desirable
trans: 值得向往的， 令人满意的

sentences.english: The ability to speak a foreign language is highly desirable .
sentences.chinese: 能说一门外语是非常理想的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 值得向往的， 令人满意的

name: balcony
trans: 阳台； 楼厅， 楼座

sentences.english: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳台； 楼厅， 楼座
detailed_translations.english: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

name: consist
trans: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

name: preparation
trans: 准备， 预备； 制剂

sentences.english: This dish is good for dinner parties because much of the preparation can be done ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜适合宴会，因为很多准备工作可以事先做好。

sentences.english: Plans for the new school are now in preparation .
sentences.chinese: 新学校的设计图正在绘制中。

sentences.english: a course in food service and food preparation
sentences.chinese: 餐饮服务和备菜课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 准备， 预备； 制剂
detailed_translations.english: the process of preparing something or preparing for something

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

name: relate
trans: 有关， 涉及； 符合； 相处

sentences.english: I don’t understand how the two ideas relate.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白这两个观点有什么联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有关， 涉及； 符合； 相处
detailed_translations.english: if two things relate, they are connected in some way
if two things relate, they are connected in some way

name: critic
trans: 批评家， 爱挑剔的人

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 批评家， 爱挑剔的人
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

sentences.english: We’ll have to take the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好坐电梯了。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building

sentences.english: Check your spelling and grammar.
sentences.chinese: 检查你的拼写和语法。

sentences.english: the rules of English grammar
sentences.chinese: 英语的语法规则

detailed_translations.english: the rules by which words change their forms and are combined into sentences, or the study or use of these rules

sentences.english: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
sentences.chinese: 新的检验使医生能在早期发现该种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible for someone to do something, or for something to happen

name: preliminary
trans: 初步做法， 起始行为

sentences.english: the preliminary stages of the competition
sentences.chinese: 竞赛的预赛阶段

sentences.english: a preliminary draft
sentences.chinese: 初稿

detailed_translations.english: happening before something that is more important, often in order to prepare for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 初步做法， 起始行为

name: dependent
trans: 依靠的， 依赖的； 取决于…的

sentences.english: Jan’s mother was dependent on her for physical care.
sentences.chinese: 简的母亲要靠简来照顾。

sentences.english: Do you have any dependent children (= who you are still supporting financially ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有需要扶养的孩子？

detailed_translations.chinese: 依靠的， 依赖的； 取决于…的
detailed_translations.english: needing someone or something in order to exist, be successful, be healthy etc

name: obstacle
trans: 障碍， 障碍物， 妨碍

sentences.english: The tax puts obstacles in the way of companies trying to develop trade overseas.
sentences.chinese: 这项税收为想在海外发展贸易的公司设置了障碍。

sentences.english: Women still have to overcome many obstacles to gain equality.
sentences.chinese: 妇女要获得平等仍需克服重重障碍。

sentences.english: We want to remove all obstacles to travel between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要消除在这两个国家之间旅行的所有障碍。

sentences.english: the single biggest obstacle to a Conservative victory in the next election
sentences.chinese: 保守党在下一届大选中获胜的最大障碍

sentences.english: There are formidable obstacles on the road to peace.
sentences.chinese: 通往和平的道路上存在难以逾越的障碍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 障碍， 障碍物， 妨碍
detailed_translations.english: something that makes it difficult to achieve some­thing

name: profession
trans: 职业； 声明， 表白

sentences.english: Harper was a teacher by profession.
sentences.chinese: 哈珀的职业是教师。

detailed_translations.chinese: 职业； 声明， 表白
detailed_translations.english: A profession is a type of job that requires advanced education or training

sentences.english: ...a pocket calculator.
sentences.chinese: …一个袖珍计算器。

detailed_translations.english: a small electronic machine that can add, multiply etc

sentences.english: a delivery van
sentences.chinese: 运货车

sentences.english: a van driver
sentences.chinese: 小型货车司机

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle used especially for carrying goods, which is smaller than a truck and has a roof and usually no windows at the sides

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: ...a new computer worm that disables security software.
sentences.chinese: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil

sentences.english: Light silk is best for parachutes, as it compresses well and then expands rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 轻质丝绸最适合制作降落伞，因为这种面料便于压缩，而且展开迅速。

sentences.english: Isobel nodded, her lips compressed.
sentences.chinese: 伊索贝尔紧闭着双唇点了点头。

sentences.english: The miners used rock drills and compressed air to drive through hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 矿工使用钻岩机和压缩空气来凿穿坚硬的岩石。

detailed_translations.english: to press something or make it smaller so that it takes up less space, or to become smaller

name: arise
trans: 出现； 由…引起； 起身， 起床

sentences.english: A crisis has arisen in the Foreign Office.
sentences.chinese: 外交部出现了危机。

sentences.english: More problems like those at the nuclear power plant are certain to arise.
sentences.chinese: 核电厂肯定还会出现那样的问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现； 由…引起； 起身， 起床
detailed_translations.english: if a problem or difficult situation arises, it begins to happen

name: collaborative
trans: 合作的， 协作的， 协力完成的

sentences.english: ...a collaborative research project.
sentences.chinese: …一个合作研究项目。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合作的， 协作的， 协力完成的
detailed_translations.english: A collaborative piece of work is done by two or more people or groups working together

sentences.english: In marriage, a man promises to cherish his wife.
sentences.chinese: 在婚姻中，男人承诺要爱护妻子。

sentences.english: his most cherished possession
sentences.chinese: 他最珍爱的物品

detailed_translations.english: to love someone or something very much and take care of them well

name: constitute
trans: 组成， 形成； 设立； 任命

sentences.english: We must redefine what constitutes a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须对家庭的构成重新定义。

detailed_translations.chinese: 组成， 形成； 设立； 任命
detailed_translations.english: if several people or things constitute something, they are the parts that form it

sentences.english: herds of cattle
sentences.chinese: 成群的牛

sentences.english: a cattle rancher
sentences.chinese: 牧牛场场主

detailed_translations.english: cows and  bull s  kept on a farm for their meat or milk

name: imagination
trans: 想象， 想象力， 空想； 想象出

sentences.english: a storyteller with an incredible imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力极丰富的讲故事者

sentences.english: It does not take much imagination to understand their grief.
sentences.chinese: 不难想象他们是多么悲伤。

sentences.english: With a little imagination, you can find great inexpensive gifts.
sentences.chinese: 稍微动点脑筋，你就会找到物美价廉的礼物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想象， 想象力， 空想； 想象出
detailed_translations.english: the ability to form pictures or ideas in your mind

name: resistance
trans: 反抗， 抵制； 抵抗力， 抵抗性； 阻力； 电阻

sentences.english: disease resistance
sentences.chinese: 抗病能力

detailed_translations.chinese: 反抗， 抵制； 抵抗力， 抵抗性； 阻力； 电阻
detailed_translations.english: a refusal to accept new ideas or changes

sentences.english: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.english: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

detailed_translations.english: Underneath is also an adverb
directly under another object or covered by it
the bottom surface of something, or the part of something that is below or under something else

name: nursery
trans: 托儿所， 保育室； 苗圃

sentences.english: He has painted murals in his children's nursery.
sentences.chinese: 他在他家的育儿室画上了壁画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 托儿所， 保育室； 苗圃
detailed_translations.english: a place where young children are taken care of during the day while their parents are at work

name: mate
trans: 伙伴，同事；配偶，配对物；大副

sentences.english: Rabbits can be mated as early as six months old.
sentences.chinese: 兔子在六个月大时就可以交配了。

detailed_translations.english: if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

detailed_translations.chinese: 伙伴，同事；配偶，配对物；大副
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with

name: convince
trans: 使确信， 使信服， 说服

sentences.english: Her arguments didn’t convince everyone, but changes were made.
sentences.chinese: 她的论点不能说服每个人，但还是引起了一些变化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使确信， 使信服， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel certain that something is true

sentences.english: I am napoleon, I am emperor… burned it!
sentences.chinese: 我就是拿破仑，我就是皇帝…烧掉它！

detailed_translations.english: the man who is the ruler of an empire

sentences.english: I was trying to think of some way to prolong the conversation.
sentences.chinese: 我在想方设法拖长这次谈话。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately make something such as a feeling or an activity last longer

name: theory
trans: 理论， 原理； 学说； 意见， 看法

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 理论， 原理； 学说； 意见， 看法
detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: distress
trans: 忧虑， 痛苦， 悲伤； 不幸

sentences.english: Luke’s behaviour caused his parents great distress.
sentences.chinese: 卢克的行为使他的父母深感忧虑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忧虑， 痛苦， 悲伤； 不幸
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of extreme unhappiness

sentences.english: They kept a small flock of sheep.
sentences.chinese: 他们养了一小群绵羊。

detailed_translations.english: a group of sheep, goats, or birds

name: internal
trans: 内的； 国内的； 内心的

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

detailed_translations.chinese: 内的； 国内的； 内心的
detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

name: extension
trans: 延长部分， 伸展； 电话分机， 分机号码

sentences.english: a loft extension
sentences.chinese: 增建的阁楼

detailed_translations.chinese: 延长部分， 伸展； 电话分机， 分机号码
detailed_translations.english: the process of making a road, building etc bigger or longer, or the part that is added

name: signature
trans: 署名， 签字， 签名

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.chinese: 署名， 签字， 签名
detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

name: steep
trans: 险峻的， 陡峭的； 过高的； 急剧的

sentences.english: The road became rocky and steep.
sentences.chinese: 路变得崎岖陡峭起来。

sentences.english: a steep climb to the top
sentences.chinese: 到山顶的一段陡坡

detailed_translations.chinese: 险峻的， 陡峭的； 过高的； 急剧的
detailed_translations.english: a road, hill etc that is steep slopes at a high angle

sentences.english: I thumbed a lift into town.
sentences.chinese: 我拦顺路车进了城。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade a driver of a passing car to stop and take you somewhere, by putting your hand out with your thumb raised
the part of your hand that is shaped like a thick short finger and helps you to hold things

sentences.english: Lower taxes made Republican voters happier with their party.
sentences.chinese: 更低的税率使共和党选民对该党更加满意。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or supporting a system of government that is not led by a king or queen
someone who believes in government by elected representatives only, with no king or queen

name: literary
trans: 文学的； 文人的， 书卷气的

sentences.english: a literary prize
sentences.chinese: 文学奖

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学的； 文人的， 书卷气的
detailed_translations.english: relating to literature

name: architect
trans: 建筑师， 设计师； 缔造者

sentences.english: Tinoco was one of the architects of the government’s economic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 蒂诺科是政府经济改革的设计师之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑师， 设计师； 缔造者
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

sentences.english: ...the lines on her forehead.
sentences.chinese: …她前额上的皱纹。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair

sentences.english: the classical theory of relativity
sentences.chinese: 经典相对论

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a traditional style or set of ideas

sentences.english: He had no special privileges and was treated just like every other prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

detailed_translations.english: a special advantage that is given only to one person or group of people

sentences.english: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations .
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.english: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.
sentences.chinese: 地震动摇了那幢房子的地基。

detailed_translations.english: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it

sentences.english: Germany brought on a substitute at half time.
sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper
sentences.chinese: 替补守门员

detailed_translations.english: someone who does someone else’s job for a limited period of time, especially in a sports team or school
to use something new or diffe-rent instead of something else

name: punch
trans: 猛击； 冲床； 穿孔机； 力量， 效力

sentences.english: He punched me and knocked my teeth out.
sentences.chinese: 他朝我一拳，打落了我的牙齿。

detailed_translations.english: to hit someone or something hard with your  fist (= closed hand )

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛击； 冲床； 穿孔机； 力量， 效力
detailed_translations.english: a strong effective way of expressing things that makes people interested

name: naturally
trans: 当然； 天然地； 天生地

sentences.english: Naturally, you’ll want to discuss this with your wife.
sentences.chinese: 当然，你一定想和你妻子商量一下这件事。

sentences.english: Naturally enough, she wanted her child to grow up fit and strong.
sentences.chinese: 很自然，她希望自己的孩子健康茁壮地成长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当然； 天然地； 天生地
detailed_translations.english: use this to say that something is normal and not surprising

name: flexibility
trans: 灵活性， 机动性， 柔韧性

sentences.english: Employees expect flexibility in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 员工们盼望工作安排有弹性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵活性， 机动性， 柔韧性
detailed_translations.english: the ability to change or be changed easily to suit a different situation

sentences.english: The police are investigating the mysterious deaths of children at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在调查这家医院的儿童神秘死亡事件。

sentences.english: Benson later disappeared in mysterious circumstances .
sentences.chinese: 本森后来就神秘地失踪了。

sentences.english: There’s something mysterious going on.
sentences.chinese: 出了件怪事。

detailed_translations.english: mysterious events or situations are difficult to explain or understand

name: moreover
trans: 而且， 再者， 此外

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 而且， 再者， 此外
detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

name: identity
trans: 身份； 个性， 特性； 同一性， 一致性

sentences.english: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 凶手的身份仍未查明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 身份； 个性， 特性； 同一性， 一致性
detailed_translations.english: someone’s identity is their name or who they are

name: scatter
trans: 撒， 散播； 散开， 驱散

sentences.english: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.chinese: 撒， 散播； 散开， 驱散
detailed_translations.english: if someone scatters a lot of things, or if they scatter, they are thrown or dropped over a wide area in an irregular way

name: installation
trans: 安装； 装置， 设施； 就任， 就职

sentences.english: the installation and maintenance of alarm systems
sentences.chinese: 警报系统的安装和维护

detailed_translations.chinese: 安装； 装置， 设施； 就任， 就职
detailed_translations.english: when someone fits a piece of equipment somewhere

sentences.english: Some of his most powerful writing is based on his childhood experiences.
sentences.chinese: 他的一些最震慑人心的作品是根据儿时经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: books, poems, articles etc, especially those by a particular writer or about a particular subject

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

name: violate
trans: 违反， 违背； 亵渎； 侵犯； 妨碍

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.chinese: 违反， 违背； 亵渎； 侵犯； 妨碍
detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

name: verify
trans: 证实， 查证， 证明

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 证实， 查证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true

sentences.english: a collective decision made by all board members
sentences.chinese: 董事会所有成员作出的集体决定

sentences.english: our collective responsibility for the environment
sentences.chinese: 我们对环境的共同责任

detailed_translations.english: shared or made by every member of a group or society
a group of people who work together to run something such as a business or farm, and who share the profits equally

sentences.english: a shopping excursion
sentences.chinese: 购物游

detailed_translations.english: a short journey arranged so that a group of people can visit a place, especially while they are on holiday

name: steer
trans: 掌舵， 驾驶； 操纵

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掌舵， 驾驶； 操纵
detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

name: event
trans: 事件， 大事， 事变

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.chinese: 事件， 大事， 事变
detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

name: academy
trans: 研究会， 学会； 专门学校

sentences.english: the American Academy of Arts and Letters
sentences.chinese: 美国艺术和文学学会

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究会， 学会； 专门学校
detailed_translations.english: an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

name: undergo
trans: 经历， 经受， 忍受； 接受

sentences.english: The country has undergone massive changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家最近经历了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: He has been released from prison to undergo medical treatment in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 他获释出狱去美国接受治疗。

sentences.english: She has been undergoing tests since Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她从星期一开始一直在接受各种检查。

sentences.english: Teachers should be expected to undergo mid-career training and development.
sentences.chinese: 教师应该参加中期职业培训和发展活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 经历， 经受， 忍受； 接受
detailed_translations.english: if you undergo a change, an unpleasant experience etc, it happens to you or is done to you

name: reward
trans: 报答， 酬谢， 奖励

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard

detailed_translations.chinese: 报答， 酬谢， 奖励
detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked for it

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

name: sympathize
trans: 同情， 怜悯； 体谅； 赞同

sentences.english: I sympathize, but I don’t know how to help.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情，但不知道如何帮忙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 同情， 怜悯； 体谅； 赞同
detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry for someone because you understand their problems

name: alongside
trans: 在…旁边， 沿着…的边； 和…在一起

sentences.english: A car drew up alongside .
sentences.chinese: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.english: Children’s prices are shown alongside adult prices.
sentences.chinese: 儿童票价标在成人票价旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to the side of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…旁边， 沿着…的边； 和…在一起

name: swallow
trans: 吞， 咽； 轻信， 轻易接受； 承受， 使不流露； 咽下口水

sentences.english: He downed his whisky in one swallow.
sentences.chinese: 他一口喝下威士忌。

detailed_translations.english: a small black and white bird that comes to northern countries in the summer

detailed_translations.chinese: 吞， 咽； 轻信， 轻易接受； 承受， 使不流露； 咽下口水
detailed_translations.english: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

name: agency
trans: 经办， 代理； 代理处； 专门行政部门

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

detailed_translations.chinese: 经办， 代理； 代理处； 专门行政部门
detailed_translations.english: a business that provides a particular service for people or organizations

name: coupon
trans: 礼券， 优惠券， 配给券； 联票； 票证

sentences.english: The coupon entitles you to ten cents off your next purchase.
sentences.chinese: 这张优惠券可以让你在下次购物时节省10分钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼券， 优惠券， 配给券； 联票； 票证
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free

sentences.english: The supplies were sent on the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 补给经由铁路运送。

sentences.english: a railroad station
sentences.chinese: 火车站

detailed_translations.english: a railway or the railway

sentences.english: Neutrons and protons are bound together in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.chinese: 在一个原子的核内，中子和质子聚合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: the central part of an atom, made up of neutrons, protons, and other elementary particles

name: fascinating
trans: 迷人的， 有极大吸引力的

sentences.english: a fascinating book
sentences.chinese: 一本引人入胜的书

sentences.english: That sounds absolutely fascinating .
sentences.chinese: 那听起来极具吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的， 有极大吸引力的
detailed_translations.english: extremely interesting

name: abstract
trans: 摘要， 梗概； 抽象派艺术作品

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要， 梗概； 抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people
to write a document containing the most important ideas or points from a speech, article etc

sentences.english: He was stung by a bee.
sentences.chinese: 他被蜜蜂蜇了。

detailed_translations.english: if an insect or a plant stings you, it makes a very small hole in your skin and you feel a sharp pain because of a poisonous substance
a wound or mark made when an insect or plant stings you

name: haste
trans: 急速， 急忙； 草率

sentences.english: I soon regretted my haste.
sentences.chinese: 我很快就对自己的仓促感到后悔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急速， 急忙； 草率

sentences.english: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

detailed_translations.english: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with

name: appearance
trans: 出现， 来到； 外观

sentences.english: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.english: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.english: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.english: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.english: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.english: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.english: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.english: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现， 来到； 外观
detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something looks to other people

name: liquid
trans: 液体的； 清澈的； 流畅的

sentences.english: Children take antibiotics in liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 儿童服用液态抗生素。

sentences.english: liquid soap
sentences.chinese: 液体皂

detailed_translations.chinese: 液体的； 清澈的； 流畅的
detailed_translations.english: in the form of a liquid instead of a gas or solid
a substance that is not a solid or a gas, for example water or milk

name: culture
trans: 文化， 文明； 教养； 培养； 培养菌

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文化， 文明； 教养； 培养； 培养菌
detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

sentences.english: a dress with long sleeves
sentences.chinese: 长袖连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: the part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm

name: devotion
trans: 献身， 奉献； 忠实； 热爱； 虔诚

sentences.english: At first she was flattered by his devotion.
sentences.chinese: 最初他的挚爱使她感到受宠若惊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 献身， 奉献； 忠实； 热爱； 虔诚
detailed_translations.english: the loyalty that you show towards a person, job etc, especially by working hard

name: anonymous
trans: 匿名的； 无名的； 无特色的

sentences.english: the anonymous author of a collection of poems
sentences.chinese: 一本诗集的佚名作者

sentences.english: According to one employee, who wishes to remain anonymous , the company engaged in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 根据一位不愿透露姓名的员工所述，这家公司曾从事非法活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 匿名的； 无名的； 无特色的
detailed_translations.english: unknown by name

name: stir
trans: 搅拌， 搅动； 激动， 骚乱

sentences.english: Stir the paint to make sure it is smooth.
sentences.chinese: 将油漆搅拌至均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to move a liquid or substance around with a spoon or stick in order to mix it together

detailed_translations.chinese: 搅拌， 搅动； 激动， 骚乱
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of excitement or annoyance

sentences.english: The Algarve is a paradise for fishermen whether river anglers or deep-sea fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔加维对河边的垂钓者或深海的渔民都是一个天堂。

detailed_translations.english: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job

name: span
trans: 持续， 贯穿； 包括； 横跨， 跨越

sentences.english: It’ll be difficult to hire that many new staff in such a short time span .
sentences.chinese: 在这么短的时间里要想招聘到那么多新员工是很难的。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time between two dates or events

detailed_translations.chinese: 持续， 贯穿； 包括； 横跨， 跨越
detailed_translations.english: to include all of a period of time

sentences.english: Nobody insults my family and gets away with it!
sentences.chinese: 谁也别想侮辱了我的家人之后就这么算了！

sentences.english: I hope Andy won’t be insulted if I don’t come.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不来，希望安迪不要介意。

detailed_translations.english: to offend someone by saying or doing something they think is rude
a remark or action that is offensive or deliberately rude

name: existence
trans: 存在， 实在， 生存

sentences.english: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.chinese: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 存在， 实在， 生存
detailed_translations.english: the state of existing

name: craft
trans: 工艺， 手艺； 船， 航空器

sentences.english: traditional rural crafts
sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.english: arts and crafts
sentences.chinese: 手工艺

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺， 手艺； 船， 航空器
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do

sentences.english: He worked in a butcher's.
sentences.chinese: 他在肉铺工作。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells meat
to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat

name: poll
trans: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
对…进行民意测验； 获得

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

sentences.english: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people or things within a much larger group

name: pole
trans: 杆； 极， 磁极， 电极

sentences.english: a telephone pole
sentences.chinese: 电话线杆

detailed_translations.chinese: 杆； 极， 磁极， 电极
detailed_translations.english: one of two points at the ends of a  magnet  where its power is the strongest

name: float
trans: 浮动， 漂浮； 飘动

sentences.english: I looked up at the clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望着天上的浮云。

sentences.english: Leaves floated gently down from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 叶子从树上轻轻飘落。

detailed_translations.chinese: 浮动， 漂浮； 飘动
detailed_translations.english: if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air

name: graceful
trans: 优美的， 优雅的； 得体的

sentences.english: Her movements were graceful and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 她举手投足优雅而高贵。

sentences.english: The branches formed a graceful curve.
sentences.chinese: 那些树枝形成一条优美的曲线。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优美的， 优雅的； 得体的
detailed_translations.english: moving in a smooth and attractive way, or having an attractive shape or form

sentences.english: Further down the supply chain, garlic prices have jumped tenfold on wholesale markets in big cities and fourfold nationwide.
sentences.chinese: 沿供应链向下，其大城市批发价格跳升十倍，而全国售价则上升四倍。

sentences.english: The "other" division, in which they are lumped with cloud services, grew nearly fourfold, but is still less than one-tenth of the top line.
sentences.chinese: 与云服务一同被归类到“其他”业务的部门增长近四倍，但营收仍不到总营收的十分之一。

sentences.english: Doubling hf-current results in a doubling of current density and a fourfold heat provided that the area of effective contact between the tissue ang the electrode remains constant.
sentences.chinese: 如果人体组织和电极之间的有效接触面积保持不变，那么高频电流强度扩大一倍将会使电流密度增大一倍，并产生四倍的热量。

detailed_translations.english: by or up to four times as many or as much
four times as much or as many

name: preferable
trans: 更可取的， 更好的， 更合意的

sentences.english: For this dish, fresh herbs and garlic are preferable.
sentences.chinese: 做这道菜，用新鲜香草和大蒜更好。

sentences.english: In warm weather, clothes made of natural fabrics are infinitely preferable (= much better ) .
sentences.chinese: 天气暖和的时候，穿天然织物的衣服要舒适得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更可取的， 更好的， 更合意的
detailed_translations.english: better or more suitable

name: reference
trans: 提到， 论及； 参考； 引文； 参考书目； 证明书， 证明人

sentences.english: He made no reference to any agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他没有提到任何协议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提到， 论及； 参考； 引文； 参考书目； 证明书， 证明人
detailed_translations.english: part of something you say or write in which you mention a person or thing

sentences.english: She was really of the cold frog.
sentences.chinese: 她真的很害怕这只冰冷的青蛙。

sentences.english: Maybe a little frog on my hip, or a gecko.
sentences.chinese: 也许在臀部刺一只小青蛙还是壁虎什么的。

detailed_translations.english: a small green animal that lives near water and has long legs for jumping

sentences.english: I refused her a divorce, out of spite I suppose.
sentences.chinese: 我拒绝了她离婚的要求，我想是出于怨恨。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting to hurt or upset people, for example because you are  jealous  or think you have been unfairly treated

name: chamber
trans: 会议室， 会所； 房间； 腔， 室

sentences.english: a combustion chamber
sentences.chinese: 燃烧室

sentences.english: The heart has four chambers.
sentences.chinese: 心脏有四个腔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会议室， 会所； 房间； 腔， 室
detailed_translations.english: an enclosed space, especially in your body or inside a machine

name: arrange
trans: 安排， 准备， 整理

sentences.english: Contact your local branch to arrange an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 请联络当地分部安排预约。

sentences.english: I’d like to arrange a business loan.
sentences.chinese: 我想办理一笔商业贷款。

sentences.english: Matthew arrived at 2 o'clock as arranged.
sentences.chinese: 马修两点钟依约而至。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 准备， 整理
detailed_translations.english: to organize or make plans for something such as a meeting, party, or trip

name: coarse
trans: 粗的， 粗糙的； 粗劣的； 粗俗的

sentences.english: a jacket of coarse wool
sentences.chinese: 粗羊毛夹克衫

detailed_translations.chinese: 粗的， 粗糙的； 粗劣的； 粗俗的
detailed_translations.english: having a rough surface that feels slightly hard

sentences.english: I am planning a 25th birthday party for my nephew.
sentences.chinese: 我正在为侄子筹划他25岁的生日聚会。

detailed_translations.english: the son of your brother or sister, or the son of your husband’s or wife’s brother or sister

name: publicity
trans: 公众的注意， 名声； 宣传， 宣扬

sentences.english: Much advance publicity was given to the talks.
sentences.chinese: 会谈之前做了大量的宣传。

sentences.english: ...government publicity campaigns.
sentences.chinese: …政府的宣传活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公众的注意， 名声； 宣传， 宣扬
detailed_translations.english: Publicity is information or actions that are intended to attract the public's attention to someone or something

name: depart
trans: 离开， 起程， 出发

sentences.english: Flights by Air Europe depart Gatwick on Tuesdays.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲航空公司的航班每逢周二从盖特威克机场起飞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离开， 起程， 出发
detailed_translations.english: to leave, especially when you are starting a journey

sentences.english: I couldn’t sleep for three days – I’m not exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 我三天没睡觉了——一点不夸张。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem better, larger, worse etc than it really is

sentences.english: an implied threat
sentences.chinese: 隐含的威胁

detailed_translations.english: to suggest that something is true, without saying this directly

name: capture
trans: 捕获， 俘获； 夺得

sentences.english: Government troops have succeeded in capturing the rebel leader.
sentences.chinese: 政府军已经成功抓获叛乱分子的头目。

sentences.english: 40 captured French soldiers
sentences.chinese: 40名被俘虏的法国士兵

detailed_translations.chinese: 捕获， 俘获； 夺得
detailed_translations.english: to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner

name: commitment
trans: 承诺， 许诺， 保证； 信奉， 献身； 承担的义务

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.chinese: 承诺， 许诺， 保证； 信奉， 献身； 承担的义务
detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

sentences.english: ...a garden spade.
sentences.chinese: …一把花园里使用的锹。

detailed_translations.english: a tool for digging that has a long handle and a broad metal blade that you push into the ground

sentences.english: the company that manufactured the drug
sentences.chinese: 生产这种药的公司

sentences.english: manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 工业品，制成品

detailed_translations.english: to use machines to make goods or materials, usually in large numbers or amounts
the process of making goods or materials using machines, usually in large numbers or amounts

name: sequence
trans: 连续， 接续， 一连串； 次序， 顺序

sentences.english: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence .
sentences.chinese: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连续， 接续， 一连串； 次序， 顺序
detailed_translations.english: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in

name: collision
trans: 碰撞； 冲突， 抵触

sentences.english: Two people were killed in a head-on collision (= between two vehicles that are moving directly towards each other ) on highway 218.
sentences.chinese: 218号公路上有两辆汽车迎面相撞，两人死亡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碰撞； 冲突， 抵触
detailed_translations.english: an accident in which two or more people or vehicles hit each other while moving in different directions

name: qualification
trans: 资格， 资格证明， 合格证书； 限制， 限定

sentences.english: He left school without any qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。

detailed_translations.chinese: 资格， 资格证明， 合格证书； 限制， 限定
detailed_translations.english: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject

name: provision
trans: 供应； 准备； 条款， 规定； 给养， 口粮

sentences.english: He made provisions for his wife and his children in his will.
sentences.chinese: 在遗嘱里他为妻子和孩子都做好了安排。

detailed_translations.chinese: 供应； 准备； 条款， 规定； 给养， 口粮
detailed_translations.english: when you provide something that someone needs now or in the future

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

detailed_translations.english: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

name: thrust
trans: 戳， 刺； 要点， 要旨； 推力

sentences.english: He jumped back to avoid another thrust of the knife.
sentences.chinese: 他往后一闪，躲避再次捅来的一刀。

detailed_translations.english: to make a sudden movement forward with a sword or knife

detailed_translations.chinese: 戳， 刺； 要点， 要旨； 推力
detailed_translations.english: the main meaning or aim of what someone is saying or doing

sentences.english: He claims he is not really interested in fame.
sentences.chinese: 他称自己对出名真的没有兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being known about by a lot of people because of your achievements

name: replacement
trans: 代替， 取代； 更换， 调换； 替代的人

sentences.english: Our old car is badly in need of replacement.
sentences.chinese: 我们的旧车急需更换。

sentences.english: replacement windows
sentences.chinese: 新换的窗户

detailed_translations.chinese: 代替， 取代； 更换， 调换； 替代的人
detailed_translations.english: when you get something that is newer or better than the one you had before

sentences.english: By the end of the game, all the kids were covered in mud.
sentences.chinese: 到了比赛快结束的时候，所有的孩子都浑身是泥。

sentences.english: The path beside the river was slippery with mud.
sentences.chinese: 河边的小路泥泞湿滑。

sentences.english: Many villages in Mali consist of mud huts.
sentences.chinese: 马里的大多数村庄都是泥草房。

sentences.english: boots caked with mud
sentences.chinese: 沾满泥巴的靴子

sentences.english: It was impossible to move the car – its wheels had got stuck in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 这车子动不了——车轮陷到烂泥里了。

detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

sentences.english: a coffee mug
sentences.chinese: 一个咖啡杯

detailed_translations.english: a tall cup used for drinking tea, coffee etc
to attack someone and rob them in a public place

sentences.english: This went on until one day when I was fishing with a friend of mine at a nearby pond.
sentences.chinese: 这样持续了一段时间，直到有一天，当我在我的一个朋友在附近的一个池塘钓鱼。

sentences.english: For those who live in this area, the field, pond and trees they can see from the site are not special but close to them.
sentences.chinese: 对于那些在该地区生活的人来说，能从场地看到田地、池塘和树木并不特别，但胜在距离较近。

detailed_translations.english: a small area of fresh water that is smaller than a lake, that is either natural or artificially made

name: arrival
trans: 到达， 到来； 到达者， 到达物

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 到达， 到来； 到达者， 到达物
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

sentences.english: We believe in investing in scientific research.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信科学研究的投资价值。

sentences.english: the limits of scientific knowledge
sentences.chinese: 科学知识的极限

sentences.english: decisions based on scientific evidence
sentences.chinese: 根据科学证据作出的决定

sentences.english: the international scientific community (= scientists )
sentences.chinese: 国际科学界

detailed_translations.english: about or related to science, or using its methods

sentences.english: Trains rushed past at frequent intervals .
sentences.chinese: 火车频频驶过。

sentences.english: She was a frequent visitor to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她是家里的常客。

detailed_translations.english: happening or doing something often
to go to a particular place often

name: according
trans: 相等的， 一致的， 依…而定的

detailed_translations.chinese: 相等的， 一致的， 依…而定的

sentences.english: Have you insured the contents of your home?
sentences.chinese: 你给家庭财产投保了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to buy insurance so that you will receive money if something bad happens to you, your family, your possessions etc

sentences.english: curry powder
sentences.chinese: 咖喱粉

sentences.english: talcum powder
sentences.chinese: 滑石[爽身]粉

sentences.english: Grind the sugar into a powder .
sentences.chinese: 把糖碾成粉末。

sentences.english: The paint is supplied in powder form .
sentences.chinese: 这种涂料以粉末状供应。

detailed_translations.english: a dry substance in the form of very small grains

name: membership
trans: 会员身份， 会籍； 全体会员， 会员数

sentences.english: You should carry your membership card with you at all times.
sentences.chinese: 你应该随身携带会员卡。

sentences.english: Membership fees are being increased this year.
sentences.chinese: 会费今年提高了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会员身份， 会籍； 全体会员， 会员数
detailed_translations.english: when someone is a member of a club, group, or organization

name: error
trans: 错误， 谬误， 差错

sentences.english: an error message
sentences.chinese: 出错信息

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误， 谬误， 差错
detailed_translations.english: a mistake

name: platform
trans: 平台， 站台， 讲台； 纲领， 宣言

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平台， 站台， 讲台； 纲领， 宣言
detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

name: network
trans: 网状物； 广播网， 电视网； 网络

sentences.english: Hungary’s telephone network
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利的电话网

sentences.english: a high-speed European rail network
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的高速铁路网

detailed_translations.chinese: 网状物； 广播网， 电视网； 网络
detailed_translations.english: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

name: jealous
trans: 妒忌的， 猜疑的； 精心守护的

sentences.english: a country jealous of its heritage
sentences.chinese: 珍惜其传统的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 妒忌的， 猜疑的； 精心守护的
detailed_translations.english: feeling unhappy because someone has something that you wish you had

sentences.english: The metal had begun to rust.
sentences.chinese: 金属开始生锈。

sentences.english: The gate was old and badly rusted.
sentences.chinese: 大门很旧，锈得厉害。

detailed_translations.english: to become covered with rust, or to make something become covered in rust
the reddish-brown substance that forms on iron or steel when it gets wet

name: trace
trans: 跟踪； 追溯； 描摹

sentences.english: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.english: Petra’s lost all trace of her German accent.
sentences.chinese: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.english: Officers were unable to find any trace of drugs.
sentences.chinese: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

detailed_translations.english: a small sign that shows that someone or something was present or existed

detailed_translations.chinese: 跟踪； 追溯； 描摹
detailed_translations.english: to find the origins of when something began or where it came from

sentences.english: It meant that I, a humble Negro girl, had just as much chance as anybody in the sight and love of God.
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着，我这样一个卑微的黑人女孩，也可以像其他人一样有很多机会受到上帝的关注和爱。

sentences.english: Those who hope that the Negro needed to blow off steam and will now be content will have a rude awakening if the nation returns to business as usual.
sentences.chinese: 那些希望的人是否国家回到一切如常，黑人需要吹远的蒸气并且现在将会是内容将会有一个粗鲁无礼的唤醒。

sentences.english: The movement to oppose racial discrimination was personally initiated and led by a famous Negro leader.
sentences.chinese: 这次反种族歧视运动是由一位著名的黑人领袖亲自发动和领导的。

detailed_translations.english: a word for a black person, usually considered offensive

sentences.english: We should all make contributions to the modernization of our country.
sentences.chinese: 我们都应该对我国的现代化作出贡献。

sentences.english: I believe the children we help today will be well educated, which will contribute a lot to the modernization of our country.
sentences.chinese: 我相信，我们今天帮助的孩子们会受到良好的教育， 而这将对我国的现代化作出巨大的贡献。

sentences.english: Matthew’s life is in grave danger .
sentences.chinese: 马修的生命危在旦夕。

sentences.english: The report expressed grave concern over the technicians’ lack of training.
sentences.chinese: 报告中对技术人员缺乏培训深表忧虑。

sentences.english: I have grave doubts about his ability.
sentences.chinese: 我十分怀疑他的能力。

sentences.english: The situation is becoming very grave.
sentences.chinese: 形势变得非常严峻。

detailed_translations.english: grave problems, situations, or worries are very great or bad
the place in the ground where a dead body is buried

sentences.english: The relationship between victimology and criminology is a longstanding issue within the academic realm.
sentences.chinese: 被害人学与犯罪学之间的关系问题是学界的一个宿疑。

sentences.english: While beefed up network security is crucial criminology professor David Maimon, of the University of Maryland, says that's only half the solution.
sentences.chinese: 在加强网络安全至关重要时，马里兰大学的犯罪学教授大卫·麦农表示那只是一半的解决方案。

sentences.english: The idealistic criminology student's rise to police chief in one of Mexico's most violent areas thrust Valles Garcia into the international spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 这位主修犯罪学的理想主义者的学生升任墨西哥最暴力地区的警长后就进入了国际媒体的视野。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of crime and criminals

name: advantage
trans: 优点， 优势， 好处

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优点， 优势， 好处
detailed_translations.english: a good or useful feature that something has

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.
someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

sentences.english: We’re staying at the Holiday Inn.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在假日酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a small hotel or pub, especially an old one in the countryside

name: instead
trans: 作为替代； 却， 反而

sentences.english: Geoff didn’t study law. Instead, he decided to become an actor.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫没学法律，相反，他决定当演员。

sentences.english: If Jo can’t attend the meeting, I could go instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果乔不能去开会，我可以代他去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为替代； 却， 反而
detailed_translations.english: used to say what is done, when you have just said that a particular thing is not done

sentences.english: a political controversy
sentences.chinese: 政治争议

sentences.english: the controversy surrounding Skinner’s theories
sentences.chinese: 围绕斯金纳的理论的争议

sentences.english: (= began ) over the use of the chemicals on crops.
sentences.chinese: 对庄稼施用化学品的做法引起了争论。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument about something that involves many people and continues for a long time

name: command
trans: 命令， 指挥， 控制

sentences.english: He commands the 4th Battalion.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥第四营。

detailed_translations.chinese: 命令， 指挥， 控制
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone officially to do something, especially if you are a military leader, a king etc

sentences.english: Eight new national newspapers have appeared on the newsstands since 1981.
sentences.chinese: 自1981年以来，有八家全国性报纸已在报摊上有售。

detailed_translations.english: A newsstand is a stall in the street or a public place, which sells newspapers and magazines

sentences.english: The house was full of worthless junk.
sentences.chinese: 这房子里堆满了没有用的东西。

sentences.english: The information was worthless to me.
sentences.chinese: 这些资料对我毫无用处。

detailed_translations.english: something that is worthless has no value, importance, or use

name: performance
trans: 演出； 执行， 完成； 工作情况， 表现； 工作性能

sentences.english: This evening’s performance will begin at 8.00 pm.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的演出8点开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演出； 执行， 完成； 工作情况， 表现； 工作性能
detailed_translations.english: when someone performs a play or a piece of music

sentences.english: She had homemade ice cream for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了些自制冰淇淋当餐后甜点。

detailed_translations.english: sweet food served after the main part of a meal

name: ambassador
trans: 大使， 使节， 派驻国际组织的代表

sentences.english: ...the German ambassador to Poland.
sentences.chinese: …德国驻波兰大使。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大使， 使节， 派驻国际组织的代表
detailed_translations.english: an important official who represents his or her government in a foreign country

name: anticipate
trans: 预料， 预期， 期望； 先于…行动； 提前使用

sentences.english: Sales are better than anticipated.
sentences.chinese: 销量比预期要好。

sentences.english: A good speaker is able to anticipate an audience’s needs and concerns.
sentences.chinese: 好的演讲者能够预先考虑到听众需要什么、关注什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 预料， 预期， 期望； 先于…行动； 提前使用
detailed_translations.english: to expect that something will happen and be ready for it

sentences.english: Expect variable cloudiness and fog tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 预计明天多云有雾，天气多变。

sentences.english: Interest rates can be highly variable.
sentences.chinese: 利率有时会大幅波动。

detailed_translations.english: likely to change often
something that may be different in different situations, so that you cannot be sure what will happen

name: temple
trans: 圣堂， 神殿， 庙宇

detailed_translations.chinese: 圣堂， 神殿， 庙宇
detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: growth
trans: 增长， 增长量； 生长， 生长物

sentences.english: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 刺激经济增长的措施

sentences.english: The company is preparing for zero growth (= no growth ) this year.
sentences.chinese: 公司今年准备面对零增长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 增长， 增长量； 生长， 生长物
detailed_translations.english: an increase in the value of goods or services produced and sold by a business or a country

sentences.english: the beauty of the New England landscape
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰风光之美

detailed_translations.english: an area of countryside or land of a particular type, used especially when talking about its appearance
to make a park, garden etc look attractive and interesting by changing its design, and by planting trees and bushes etc

sentences.english: hand-woven scarves
sentences.chinese: 手织围巾

sentences.english: Only a few of the women still weave.
sentences.chinese: 只有数量很少的妇女还在编织。

sentences.english: traditional basket weaving
sentences.chinese: 传统的编篮技术

detailed_translations.english: to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom

sentences.english: grated carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的胡萝卜

sentences.english: carrot juice
sentences.chinese: 胡萝卜汁

detailed_translations.english: a long pointed orange vegetable that grows under the ground

sentences.english: The journey normally takes about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 这段旅程通常需要大约两小时。

sentences.english: Normally, I park behind the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 通常我把车停在剧院后面。

detailed_translations.english: usually

sentences.english: It’s been cold, but today’s an exception.
sentences.chinese: 天气一直寒冷，但今天是个例外。

sentences.english: The law applies to all EU countries; Britain is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 这项法律适用于所有欧盟国家，英国也不例外。

sentences.english: We don’t usually accept checks, but for you we’ll make an exception (= not include you in this rule ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一般不接受支票，但对你我们就破个例。

sentences.english: The spelling of this word is an interesting exception to the rule.
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的拼法是该规则一个有趣的例外。

sentences.english: Successful two-career couples are still the exception, not the rule (= used to emphasize that something is unusual ).
sentences.chinese: 夫妇俩都事业有成的仍不常见。

detailed_translations.english: something or someone that is not included in a general statement or does not follow a rule or pattern

sentences.english: The governor gave only a vague outline of his tax plan.
sentences.chinese: 州长只是含糊地大致说了一下他的税务计划。

detailed_translations.english: unclear because someone does not give enough detailed information or does not say exactly what they mean

sentences.english: temporary pain relief
sentences.chinese: 疼痛的暂时缓解

sentences.english: I’m living with my parents, but it’s only temporary.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母住在一起，但这只是暂时的。

sentences.english: You might want to consider temporary work until you decide what you want to do.
sentences.chinese: 在你定下来想做什么之前，也许可以考虑干点临时性工作。

sentences.english: She was employed on a temporary basis .
sentences.chinese: 她是受雇干临时性工作的。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for only a limited period of time

sentences.english: It is unlikely that the marine industry will fare any better in September.
sentences.chinese: 海运业不大可能在9月份有所好转。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something fares well or badly, you are referring to the degree of success they achieve in a particular situation or activity
the price you pay to travel somewhere by bus, train, plane etc

name: desperate
trans: 拼死的， 不顾一切的； 绝望的； 极需要的

sentences.english: I had no money left and was desperate.
sentences.chinese: 我身无分文，已经走投无路了。

sentences.english: Time was running out and we were getting desperate .
sentences.chinese: 时间越来越少，我们越来越感到绝望。

sentences.english: the missing teenager’s desperate parents
sentences.chinese: 失踪少年绝望的父母

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼死的， 不顾一切的； 绝望的； 极需要的
detailed_translations.english: willing to do anything to change a very bad situation, and not caring about danger

name: leading
trans: 指导的， 带头的； 最主要的； 饰演主角的

sentences.english: ...a leading member of the city's Sikh community.
sentences.chinese: …该市锡克教团体的一名主要成员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指导的， 带头的； 最主要的； 饰演主角的
detailed_translations.english: The leading person or thing in a particular area is the one which is most important or successful

name: awful
trans: 令人不愉快的， 难过的； 非常的， 极大的

sentences.english: An awful lot of people (=  a large number of people  ) died in the war.
sentences.chinese: 很多很多的人在这场战争中死去。

sentences.english: He made me feel an awful fool.
sentences.chinese: 他让我感觉像个大傻瓜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人不愉快的， 难过的； 非常的， 极大的
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much or how good, bad etc something is

sentences.english: He passes the ball with unerring accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 他传球准确无误。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to do something in an exact way without making a mistake

name: handy
trans: 手边的， 便于使用的

sentences.english: It’s quite a handy little tool.
sentences.chinese: 这件小工具非常有用。

sentences.english: It’s very handy having a light above your desk.
sentences.chinese: 书桌上方有盏灯很有用。

sentences.english: Take your swimming trunks with you – they might come in handy (= be useful ).
sentences.chinese: 带上你的游泳裤，可能会派上用场的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 手边的， 便于使用的
detailed_translations.english: useful

name: urge
trans: 鼓励；推进，催促；竭力主张，强烈要求

sentences.english: The charity urged quick action.
sentences.chinese: 慈善机构敦促迅速采取行动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鼓励；推进，催促；竭力主张，强烈要求
detailed_translations.english: to strongly suggest that someone does something
a strong wish or need

name: resolution
trans: 正式决定， 决议； 决心， 决意； 解决， 解答； 分辨率， 清晰度

sentences.english: a resolution calling for a ban on dumping nuclear waste
sentences.chinese: 要求禁止倾倒核废物的决议

sentences.english: They have failed to comply with the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有遵守决议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正式决定， 决议； 决心， 决意； 解决， 解答； 分辨率， 清晰度
detailed_translations.english: a formal decision or statement agreed on by a group of people, especially after a vote

sentences.english: We flew to Athens via Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们经由巴黎飞往雅典。

detailed_translations.english: travelling through a place on the way to another place

name: setting
trans: 环境， 背景， 布景； 调节， 设定的位置

sentences.english: I’ve worked with children in various settings, mainly in secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 我在许多地方教过孩子，主要是在中学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 环境， 背景， 布景； 调节， 设定的位置
detailed_translations.english: the place where something is or where something happens, and the general environment

name: score
trans: 得， 给…打分； 画线于， 做记号于； 赢得

sentences.english: Great cheers went up when he scored in the final minute of the game.
sentences.chinese: 当他在比赛的最后一分钟得分时，人群爆发出了雷鸣般的欢呼。

sentences.english: She scored an average of 9.9 in the test.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试她的平均分是9.9。

detailed_translations.chinese: 得， 给…打分； 画线于， 做记号于； 赢得
detailed_translations.english: to win a point in a sport, game, competition, or test
the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

name: quote
trans: 引文， 引语； 报价， 牌价； 引号

sentences.english: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.english: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.chinese: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written

detailed_translations.chinese: 引文， 引语； 报价， 牌价； 引号
detailed_translations.english: a sentence or phrase from a book, speech etc which you repeat in a speech or piece of writing because it is interesting or amusing

sentences.english: a graduate student
sentences.chinese: 研究生

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involved in studies done at a university after completing a first degree
to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
someone who has completed a university degree, especially a first degree

sentences.english: the great potato famine in Ireland
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰严重的土豆荒

sentences.english: A million people are facing famine .
sentences.chinese: 一百万人正面临饥荒。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a large number of people have little or no food for a long time and many people die
a British spelling of  gram

name: absent
trans: 缺席的， 不在场的； 缺乏的， 不存在的； 心不在焉的

sentences.english: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席的， 不在场的； 缺乏的， 不存在的； 心不在焉的
detailed_translations.english: not at work, school, a meeting etc, because you are sick or decide not to go

name: rag
trans: 破布， 碎布； 破旧衣服

sentences.english: He wiped his boots dry with an old rag.
sentences.chinese: 他用一块旧布把他的靴子擦干。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破布， 碎布； 破旧衣服
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of old cloth, for example one used for cleaning things

sentences.english: the film’s stunning visuals

detailed_translations.english: something such as a picture or the part of a film, video etc that you can see, as opposed to the parts that you hear

name: understanding
trans: 体谅的， 宽容的， 通情达理的
理解，理解力；谅解；协议；相互理解，融洽

sentences.english: Luckily, I have a very under­standing boss.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，我有一个非常通情达理的上司。

detailed_translations.chinese: 体谅的， 宽容的， 通情达理的
detailed_translations.english: sympathetic and kind about other people’s problems

detailed_translations.chinese: 理解，理解力；谅解；协议；相互理解，融洽
detailed_translations.english: an unofficial or informal agreement

sentences.english: the Roman empire
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国

name: educate
trans: 教育， 培养， 训练

sentences.chinese: 奥默罗德学校的教育对象为残疾儿童。

detailed_translations.chinese: 教育， 培养， 训练

sentences.chinese: 在梦中，他变成了一个小精灵。

trans: 惭愧的， 羞耻的， 害臊的

sentences.chinese: 每个人都会有哭的时候——没什么好难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 惭愧的， 羞耻的， 害臊的
detailed_translations.english: feeling very sorry and embarrassed because of something you have done

trans: 指示， 命令； 通知； 教授， 训练

sentences.chinese: 伊娃按照指示径直去了宾馆。

sentences.chinese: 这点通过在实验室中用老鼠做试验得到证明。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that looks like a large mouse with a long tail

sentences.chinese: 选举伦敦市长

detailed_translations.english: the person who has been elected to lead the government of a town or city

sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的孩子都乘公交车上学。

sentences.english: He was virtually unknown before running for office.
sentences.chinese: 他在参加竞选之前几乎不为人知。

detailed_translations.english: almost

trans: 相当， 尚可， 还； 公平地
