sentences.chinese: 那幢房子有个不小的花园。

sentences.english: She speaks English fairly well.
sentences.chinese: 她英语讲得还不错。

sentences.english: The instructions seem fairly straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 操作指南似乎很简明。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相当， 尚可， 还； 公平地
detailed_translations.english: more than a little, but much less than very

name: handwriting
trans: 笔迹， 手迹； 书法

sentences.english: I recognised her handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 我认出了信封上她的笔迹。

sentences.english: My handwriting has never been very neat.
sentences.chinese: 我的字从来都写得不够工整。

detailed_translations.chinese: 笔迹， 手迹； 书法
detailed_translations.english: the style of someone’s writing

sentences.english: He had a job with an Edinburgh wine merchant.
sentences.chinese: 他在爱丁堡的一个葡萄酒商那里做过事。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to buy and sell wine, coal etc, or a small company that does this

name: raw
trans: 自然状态的， 未加工过的； 生的； 未经分析的， 原始的； 生疏无知的， 未经训练的； 露肉而刺痛的

sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自然状态的， 未加工过的； 生的； 未经分析的， 原始的； 生疏无知的， 未经训练的； 露肉而刺痛的
detailed_translations.english: not cooked

sentences.english: The fee charged by the realtor is directly proportional to the price of the property.
sentences.chinese: 房产代理人收取的费用和房产价格是成正比的。

sentences.chinese: 成本的相应提高

detailed_translations.english: something that is proportional to something else is in the correct or most suitable relationship to it in size, amount, importance etc

name: economy
trans: 经济； 节约， 节省

sentences.chinese: 市政会必须采取节约措施以达到政府的开支指标。

sentences.english: Not insuring your belongings is a false economy (= it is cheaper but could have bad results ).
sentences.chinese: 不给个人财产投保实际上并不划算。

detailed_translations.chinese: 经济； 节约， 节省
detailed_translations.english: something that you do in order to spend less money

name: community
trans: 社区， 社会， 公社； 团体， 界； 群落

sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 社区， 社会， 公社； 团体， 界； 群落
detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.english: Paul tore open the packet as soon as it arrived.
sentences.chinese: 保罗一收到包裹就拆开了。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat package that is sent by post or delivered to someone

name: version
trans: 译本； 说法； 改写本

sentences.english: Could Donna’s version of what happened that night be correct?
sentences.chinese: 唐娜对那晚发生的事情的描述是否正确呢？

detailed_translations.chinese: 译本； 说法； 改写本
detailed_translations.english: someone’s version of an event is their description of it, when this is different from the description given by another person

sentences.english: The plane landed at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.english: Her family went to see her off at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

detailed_translations.english: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

sentences.english: the castle courtyard
sentences.chinese: 城堡的庭院

detailed_translations.english: an open space that is completely or partly surrounded by buildings

sentences.english: people of the same nationality
sentences.chinese: 同国籍的人

detailed_translations.english: the state of being legally a citizen of a particular country

name: selection
trans: 选择， 挑选； 被挑选出来的人， 精选品； 可供选择的东西

sentences.english: The judges have made their final selection.
sentences.chinese: 评委已经作出最后的评选。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 挑选； 被挑选出来的人， 精选品； 可供选择的东西
detailed_translations.english: the careful choice of a particular person or thing from a group of similar people or things

sentences.english: research institutes
sentences.chinese: 研究所

detailed_translations.english: an organization that has a particular purpose such as scientific or educational work, or the building where this organization is based

sentences.english: They finally went aboard the plane.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于登上了飞机。

detailed_translations.english: on or onto a ship, plane, or train

name: endure
trans: 忍受， 容忍； 持久， 持续

sentences.chinese: 似乎谁都不可能忍受这样的疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忍受， 容忍； 持久， 持续
detailed_translations.english: to be in a difficult or painful situation for a long time without complaining

sentences.english: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

detailed_translations.english: a single feature, fact, or piece of information about something
to list things or give all the facts or information about something

name: shortly
trans: 立刻， 不久； 不耐烦地； 简短地

sentences.english: Ms Jones will be back shortly.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯女士很快就会回来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立刻， 不久； 不耐烦地； 简短地
detailed_translations.english: soon

sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.english: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

sentences.english: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.english: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.chinese: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

detailed_translations.english: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose

sentences.chinese: 就算是我不共戴天的仇敌，我也不希望他遭遇这样的命运。

name: throat
trans: 咽喉， 喉咙； 嗓音

trans: 效用， 有用， 实用； 公用事业

sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 效用， 有用， 实用； 公用事业

name: immediately
trans: 立即， 马上； 直接地， 紧接地

sentences.chinese: 拌入余下的食材，立即上桌。

sentences.english: The telephone rang, and he answered it immediately.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，他马上去接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立即， 马上； 直接地， 紧接地
detailed_translations.english: without delay

sentences.chinese: 干体力活的人预期寿命较短。

detailed_translations.english: manual work involves using your hands or your physical strength rather than your mind
a book that gives instructions about how to do something, especially how to use a machine

name: measurement
trans: 衡量， 测量； 尺寸， 大小

sentences.chinese: 体温的精确测量

detailed_translations.chinese: 衡量， 测量； 尺寸， 大小
detailed_translations.english: the length, height etc of something

name: optimistic
trans: 乐观的， 乐观主义的

sentences.english: Andrew took a more optimistic view.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁抱有更为乐观的想法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐观的， 乐观主义的
detailed_translations.english: believing that good things will happen in the future

name: vocabulary
trans: 词汇表， 词汇， 语汇

sentences.chinese: 他的词汇量给老师们留下了深刻的印象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 词汇表， 词汇， 语汇
detailed_translations.english: all the words that someone knows or uses

name: retire
trans: 退休， 退役； 退下， 退出， 撤退； 就寝

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

name: aspect
trans: 方面； 朝向， 方向； 样子， 外表

sentences.chinese: 朝南方向

detailed_translations.chinese: 方面； 朝向， 方向； 样子， 外表
detailed_translations.english: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts

trans: 粒子， 微粒； 小品词， 语助词

sentences.chinese: 尘埃

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of something

name: aggressive
trans: 侵略的， 好斗的； 敢做敢为的； 有进取心的

sentences.chinese: 吉姆的声音凶了起来。

sentences.english: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.chinese: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone

name: behavior
trans: 行为， 举止， 表现

detailed_translations.chinese: 行为， 举止， 表现

sentences.english: a talented young musician
sentences.chinese: 有天赋的年轻音乐家

detailed_translations.english: someone who plays a musical instrument, especially very well or as a job

sentences.english: Every effort is being made to minimize civilian casualties.
sentences.chinese: 正在尽最大努力减少平民伤亡。

sentences.english: The rail company is bringing in more trains in an effort to minimize disruption to travellers.
sentences.chinese: 铁路公司正投入更多的列车来减少旅客的不便。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce something that is difficult, dangerous, or unpleasant to the smallest possible amount or degree

name: descend
trans: 下来， 下降； 下倾

sentences.english: Our plane started to descend.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞机开始下降。

sentences.english: I heard his footsteps descending the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他下楼的脚步声。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下来， 下降； 下倾
detailed_translations.english: to move from a higher level to a lower one

name: saint
trans: 圣徒； 圣人， 道德高尚的人； [用于人名或地名等前]圣

sentences.english: Saint Patrick
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克

sentences.english: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圣徒； 圣人， 道德高尚的人； [用于人名或地名等前]圣
detailed_translations.english: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy

trans: 密集， 稠密； 密度

sentences.chinese: 人口密度高的地区

detailed_translations.chinese: 密集， 稠密； 密度
detailed_translations.english: the degree to which an area is filled with people or things

name: logical
trans: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的

sentences.english: It’s a logical site for a new supermarket, with the housing development nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近有住宅区，新的超级市场选址在此是合情合理的。

sentences.chinese: 合理的结论

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的
detailed_translations.english: seeming reasonable and sensible

name: oblige
trans: 迫使； 施恩于， 帮…的忙； 使感激

sentences.english: It’s always a good idea to oblige important clients.
sentences.chinese: 能满足重要客户的请求总是好的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迫使； 施恩于， 帮…的忙； 使感激
detailed_translations.english: if you are obliged to do something, you have to do it because the situation, the law, a duty etc makes it necessary

name: slam
trans: 砰地关上；猛力拉，砰地放下；猛烈抨击

sentences.english: We heard a car door slam.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到有车门砰的一声关上了。

sentences.english: He slammed the door shut .
sentences.chinese: 他把门砰地关上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 砰地关上；猛力拉，砰地放下；猛烈抨击

the noise or action of a door, window etc slamming

name: characterize
trans: 成为…的特征， 以…为特征； 描绘的特性， 描述

sentences.english: Bright colours characterize his paintings.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的色彩是他绘画作品的特点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成为…的特征， 以…为特征； 描绘的特性， 描述
detailed_translations.english: to describe the qualities of someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: The sail of the little boat swung crazily from one side to the other.
sentences.chinese: 这艘小船的船帆发疯似地左右摇晃着。

sentences.english: She was swinging a bottle of wine by its neck.
sentences.chinese: 她当时正在握着瓶颈摇晃酒瓶。

detailed_translations.english: If something swings or if you swing it, it moves repeatedly backward and forward or from side to side from a fixed point
a seat hanging from ropes or chains, usually used by children to play on by moving it forwards and backwards using their legs

sentences.english: That’s a ridiculous idea!
sentences.chinese: 那主意很荒唐！

sentences.english: Don’t be ridiculous!
sentences.chinese: 别傻了！

sentences.english: I’d look ridiculous in a dress like that.
sentences.chinese: 我穿那样的裙子会显得很可笑。

detailed_translations.english: very silly or unreasonable

sentences.english: Rice: No, I only have a handbag.
sentences.chinese: 没有，我只有一个手提包。

sentences.english: He grabbed at her handbag .
sentences.chinese: 他抢夺了她的手提包。

sentences.english: Is this my (your) handbag?
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手提包吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things

name: invasion
trans: 入侵， 侵略， 侵犯

sentences.english: ...seven years after the Roman invasion of Britain.
sentences.chinese: …罗马人入侵大不列颠岛之后的7年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 入侵， 侵略， 侵犯
detailed_translations.english: when the army of one country enters another country by force, in order to take control of it

name: spin
trans: 旋转；晕眩；纺，织；绞干，甩干

sentences.english: The plane’s propellers were spinning.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的螺旋桨在快速旋转。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转；晕眩；纺，织；绞干，甩干
detailed_translations.english: to turn around and around very quickly, or to make something do this
an act of turning around quickly

name: severe
trans: 严重的； 严厉的， 严格的； 严峻的， 艰难的； 朴素的， 不加装饰的

sentences.english: His injuries were quite severe.
sentences.chinese: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.english: She’s suffering from severe depression.
sentences.chinese: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.english: The US faces severe economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 美国面临严重的经济问题。

sentences.english: The storm caused severe damage.
sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重的； 严厉的， 严格的； 严峻的， 艰难的； 朴素的， 不加装饰的
detailed_translations.english: severe problems, injuries, illnesses etc are very bad or very serious

name: emerge
trans: 出现， 涌现， 冒出

sentences.english: The flowers emerge in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 花儿在春天开放。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现， 涌现， 冒出
detailed_translations.english: to appear or come out from somewhere

sentences.english: a shallow river
sentences.chinese: 浅河

sentences.english: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.chinese: 这湖很浅。

sentences.english: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.chinese: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.english: Place the meat in a shallow dish.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放在一个浅盘里。

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom

name: lease
trans: 出租； 租得， 租有

sentences.english: The landlord refused to renew his lease.
sentences.chinese: 房东拒绝和他续签租约。

detailed_translations.english: the thing or things that someone owns

sentences.chinese: 接下来的几周，事情越来越糟。

sentences.english: succeeding generations

detailed_translations.english: coming after something else

sentences.english: her brave fight against cancer
sentences.chinese: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

detailed_translations.english: dealing with danger, pain, or difficult situations with courage and confidence

sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

trans: 观点， 看法， 见解

name: anyhow
trans: 无论如何， 不管怎么说； 随随便便地， 杂乱无章地

detailed_translations.english: in a careless or untidy way

sentences.chinese: 款项将在规定的几个月内支付。

detailed_translations.english: to state something in an exact and detailed way

trans: 吹口哨， 鸣笛声； 呼啸而过

sentences.chinese: 裁判哨声一响，比赛开始了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吹口哨， 鸣笛声； 呼啸而过

a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it

name: handle
trans: 拿， 触； 操作， 处理

sentences.chinese: 然后他转动把手走了进去。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a door that you use for opening it

detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

trans: 向前； 向外， 往外

sentences.chinese: 房子仍在燃烧，冒出浓浓的黑烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向前； 向外， 往外

name: tough
trans: 困难的， 难对付的； 坚强的， 能吃苦耐劳的； 健壮的； 坚硬的， 严格的； 老的， 硬的； 粗暴的， 充满暴力的

sentences.chinese: 比赛打得很艰难。

sentences.chinese: 她的生活十分艰辛。

sentences.chinese: 尽管是一个艰难的决定，但由于天气不好我们只得取消比赛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 困难的， 难对付的； 坚强的， 能吃苦耐劳的； 健壮的； 坚硬的， 严格的； 老的， 硬的； 粗暴的， 充满暴力的
detailed_translations.english: difficult to do or deal with

name: crossing
trans: 人行横道， 交叉口； 横渡

sentences.chinese: 必须让人行横道上的行人先行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 人行横道， 交叉口； 横渡
detailed_translations.english: a place where you can safely cross a road, railway, river etc

name: script
trans: 剧本， 广播稿； 书写用的字母； 笔迹， 手迹

sentences.chinese: 用工整的黑色字写下的一则日记

detailed_translations.chinese: 剧本， 广播稿； 书写用的字母； 笔迹， 手迹
detailed_translations.english: writing done by hand

sentences.chinese: 潜艇潜入水中。

detailed_translations.english: to go under the surface of the water and be completely covered by it

trans: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体

sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

name: compose
trans: 组成， 构成； 创作， 为…谱曲； 使平静， 使镇静

sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

trans: 认出， 发现； 玷污

sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

trans: 部分的； 不公平的； 偏爱的， 偏袒的

sentences.chinese: 部分解决牛津地区交通拥堵问题的方法

detailed_translations.chinese: 部分的； 不公平的； 偏爱的， 偏袒的
detailed_translations.english: not complete

sentences.chinese: 来自许多国家的救援物资纷纷送到饥荒地区。

trans: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的

sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

sentences.chinese: 你有权保留这些物品。

detailed_translations.english: to keep something or continue to have something

波浪起伏； 鼓起， 隆起； 增强

sentences.chinese: 积雪融化，河水上涨。

detailed_translations.chinese: 膨胀，隆起；增长，增强，增多，扩大
detailed_translations.english: to increase in amount or number

sentences.chinese: 使用新洗碗机之前，请先阅读厂家的说明书。

sentences.chinese: 飞机坠毁，造成两名机组人员和四名乘客死亡。

sentences.chinese: 一名机组人员

trans: 有效的； 正当的； 有根据的， 有理的

sentences.chinese: 有效信用卡

sentences.chinese: 你的往返票有效期为三个月。

sentences.chinese: 总理顶住批评，坚持立场。

detailed_translations.english: to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you

sentences.chinese: 她是个不愿认输的女人。

sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

trans: 鼓励， 怂恿； 促进， 助长， 激发

sentences.chinese: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

sentences.chinese: 他的去世标志着一个时代的终结。

sentences.chinese: 维多利亚时代

name: yield
trans: 出产；让出，放弃；屈服，顺从；倒塌，垮掉

sentences.chinese: 直到最近我们的研究才开始取得重要成果。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a result, answer, or piece of information

sentences.english: electronic games
sentences.chinese: 电子游戏

sentences.english: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
sentences.chinese: 电子记事本

detailed_translations.english: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc

sentences.english: We’re planning a vacation in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们正计划去欧洲度假。

sentences.english: We’re planning to go on vacation soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们在计划近期去度假。

detailed_translations.english: a holiday, or time spent not working

sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

trans: 优美的， 文雅的， 讲究的； 简练的， 简洁的

sentences.chinese: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子

sentences.english: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优美的， 文雅的， 讲究的； 简练的， 简洁的
detailed_translations.english: beautiful, attractive, or graceful

sentences.chinese: 把肉一直烧到松软为止。

detailed_translations.english: tender food is easy to cut and eat, especially because it has been well cooked

sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

sentences.chinese: 同时，你必须将你自己隔绝在他的情绪之外。

sentences.chinese: 我非常爱苹果公司，希望能够尽早回到工作当中。同时，我的家人和我将非常感谢各位尊重我的隐私。（祝愿和感谢）

sentences.english: In the meantime Mr Toots, who had come upstairs after her, all unconscious of the effect he produced, announced himself with his knuckles on the door, and walked in very brisKly.
sentences.chinese: 在这同时，已经跟着她走上楼来的图茨先生，完全不了解他所引起的反应，用指节敲了敲门，通报他已来到，接着就很轻快地走了进来。

name: powerful
trans: 强大的， 有力的， 有权的； 强壮的， 强健的

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: rich and powerful nations
sentences.chinese: 富强的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 强大的， 有力的， 有权的； 强壮的， 强健的
detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

name: slip
trans: 滑跤，滑落，溜；下降，跌落；悄悄放进

sentences.english: Ben slipped quietly out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 本悄悄地溜出了房间。

sentences.english: One man managed to slip from the club as police arrived.
sentences.chinese: 警察到来时，一个男子设法溜出了俱乐部。

sentences.english: We must be well prepared, there must be no slips.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须好好准备，一定不要有差错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑跤，滑落，溜；下降，跌落；悄悄放进
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere, without attracting other people’s attention
A slip is a small or unimportant mistake

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: anchor
trans: 抛锚， 停泊； 把…系住， 使固定； 担任主持人； 固定， 扎根

sentences.english: Three tankers were anchored in the harbor.
sentences.chinese: 三艘油轮停泊在港口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抛锚， 停泊； 把…系住， 使固定； 担任主持人； 固定， 扎根
detailed_translations.english: to lower the anchor on a ship or boat to hold it in one place
a piece of heavy metal that is lowered to the bottom of the sea, a lake etc to prevent a ship or boat moving

name: preceding
trans: 在前的， 在先的， 前面的

sentences.english: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.chinese: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在前的， 在先的， 前面的
detailed_translations.english: happening or coming before the time, place, or part mentioned

name: cite
trans: 引用， 引证； 传唤， 传讯； 表彰， 嘉奖

sentences.english: The judge cited a 1956 Supreme Court ruling in her decision.
sentences.chinese: 法官在她的判决中引用了1956年最高法院的一项裁决。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引用， 引证； 传唤， 传讯； 表彰， 嘉奖
detailed_translations.english: to mention something as an example, especially one that supports, proves, or explains an idea or situation

name: logic
trans: 逻辑， 推理， 逻辑学

sentences.english: There isa certain logicin their choice of architect.
sentences.chinese: 他们对建筑师的选择是有一定道理的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑， 推理， 逻辑学
detailed_translations.english: a formal method of reasoning, in which ideas are based on previous ideas

name: acquaintance
trans: 认识， 了解； 熟人

sentences.english: She was a casual acquaintance of my family in Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们家在维也纳的一个交情不深的朋友。

sentences.english: He heard about the job through a mutual acquaintance (=  someone you and another person both know  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他是通过一个双方都认识的人知道有这份工作的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 认识， 了解； 熟人
detailed_translations.english: someone you know, but who is not a close friend

sentences.english: the royal palace
sentences.chinese: 王宫

sentences.english: the royal family
sentences.chinese: 王室

detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to a king or queen

name: internship
trans: 实习生身份； 实习医师期

sentences.english: ...an internship in surgery in New York.
sentences.chinese: …一个在纽约做外科实习的职位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 实习生身份； 实习医师期
detailed_translations.english: a job that lasts for a short time, that someone, especially a student, does in order to gain experience

name: shed
trans: 脱落，脱去；流出，流下；发出，散发

sentences.english: The company is planning to shed about a quarter of its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正计划裁减约四分之一的人员。

sentences.english: The magazine is desperately trying to shed its old-fashioned image.
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志急于摆脱其过时的形象。

sentences.english: a diet to help you shed pounds
sentences.chinese: 帮助你减肥的食谱

detailed_translations.chinese: 脱落，脱去；流出，流下；发出，散发
detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something that you no longer need or want
a small building, often made of wood, used especially for storing things

sentences.english: He had a problem with his eyesight.
sentences.chinese: 他的视力有问题。

detailed_translations.english: your ability to see

sentences.english: We require the agency in our market for your precision apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求做贵司精密仪器在我们市场的代理。

sentences.english: The limit of its precision is analyzed theoretically, via simulation, and experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 经由模拟， 和实验式地，它的精密的界限理论上被分析。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very exact or correct

sentences.english: a pair of gloves
sentences.chinese: 一副手套

sentences.english: boxing gloves
sentences.chinese: 拳击手套

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your hand in order to protect it or keep it warm

name: screen
trans: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

sentences.english: The children ran naked through the yard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们光着身子跑过院子。

sentences.english: a picture of a naked man
sentences.chinese: 裸体男子的照片

sentences.english: They found the body lying half naked in the grass.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现尸体半裸着躺在草丛中。

sentences.english: The governor ordered the prisoner to be stripped naked and whipped.
sentences.chinese: 监狱长下令将那个犯人剥光衣服进行鞭笞。

detailed_translations.english: not wearing any clothes or not covered by clothes

name: trial
trans: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

name: correspond
trans: 相符合， 相当； 通信

sentences.english: The two halves of the document did not correspond.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件的前后两部分不相符。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相符合， 相当； 通信
detailed_translations.english: if two things or ideas correspond, the parts or information in one relate to the parts or information in the other

name: spur
trans: 刺激， 鞭策， 激励

sentences.english: So they've said that passing trade bills with South Korea and Panama and Colombia would help spur growth -- those got done, with significant bipartisan support.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们已经说过了，通过贸易法案与南韩和巴拿马和哥伦比亚将有助于刺激增长——那些搞，重要的两党支持。

detailed_translations.english: a sharp pointed object on the heel of a rider’s boot which is used to encourage a horse to go faster

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激， 鞭策， 激励
detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone or make them want to do something

name: perception
trans: 感知， 觉察； 认识， 观念， 看法

sentences.english: He is interested in how our perceptions of death affect the way we live.
sentences.chinese: 他对我们的死亡观如何影响我们的生活方式感兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感知， 觉察； 认识， 观念， 看法
detailed_translations.english: Your perception of something is the way that you think about it or the impression you have of it

name: rear
trans: 抚养， 饲养； 种植

sentences.english: the rear door of the car
sentences.chinese: 汽车的后门

sentences.english: Knock at the rear entrance.
sentences.chinese: 敲后门。

detailed_translations.english: at or near the back of something, especially a vehicle
the back part of an object, vehicle, or building, or a position at the back of an object or area

detailed_translations.chinese: 抚养， 饲养； 种植
detailed_translations.english: to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown

sentences.english: Here in Trinity it is right that I should give you an account of how he lived amongst you during these years of his greatest achievement.
sentences.chinese: 正是在三一学院这儿，我将对你们阐述他如何在你们中间生活，如何在这些年中取得他的最伟大的成就。

name: undertake
trans: 从事； 承担； 同意； 保证

sentences.english: She undertook the task of monitoring the elections.
sentences.chinese: 她承担了监督选举的任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 从事； 承担； 同意； 保证
detailed_translations.english: When you undertake a task or job, you start doing it and accept responsibility for it

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

name: bureau
trans: 局， 司， 处， 社， 所

sentences.english: the Federal Bureau of Investigation
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局

detailed_translations.chinese: 局， 司， 处， 社， 所
detailed_translations.english: a government department or a part of a government department in the US

sentences.english: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.english: a rich, moist chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: warm moist air
sentences.chinese: 温暖湿润的空气

sentences.english: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛湿润了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable

name: cable
trans: 缆， 索， 电缆； 电报

sentences.english: cables and switches for computers
sentences.chinese: 电脑的缆线和开关

detailed_translations.chinese: 缆， 索， 电缆； 电报
detailed_translations.english: a plastic or rubber tube containing wires that carry telephone messages, electronic signals, television pictures etc

name: qualify
trans: 胜任， 具有资格， 合格； 限定

sentences.english: Free school lunches are given to children who qualify.
sentences.chinese: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 胜任， 具有资格， 合格； 限定
detailed_translations.english: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

name: intense
trans: 强烈的； 紧张的； 认真的； 热情的

sentences.english: Young people today are under intense pressure to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

sentences.english: the intense heat of the desert
sentences.chinese: 沙漠的炽热

sentences.english: The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
sentences.chinese: 疼得我都睡不着觉。

sentences.english: He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.english: a look of intense dislike
sentences.chinese: 极端厌恶的表情

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈的； 紧张的； 认真的； 热情的
detailed_translations.english: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly

sentences.english: care for pregnant women
sentences.chinese: 孕妇保健

sentences.english: I knew right away that I was pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 我立即明白我怀孕了。

sentences.english: I thought I was too old to get pregnant .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己年龄太大，已经不能怀孕了。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to get her pregnant (= make her pregnant ) .
sentences.chinese: 我没想让她怀孕。

sentences.english: His wife was heavily pregnant (= almost ready to give birth ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子即将临产。

detailed_translations.english: if a woman or female animal is pregnant, she has an unborn baby growing inside her body

name: border
trans: 给…加上边， 围； 邻接； 与…接壤

sentences.english: writing paper with a black border
sentences.chinese: 饰有黑边的信纸

detailed_translations.english: a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…加上边， 围； 邻接； 与…接壤
detailed_translations.english: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it

name: estate
trans: 土地， 住宅区， 地产； 财产， 遗产； 庄园， 种植园

sentences.english: a country estate
sentences.chinese: 乡村的庄园

detailed_translations.chinese: 土地， 住宅区， 地产； 财产， 遗产； 庄园， 种植园
detailed_translations.english: a large area of land in the country, usually with one large house on it and one owner

name: applicable
trans: 能应用的； 合适的， 适当的

sentences.english: What is a reasonable standard for one family is not applicable for another.
sentences.chinese: 对一个家庭合理的标准对于另一个家庭并不适用。

detailed_translations.chinese: 能应用的； 合适的， 适当的
detailed_translations.english: if something is applicable to a particular person, group, or situation, it affects them or is related to them

name: admission
trans: 允许进入； 承认； 入场费， 入场券

sentences.english: Reese, by his own admission , lacks the necessary experience.
sentences.chinese: 里斯自己也承认缺乏必要的经验。

detailed_translations.chinese: 允许进入； 承认； 入场费， 入场券
detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you admit that something is true or that you have done something wrong

name: brass
trans: 黄铜， 黄铜器， 铜管乐器

sentences.english: an old brass bedstead
sentences.chinese: 老式黄铜床架

detailed_translations.chinese: 黄铜， 黄铜器， 铜管乐器
detailed_translations.english: a very hard bright yellow metal that is a mixture of  copper  and  zinc

name: expense
trans: 花费， 消费； 费用， 开支； 业务费用

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费； 费用， 开支； 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

sentences.english: His name has come up in the rumour mill as a possible director for the project.
sentences.chinese: 有谣传说他可能出任这个项目的主管。

detailed_translations.english: information or a story that is passed from one person to another and which may or may not be true

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time
someone who lived or was in a particular place at the same time as someone else

name: gear
trans: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服

sentences.english: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.chinese: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.english: Andy drove cautiously along in third gear.
sentences.chinese: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.english: Does this thing have a reverse gear?
sentences.chinese: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.english: Any cyclist can climb a difficult hill; you just change gear.
sentences.chinese: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.english: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.chinese: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.english: It’s a good habit to take the car out of gear while you’re at a stoplight.
sentences.chinese: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.english: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students.
sentences.chinese: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.english: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.chinese: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服
detailed_translations.english: the machinery in a vehicle such as a car, truck, or bicycle that you use to go comfortably at different speeds
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose

sentences.english: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.english: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.chinese: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.english: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.chinese: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.english: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.chinese: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.english: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.english: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.english: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.chinese: 邻国之间的边界争端

detailed_translations.english: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone

sentences.english: They killed four policemen while robbing a bank.
sentences.chinese: 他们抢劫一家银行的时候杀了4名警察。

sentences.english: A 77-year-old woman was robbed at knifepoint.
sentences.chinese: 一名77岁老妪遭到持刀抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: to steal money or property from a person, bank etc

name: elderly
trans: 到了晚年的人， 老年人

sentences.english: a well-dressed elderly woman
sentences.chinese: 穿着考究的老妇人

sentences.english: The elderly are a formidable force in any election.
sentences.chinese: 老年人在任何选举中都是一股强大的力量。

detailed_translations.english: used as a polite way of saying that someone is old or becoming old

detailed_translations.chinese: 到了晚年的人， 老年人
detailed_translations.english: The elderly are people who are old

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

detailed_translations.english: relating to money or the management of money

sentences.english: a measuring rod
sentences.chinese: 测量杆

detailed_translations.english: a long thin pole or bar

name: dumb
trans: 哑的； 无言的； 说不出话的

sentences.english: He stared at the burnt-out car in dumb disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 他难以置信地望着烧毁的汽车，话也说不出来了。

sentences.english: She was struck dumb with terror.
sentences.chinese: 她吓得说不出话来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 哑的； 无言的； 说不出话的
detailed_translations.english: unable to speak, because you are angry, surprised, shocked etc

name: respective
trans: 各自的， 各个的， 分别的

sentences.english: We all went back to our respective homes to wait for news.
sentences.chinese: 我们都各自回家等待消息。

sentences.english: the respective roles of teachers and students
sentences.chinese: 教师和学生各自不同的角色

detailed_translations.chinese: 各自的， 各个的， 分别的
detailed_translations.english: used before a plural noun to refer to the different things that belong to each separate person or thing mentioned

name: media
trans: 新闻媒介， 传播媒介

sentences.english: The scandal was widely reported in the national media .
sentences.chinese: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.english: The role of the news media in forming public opinion is very important.
sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.english: The 11-day trial generated intense media interest .
sentences.chinese: 11天的审讯引起了媒体的高度关注。

sentences.english: A great deal of media hype surrounded the release of the group’s latest CD.
sentences.chinese: 媒体对这个组合最新唱片的发行进行了大肆炒作。

sentences.english: There will be another war somewhere else and the whole international media circus will move on.
sentences.chinese: 别的地方还会有战争，全球的媒体又会一窝蜂地拥过去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新闻媒介， 传播媒介
detailed_translations.english: all the organizations, such as television, radio, and newspapers, that provide news and information for the public, or the people who do this work

name: favour
trans: 赞同； 喜爱， 偏爱； 有利于

sentences.english: Could you do me a favour and tell Kelly I can’t make it?
sentences.chinese: 你帮个忙告诉凯莉说我来不了好吗？

sentences.english: He hired John as a favour to his father.
sentences.chinese: 他雇约翰是给他父亲一个面子。

sentences.english: Paul, can I ask you a favor ?
sentences.chinese: 保罗，能帮我一下吗？

sentences.english: I owed him a favour so I couldn’t say no.
sentences.chinese: 我欠他一个人情，所以无法拒绝。

sentences.english: She helps me out when I have too much to do, and I return the favour when I can.
sentences.chinese: 我忙的时候她来帮忙，我能帮她的时候就还她人情。

sentences.english: Do yourself a favour and make sure you get some time to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 对自己好些，一定要留点时间给自己。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do for someone in order to help them or be kind to them

detailed_translations.chinese: 赞同； 喜爱， 偏爱； 有利于
detailed_translations.english: to provide suitable conditions for something to happen

name: pollute
trans: 弄脏， 污染； 腐蚀

sentences.english: beaches polluted by raw sewage
sentences.chinese: 受未经处理的污水污染的海滩

sentences.english: The factory pollutes the air and water.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂污染了空气和水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄脏， 污染； 腐蚀
detailed_translations.english: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

sentences.english: It will take about 24 hours for the glue to harden.
sentences.chinese: 胶水干透大约需要24小时。

detailed_translations.english: to become firm or stiff, or to make something firm or stiff

name: eve
trans: 前夜， 前夕， 前一刻

sentences.english: We’re arriving on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在平安夜到达。

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve party
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜的派对

detailed_translations.chinese: 前夜， 前夕， 前一刻
detailed_translations.english: the night or day before an important day

sentences.english: Here you should use plural pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 这里你应该用复数代词。

sentences.english: No chance! It was the best of the weak pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 没有机会！这真是弱者的最好代词。

sentences.english: Now if we could only figure out the pronoun problem.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们可以解决这个代词问题了。

detailed_translations.english: a word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase, such as ‘he’ instead of ‘Peter’ or ‘the man’

sentences.english: I’ll now try to define the term ‘popular culture’.
sentences.chinese: 我现在来试试给 “通俗文化” 这个词下定义。

sentences.english: Define precisely what you mean by ‘crime’.
sentences.chinese: 把你说的 “犯罪” 明确定义一下。

detailed_translations.english: to explain exactly the meaning of a particular word or idea

name: dictate
trans: 口授； 命令， 规定， 要求

sentences.english: Federal funds have to be used as dictated by Washington.

sentences.chinese: 两个农民遭闪电击中。

trans: 精炼， 精制， 提纯； 使优美， 使完善

sentences.english: Car makers are constantly refining their designs.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商在不断完善他们的设计。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精炼， 精制， 提纯； 使优美， 使完善
detailed_translations.english: to improve a method, plan, system etc by gradually making slight changes to it

name: mount
trans: 登上；发起；安放；增加，加剧

sentences.english: He mounted the stairs and looked around him slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.english: A car suddenly mounted the pavement to avoid a vehicle coming in the opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 有辆汽车为了躲避迎面驶来的一辆车，突然冲上了人行道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 登上；发起；安放；增加，加剧
detailed_translations.english: to go up a step or stairs
used as part of the name of a mountain

name: demand
trans: 要求， 需要； 查问

sentences.english: Too many things demanded his attention at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 太多事情同时需要他的关注。

sentences.english: It’s a desperate situation demanding a desperate remedy.
sentences.chinese: 情况危急，需要背水一战。

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求， 需要； 查问
detailed_translations.english: if one thing demands another, it needs that thing in order to happen or be done successfully

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: atomic
trans: 原子的， 原子能的， 原子武器的

sentences.english: atomic power
sentences.chinese: 核动力

sentences.english: an atomic submarine
sentences.chinese: 核潜艇

detailed_translations.chinese: 原子的， 原子能的， 原子武器的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the energy produced by splitting atoms or the weapons that use this energy

name: deposit
trans: 定金， 押金； 存款； 矿藏

sentences.english: The female deposits her eggs directly into the water.
sentences.chinese: 雌性把卵直接产在水中。

detailed_translations.english: to put something down in a particular place

detailed_translations.chinese: 定金， 押金； 存款； 矿藏
detailed_translations.english: money that you pay when you rent something such as an apartment or car, which will be given back if you do not damage it

sentences.english: ...a tiny fossil plant, only a few centimetres high.
sentences.chinese: …一块小小的植物化石，只有几厘米高。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length. There are 100 centimetres in one metre.

sentences.english: What is the range of this telescope?
sentences.chinese: 这架望远镜的有效距离多大?。

sentences.english: We have two blankets and a telescope.
sentences.chinese: 我有两个毯子和一个望远镜。

sentences.english: Astronomers then measure this glow and use it to correct telescope settings to overcome the blurring effect of the atmosphere on far-off images.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家然后测量这个辉光，用它来纠正望远镜的设置以克服大气对遥远图像所造成的模糊效果。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

name: rotten
trans: 腐烂的； 令人不愉快的； 糟糕的

sentences.english: the smell of rotten eggs
sentences.chinese: 坏鸡蛋的气味

sentences.english: Some of the wood was completely rotten.
sentences.chinese: 有些木头完全腐烂了。

sentences.english: The apples went rotten very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 苹果很快就腐烂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 腐烂的； 令人不愉快的； 糟糕的
detailed_translations.english: badly decayed and no longer good to use

sentences.english: Yes. It was a skillful archer who saved the earth.
sentences.chinese: 是的。 是一个熟练的弓箭手拯救了地球。

sentences.english: Historians say Leonardo was one of the most skillful lyre players in all of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 历史学家说，莱昂纳多在意大利的最熟练的七弦琴球员之一。

sentences.english: With skillful manipulation of illumination and the solid-void relationship, the overall effect achieved is a harmonious integration between architecture and nature.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑有着光线的巧妙处理和结实体块的关系，整个效果实现是建筑和自然间的和谐综合。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

sentences.english: Red warning lights flashed on and off (= shone for a short time and then stopped shining ) .
sentences.chinese: 红色警告灯一闪一闪。

detailed_translations.english: to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way
a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining

sentences.english: The professor stands accused of (=  has been accused of  ) stealing his student’s ideas and publishing them.
sentences.chinese: 那位教授被指控剽窃学生的观点拿去发表。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you believe someone is guilty of a crime or of doing something bad

name: housing
trans: 房屋， 住宅； 住房建筑， 住房供给； 外壳， 外罩

sentences.english: health problems caused by bad housing
sentences.chinese: 住房条件差引起的健康问题

sentences.english: a scheme to provide affordable housing for local people
sentences.chinese: 为当地民众提供平价住宅的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 房屋， 住宅； 住房建筑， 住房供给； 外壳， 外罩
detailed_translations.english: the houses or conditions that people live in

name: devil
trans: 魔鬼， 恶魔； 家伙， 人

sentences.english: The villagers believed a devil had taken control of his body.
sentences.chinese: 村民们认为他被邪魔附身了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 魔鬼， 恶魔； 家伙， 人
detailed_translations.english: the most powerful evil spiritin some religions, especially in Christianity

sentences.english: They offer a two-year guarantee on all their electrical goods.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的电器产品都有两年的保修期。

sentences.english: a money-back guarantee
sentences.chinese: 退货保证

detailed_translations.english: a formal written promise to repair or replace a product if it breaks within a specific period of time
to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves

name: recommend
trans: 推荐， 举荐； 劝告， 建议； 使成为可取； 使受欢迎

sentences.english: Doctors strongly recommend that fathers should be present at their baby’s birth.
sentences.chinese: 医生极力建议孩子出生时父亲应该在场。

sentences.english: Sleeping tablets are not recommended in this case.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下不建议使用安眠药。

sentences.english: It is dangerous to exceed the recommended dose .
sentences.chinese: 超过建议剂量很危险。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推荐， 举荐； 劝告， 建议； 使成为可取； 使受欢迎
detailed_translations.english: to advise someone to do something, especially because you have special knowledge of a situation or subject

name: acquire
trans: 取得， 获得， 学到

sentences.english: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.chinese: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.english: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得， 学到
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

name: fertile
trans: 肥沃的； 多产的； 丰富的

sentences.english: 800 acres of fertile cropland
sentences.chinese: 800英亩的肥沃耕地

detailed_translations.chinese: 肥沃的； 多产的； 丰富的
detailed_translations.english: fertile land or soil is able to produce good crops

sentences.english: the automobile industry
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业

detailed_translations.english: a car

name: notion
trans: 概念， 观念； 意图， 想法， 念头

sentences.english: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.chinese: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 意图， 想法， 念头
detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

name: diversity
trans: 多样性； 差异； 不同点

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 多样性； 差异； 不同点
detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: He put a harness on each of us, and we were hauled into the helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他在我们每个人头上套上一个套索，然后我们被拉进了直升飞机。

sentences.english: It would be similar to a Humvee vehicle for patrolling on the ground but could turn into a helicopter at the touch of a button in an emergency.
sentences.chinese: 这款车平时能够像悍马一样在陆地上驰骋，但是遇到紧急情况，只需要轻轻按一下按钮，它就能变成一台直升飞机。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

sentences.english: The truck was an 18-wheeler with a white tractor.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车有18轮，还有一个白色牵引车头。

detailed_translations.english: a strong vehicle with large wheels, used for pulling farm machinery

sentences.english: He doesn't have the patience to wait.
sentences.chinese: 他没有耐心等。

detailed_translations.english: If you have patience, you are able to stay calm and not get annoyed, for example, when something takes a long time, or when someone is not doing what you want them to do

name: grace
trans: 优美，优雅；风度，魅力；宽限，缓期

sentences.english: Lena moved with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.chinese: 莉娜走路姿势有着舞者般的优美。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优美，优雅；风度，魅力；宽限，缓期
detailed_translations.english: a smooth way of moving that looks natural, relaxed, and attractive
to make a place or an object look more attractive

name: advertisement
trans: 广告， 公告， 登广告； 广告活动， 宣传

sentences.english: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.chinese: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.english: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.english: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.chinese: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广告， 公告， 登广告； 广告活动， 宣传
detailed_translations.english: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc

sentences.english: Those tomatoes aren’t ripe yet.
sentences.chinese: 那些番茄还没熟。

detailed_translations.english: ripe fruit or crops are fully grown and ready to eat

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

detailed_translations.english: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

name: mechanism
trans: 机械装置； 机制， 机理； 办法， 途径

sentences.english: the brake mechanism
sentences.chinese: 刹车装置

sentences.english: a clock mechanism
sentences.chinese: 钟表机件

detailed_translations.chinese: 机械装置； 机制， 机理； 办法， 途径
detailed_translations.english: part of a machine or a set of parts that does a particular job

name: detection
trans: 察觉， 发觉； 侦查， 探测

sentences.english: ...the early detection of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: …乳腺癌的早期发现。

detailed_translations.chinese: 察觉， 发觉； 侦查， 探测
detailed_translations.english: when something is found that is not easy to see, hear etc, or the process of looking for it

sentences.english: All her life, Kelly had stuck with difficult tasks and challenges, and triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something triumphs, they gain complete success, control, or victory, often after a long or difficult struggle
an important victory or success after a difficult struggle

name: vice
trans: 罪恶； 恶习， 缺点； 虎钳

sentences.english: the fight against vice on the streets
sentences.chinese: 打击街头犯罪

sentences.english: The police have smashed a vice ring (= a group of criminals involved in vice ) in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 警方捣毁了芝加哥的一个犯罪团伙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 罪恶； 恶习， 缺点； 虎钳
detailed_translations.english: criminal activities that involve sex or drugs

name: horror
trans: 恐怖； 憎恶； 令人恐怖的事物

sentences.english: You should have seen the look of horror on his face.
sentences.chinese: 你真该看看他脸上恐惧的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 恐怖； 憎恶； 令人恐怖的事物
detailed_translations.english: something that is very terrible, shocking, or frightening

sentences.english: Belladonna and red arsenic are deadly poisons .
sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.english: He swallowed some type of poison.
sentences.chinese: 他吞下了某种毒药。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause death or serious illness if you eat it, drink it etc
to give someone poison, especially by adding it to their food or drink, in order to harm or kill them

sentences.english: Paul is very thoughtful.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常体贴人。

detailed_translations.english: always thinking of the things you can do to make people happy or comfortable

sentences.english: Then they chose one gram for weighing water in a cubic centimetre.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们将一立方厘米的水的重量定为一克。

sentences.english: The state news agency, Xinhua, says that elsewhere the medicine sells for 680 yuan a gram.
sentences.chinese: 国家通讯社——新华社说，其他地方，这种药材卖到了680元一克。

sentences.english: One of them combines lithium manganese oxide with other ions, and operates at about three to five volts with a charge capacity of 200 milliamp hours per gram.
sentences.chinese: 平面能源正在研发三种不同的电池化学配方。 其中之一是把锂锰氧化物与其他离子化合，充电电压三到五伏，容量200毫安时每克。

detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring weight in the  metric system

sentences.english: The Voting Rights Act was needed to empower minority groups.
sentences.chinese: 《选举权法案》对于赋予少数民族自主权是必不可少的。

detailed_translations.english: to give a person or organization the legal right to do something

name: riot
trans: 把浪费在放荡的生活上

sentences.english: University students rioted in protest at tuition fees.
sentences.chinese: 大学生闹事，抗议学费过高。

detailed_translations.english: if a crowd of people riot, they behave in a violent and uncontrolled way, for example by fighting the police and damaging cars or buildings
a situation in which a large crowd of people are behaving in a violent and uncontrolled way, especially when they are protesting about something

detailed_translations.chinese: 把浪费在放荡的生活上

name: arouse
trans: 引起； 唤起， 唤醒

sentences.english: Matt’s behavior was arousing the interest of the neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 马特的行为渐渐引起了邻居的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引起； 唤起， 唤醒
detailed_translations.english: to wake someone

sentences.english: They say eagles used to nest in those rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他们说以前常有老鹰在那些岩石中筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: to build or use a nest
a place made or chosen by a bird to lay its eggs in and to live in

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

detailed_translations.english: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

sentences.english: Glen was calm and composed at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 格伦在葬礼上表现得平静而镇定。

detailed_translations.english: relaxed and quiet, not angry, nervous, or upset
to become quiet and relaxed after you have been angry, excited, nervous, or upset, or to make someone become quiet and relaxed

name: boring
trans: 令人厌烦的， 乏味的， 无聊的

sentences.english: Her husband is about the most boring person I’ve ever met.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫可以说是我见过的最无聊的人。

sentences.english: The job was dull and boring.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作枯燥乏味。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人厌烦的， 乏味的， 无聊的
detailed_translations.english: not interesting in any way

name: classic
trans: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
detailed_translations.english: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
detailed_translations.english: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

sentences.english: The price of home ownership is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of owning something

sentences.english: a metric tonne
sentences.chinese: 一公吨

sentences.english: The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

detailed_translations.english: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures

name: absolute
trans: 十足的， 地道的； 绝对的， 完全的； 不受任何限制的

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: We don’t know with absolute certainty that the project will succeed.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有绝对的把握这个项目一定会成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十足的， 地道的； 绝对的， 完全的； 不受任何限制的
detailed_translations.english: complete or total

sentences.english: cigarette ash
sentences.chinese: 香烟灰

sentences.english: The house burnt to ashes.
sentences.chinese: 那房子烧成了灰烬。

detailed_translations.english: the soft grey powder that remains after something has been burned

name: describe
trans: 形容； 描写； 画出

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容； 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

name: suck
trans: 吸， 吮， 啜； 吸收

sentences.english: Don’t suck your thumb, dear.
sentences.chinese: 不要吮大拇指，宝贝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸， 吮， 啜； 吸收
detailed_translations.english: to take air, liquid etc into your mouth by making your lips form a small hole and using the muscles of your mouth to pull it in

name: grab
trans: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

sentences.english: You’ll have to rub harder if you want to get it clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想把它弄干净，就得更使劲地擦。

sentences.english: I hurriedly rubbed myself dry.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧把自己擦干。

detailed_translations.english: to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly

name: presently
trans: 不久， 一会儿； 现在， 目前

sentences.english: The doctor will be here presently.
sentences.chinese: 医生一会儿就到。

sentences.english: Presently, I fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿我就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不久， 一会儿； 现在， 目前
detailed_translations.english: in a short time

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

sentences.english: The old lady was seated in her chair at the window, a rug over her knees.
sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人坐在靠窗的椅子上，膝上盖着一块小毛毯。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration

name: jazz
trans: 爵士音乐， 爵士舞曲

sentences.english: a jazz band
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐队

sentences.english: a jazz club
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐俱乐部

sentences.english: modern jazz
sentences.chinese: 现代爵士乐

detailed_translations.chinese: 爵士音乐， 爵士舞曲
detailed_translations.english: a type of music that has a strong beat and parts for performers to play alone

name: dusk
trans: 薄暮， 黄昏； 幽暗

sentences.english: The street lights go on at dusk.
sentences.chinese: 街灯在黄昏时亮起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄暮， 黄昏； 幽暗
detailed_translations.english: the time before it gets dark when the sky is becoming less bright

name: administration
trans: 管理； 管理部门， 行政机关； 实行， 执行

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with experience in administration.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一个有管理经验的人。

sentences.english: The health service spends too much on administration.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务部门在行政方面花费太多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理； 管理部门， 行政机关； 实行， 执行
detailed_translations.english: the activities that are involved in managing the work of a company or organization

name: occasional
trans: 偶尔的， 间或发生的

sentences.english: He made occasional visits to London.
sentences.chinese: 他有时候会去伦敦。

sentences.english: They had an occasional coffee together after shopping.
sentences.chinese: 他们偶尔会在购物后一起喝杯咖啡。

sentences.english: He only has occasional use of a car.
sentences.chinese: 他只是偶尔用一下汽车。

sentences.english: We should have enough money for the occasional trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们的钱应该足够偶尔出去旅行一次的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 偶尔的， 间或发生的
detailed_translations.english: happening sometimes but not often or regularly

name: boast
trans: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪
自吹自擂， 自夸的话

sentences.english: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。

sentences.english: The Society boasts 3,000 members worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

sentences.english: It is the charity's proud boast that it has never yet turned anyone away.
sentences.chinese: 该慈善机构自吹自擂，声称从来没有拒绝过任何人。

detailed_translations.english: if a place, object, or organization boasts something, it has something that is very good

detailed_translations.chinese: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪
detailed_translations.english: to talk too proudly about your abilities, achievements, or possessions

detailed_translations.chinese: 自吹自擂， 自夸的话
detailed_translations.english: Boast is also a noun

name: operator
trans: 操作人员； 话务员， 报务员

sentences.english: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.chinese: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

detailed_translations.chinese: 操作人员； 话务员， 报务员
detailed_translations.english: someone who operates a machine or piece of equipment

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: Nuclear power has always been a topic that has sparked off considerable debate .
sentences.chinese: 核电一直是引起相当多争议的话题。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions

sentences.english: ...the world's largest and most expensive unmanned spacecraft.
sentences.chinese: …世界上最大、最贵的无人航天器。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that is able to travel in space

sentences.english: I helped him choose the furniture for his house.
sentences.chinese: 我帮他挑选房子里用的家具。

sentences.english: I can’t think of a single piece of furniture in my house that I bought new.
sentences.chinese: 我想不出家里有哪件家具是新买的。

sentences.english: office furniture
sentences.chinese: 办公室家具

detailed_translations.english: large objects such as chairs, tables, beds, and cupboards

sentences.english: Decorate with orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 用几瓣橙子作点缀。

detailed_translations.english: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way

sentences.english: a shirt with black and white stripes
sentences.chinese: 黑白条纹衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a line of colour, especially one of several lines of colour all close together

sentences.english: The president will be jetting off to Germany today.
sentences.chinese: 总统今天要乘喷气式飞机去德国。

detailed_translations.english: If you jet somewhere, you travel there in a fast plane
a fast plane with a jet engine

name: helpful
trans: 给予帮助的； 有用的

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 给予帮助的； 有用的
detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

name: statistic
trans: 统计数值， 统计资料； 统计学

sentences.english: The statistic comes from a study recently conducted by the British government.
sentences.chinese: 这项统计数据来自英国政府最近进行的一项研究。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统计数值， 统计资料； 统计学
detailed_translations.english: a single number which represents a fact or measurement

name: attractive
trans: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的

sentences.english: an attractive young woman
sentences.chinese: 妩媚动人的年轻女子

sentences.english: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them

sentences.english: The food was superb.
sentences.chinese: 食物好吃极了。

sentences.english: superb weather
sentences.chinese: 极好的天气

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

name: mold
trans: 用模子制作， 塑造； 使形成， 影响…的形成

detailed_translations.chinese: 用模子制作， 塑造； 使形成， 影响…的形成

sentences.english: ...graduates with degrees in engineering.
sentences.chinese: …获得工程学学位的毕业生。

detailed_translations.english: the work involved in designing and building roads, bridges, machines etc

name: significant
trans: 相当数量的； 重要的， 意义重大的， 意味深长的

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相当数量的； 重要的， 意义重大的， 意味深长的
detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

name: bold
trans: 勇敢的； 鲁莽的； 粗体的， 黑体的； 醒目的

sentences.english: You should be feeling confident and bold when you meet your bank manager.
sentences.chinese: 你会见银行经理的时候要大胆自信。

sentences.english: She marched into his office as bold as brass (=  very confident and not showing enough respect  ) .
sentences.chinese: 她放肆地直闯进他的办公室。

detailed_translations.chinese: 勇敢的； 鲁莽的； 粗体的， 黑体的； 醒目的
detailed_translations.english: so confident or determined that you sometimes offend people

name: bleed
trans: 出血， 流血； 泌脂

sentences.english: Your nose is bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 你的鼻子流血了。

sentences.english: Tragically, she bled to death .
sentences.chinese: 非常不幸，她失血过多死了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出血， 流血； 泌脂
detailed_translations.english: to lose blood, especially because of an injury

name: delicious
trans: 美味的； 芬芳的， 怡人的； 有趣的

sentences.english: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.chinese: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.english: the delicious smell of new-mown grass
sentences.chinese: 新修剪的草坪的芳香

detailed_translations.chinese: 美味的； 芬芳的， 怡人的； 有趣的
detailed_translations.english: very pleasant to taste or smell

name: catalogue
trans: 为…编目录，把…列入目录中

sentences.english: a mail order catalog
sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

detailed_translations.english: a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…编目录，把…列入目录中
detailed_translations.english: to make a complete list of all the things in a group

name: whatever
trans: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

name: volunteer
trans: 自愿提供； 自愿， 志愿

sentences.english: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.chinese: 我主动提出来当司机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自愿提供； 自愿， 志愿
detailed_translations.english: to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
someone who does a job willingly without being paid

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural  , historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

sentences.english: Excuse my ignorance, but how does it actually work?
sentences.chinese: 请原谅我的无知，它究竟是如何运作的？

detailed_translations.english: lack of knowledge or information about something

sentences.english: The Senate approved the bill.
sentences.chinese: 参议院批准了这项议案。

detailed_translations.english: the smaller and more important of the two parts of the government with the power to make laws, in countries such as the US, Australia, and France

sentences.english: I played the trumpet in the school orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 我在学校管弦乐队吹小号。

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument that you blow into, which consists of a curved metal tube that is wide at the end, and three buttons you press to change the notes
to tell everyone about something that you are proud of, especially in an annoying way

sentences.english: Remove the camshaft retaining bolt and remove the sprockets and chain as an assembly.
sentences.chinese: 拆去凸轮轴固定螺栓，并拆去作为一个总成的链轮和链条。

sentences.english: Bamboo is connected together with lashing and bamboo bolt to form a frame on the floor before being erected by crane.
sentences.chinese: 竹子与绳子和竹螺栓连接在一起形成一个地板上的框架，然后再由起重机吊立。

detailed_translations.english: a metal bar that you slide across a door or window to fasten it
to lock a door or window by sliding a bolt across

name: string
trans: 连成一串； 排成一行前进
缚，扎，挂；串起，穿；使排成一列；伸展，拉直

sentences.english: The houses and shops were strung out along the bay.
sentences.chinese: 住宅和店铺沿海湾排成一行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连成一串； 排成一行前进

detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚，扎，挂；串起，穿；使排成一列；伸展，拉直
detailed_translations.english: to put things together onto a thread, chain etc

name: import
trans: 输入， 进口； 进口商品； 意义， 重要性

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口。

detailed_translations.english: to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

detailed_translations.chinese: 输入， 进口； 进口商品； 意义， 重要性
detailed_translations.english: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this

sentences.english: Football occupies most of my leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it

name: submit
trans: 屈从， 听从， 服从
呈送，提交；主张，建议；使服从，使降服

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从， 听从， 服从
detailed_translations.english: to agree to obey someone or something or to go through a process, especially when you have no choice

detailed_translations.chinese: 呈送，提交；主张，建议；使服从，使降服
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: mood
trans: 心情， 情绪； 语气

sentences.english: You’re in a good mood this morning!
sentences.chinese: 你今天早晨心情不错啊！

sentences.english: the general mood of depression in the office
sentences.chinese: 办公室里普遍的沮丧情绪

detailed_translations.chinese: 心情， 情绪； 语气
detailed_translations.english: the way you feel at a particular time

name: boom
trans: 激增， 繁荣， 迅速发展； 发出隆隆声
激增，繁荣，迅速发展；隆隆声，嗡嗡声

sentences.english: Business was booming , and money wasn’t a problem.
sentences.chinese: 生意非常兴隆，钱已不是问题。

sentences.english: Tourism on the island has boomed.
sentences.chinese: 岛上的旅游业迅速发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 激增， 繁荣， 迅速发展； 发出隆隆声
detailed_translations.english: if business, trade, or a particular area is booming, it is increasing and being very successful

detailed_translations.chinese: 激增，繁荣，迅速发展；隆隆声，嗡嗡声
detailed_translations.english: a quick increase of business activity

name: absence
trans: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在

sentences.english: In the absence of any evidence, the police had to let Myers go.
sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

sentences.english: I’m not usually attracted to blondes.
sentences.chinese: 我一般不喜欢金发女子。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone interested in something, or make them want to take part in something

sentences.english: a paperback edition
sentences.chinese: 平装本

sentences.english: the US edition of Marie Claire magazine
sentences.chinese: 《嘉人》杂志的美国版

detailed_translations.english: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in

name: simplicity
trans: 简单， 简易； 朴素

sentences.english: Mona wrote with a beautiful simplicity of style.
sentences.chinese: 莫娜的文笔朴实优美。

sentences.english: For the sake of simplicity, the tax form is divided into three sections.
sentences.chinese: 为简明起见，税单分成三个部分。

sentences.english: James’ solution to this problem was simplicity itself (= very simple ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对这个问题的解决办法十分简单。

detailed_translations.chinese: 简单， 简易； 朴素
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being simple and not complicated, especially when this is attractive or useful

name: cautious
trans: 十分小心的， 谨慎的

sentences.english: a cautious driver
sentences.chinese: 一位谨慎的司机

sentences.english: a cautious approach to the crisis
sentences.chinese: 处理危机的谨慎态度

sentences.english: The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
sentences.chinese: 空气污染委员会对这项通告表示谨慎乐观。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十分小心的， 谨慎的
detailed_translations.english: careful to avoid danger or risks

name: disappear
trans: 不见， 失踪， 消失

sentences.english: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不见， 失踪， 消失
detailed_translations.english: to become impossible to see any longer

name: summit
trans: 最高点， 峰顶； 最高级会议

sentences.english: the European summit
sentences.chinese: 欧洲首脑会议

sentences.english: The two presidents agreed to hold a summit in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 两位总统商定在春天举行一次首脑会议。

sentences.english: a five-nation summit meeting
sentences.chinese: 五国峰会

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高点， 峰顶； 最高级会议
detailed_translations.english: an important meeting or set of meetings between the leaders of several governments

sentences.english: the economic recession of the early 1980s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.english: There is deep recession in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 英国处于严重的经济衰退之中。

detailed_translations.english: a difficult time when there is less trade, business activity etc in a country than usual

name: conclusion
trans: 结论， 推论； 结尾； 缔结， 议定

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions .
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结论， 推论； 结尾； 缔结， 议定
detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: I’m a slow typist.
sentences.chinese: 我打字很慢。

detailed_translations.english: a secretary whose main job is to  type  letters

sentences.english: Wood is a durable material.
sentences.chinese: 木头是耐用材料。

detailed_translations.english: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot

name: negative
trans: 否定的，消极的；负的；阴性的
负片， 底片； 负数

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的；阴性的
detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones
