sentences.chinese: 我们不能让她再掐她小弟弟了。

sentences.chinese: 两个人在逃生过程中被踩死。

sentences.chinese: 内华达州大部分是沙漠。

sentences.chinese: 把番茄切成片。

sentences.chinese: 我们交谈时，她在给杯形蛋糕撒糖霜。

sentences.chinese: 大部分物体都是电荷平衡的——含等量的电子和质子。

sentences.chinese: 这架望远镜以43度角倾斜。

sentences.chinese: 他的作品确实十分独特。

sentences.chinese: 福西特是一位真正不同凡响的人。

sentences.chinese: 在一次公寓盗窃案中现金被盗。

sentences.chinese: 如果你在其他银行兑现支票或支取现金，将会产生差不多的手续费。

detailed_translations.english: money in the form of coins or notes rather than cheques,  credit card s  etc

name: counsel

sentences.chinese: 他总是能够指望她明智的忠告。

sentences.english: I also saw that news item in the Sunday Times.
sentences.chinese: 我在《星期日泰晤士报》上也看到了那条新闻。

sentences.chinese: 人类基因

sentences.english: the genes that regulate cell division
sentences.chinese: 控制细胞分裂的基因

sentences.chinese: 他显然在桌上留了封绝笔信。

sentences.english: The whale nearest to the photographer is releasing air to aid its descent.
sentences.chinese: 这只离摄影师最近的白鲸正呼出空气以帮助其下潜。

sentences.english: This type of whale is notable for its elongated beak. It dives deeper than 500 metres for food.
sentences.chinese: 这种鲸因其瘦长的喙而闻名。它能够潜入深度超过500米的海中寻找食物。

sentences.english: They do not have a set migration pattern, unlike some other whale species - which raises questions about how they may adapt in future, if the projected declines in summer Arctic sea ice materialise.
sentences.chinese: 它们没有一套迁徙的模式，不像其他的鲸类――假如夏季北极海冰像预计那样减少而成为现实的话，这就引起了关于它们如何适应未来的问题。

detailed_translations.english: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal

name: provoke
trans: 对…挑衅， 激怒； 激起， 引起

sentences.english: The novel has provoked fierce debate in the US.
sentences.chinese: 那部小说在美国引发了激烈的争论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…挑衅， 激怒； 激起， 引起
detailed_translations.english: to cause a reaction or feeling, especially a sudden one

name: threaten
trans: 威胁， 恐吓； 预示快要来临， 是…的征兆； 构成威胁； 可能发生

sentences.english: Postal workers are threatening a strike if they don’t receive a pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 邮政工人威胁如果不加薪，他们就要罢工。

detailed_translations.chinese: 威胁， 恐吓； 预示快要来临， 是…的征兆； 构成威胁； 可能发生
detailed_translations.english: to say that you will cause someone harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

name: talent
trans: 天才， 才能； 人才

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents .
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent .
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: Your brother is a man of many talents .
sentences.chinese: 你的弟弟是个多才多艺的人。

sentences.english: There’s a wealth of talent in English football.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰足球界人才济济。

detailed_translations.chinese: 天才， 才能； 人才
detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: Interest rates fell by six percentage points (= 6% ) .
sentences.chinese: 利息下降了6个百分点。

sentences.english: The numbers are small in percentage terms (= when calculated as a percentage ) .
sentences.chinese: 按百分比来看，这些数字很小。

detailed_translations.english: an amount expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100

name: negotiate
trans: 洽谈， 协商； 顺利通过， 成功越过； 协商， 谈判

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洽谈， 协商； 顺利通过， 成功越过； 协商， 谈判
detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

name: strain
trans: 扭伤， 拉伤； 尽力； 拉紧
拉紧；过劳；极度紧张；张力；扭伤，拉伤；旋律；品种，家系；气质，个性特点

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 扭伤， 拉伤； 尽力； 拉紧
detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard

detailed_translations.chinese: 拉紧；过劳；极度紧张；张力；扭伤，拉伤；旋律；品种，家系；气质，个性特点
detailed_translations.english: worry that is caused by having to deal with a problem or work too hard over a long period of time

name: hunt
trans: 打猎； 搜寻； 驱逐

sentences.english: A forensic team was hunting for clues.
sentences.chinese: 法医小组正在搜寻线索。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打猎； 搜寻； 驱逐
detailed_translations.english: to look for someone or something very carefully

sentences.english: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.english: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.chinese: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings

sentences.english: He remonstrated with the referee.
sentences.chinese: 他曾向裁判抗议。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you strongly disapprove of something they have said or done

sentences.english: There’s a package here for a Miami Lakes address.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个寄往迈阿密湖的包裹。

detailed_translations.english: something wrapped in paper, packed in a box, and then sent by mail or delivered
to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

name: visible
trans: 可见的， 看得见的， 有形的

sentences.english: The comet is visible to the naked eye (= can be seen without using special equipment ).
sentences.chinese: 这颗彗星肉眼看得见。

sentences.english: Check the plant for any visible signs of disease.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下植物是否有患病的迹象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可见的， 看得见的， 有形的
detailed_translations.english: something that is visible can be seen

name: crisis
trans: 危机， 存亡之际； 关键阶段

sentences.english: The country now faces an economic crisis .
sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister was criticized for the way in which he handled the crisis .
sentences.chinese: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.english: the current debt crisis
sentences.chinese: 当前的债务危机

sentences.english: a major political crisis
sentences.chinese: 重大的政治危机

sentences.english: I was relieved that we had averted yet another financial crisis .
sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.english: Oil companies were heavily criticized when they made large profits during the oil crisis of the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.english: The car industry is now in crisis .
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.english: He doesn’t seem to be very good at crisis management .
sentences.chinese: 他好像不大擅长处理危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 危机， 存亡之际； 关键阶段
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there are a lot of problems that must be dealt with quickly so that the situation does not get worse or more dangerous

name: rail
trans: 栏杆，横杆；铁轨，轨道；铁路

sentences.english: the American rail system
sentences.chinese: 美国铁路系统

sentences.english: a high-speed rail network
sentences.chinese: 一个高速铁路网络

sentences.english: Passengers want a better rail service .
sentences.chinese: 乘客希望有更好的铁路服务。

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel and its rail links with London
sentences.chinese: 英吉利海峡隧道及其与伦敦之间的铁路连接

sentences.english: I need to buy a rail ticket .
sentences.chinese: 我要买一张火车票。

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票价

detailed_translations.english: to complain angrily about something, especially something that you think is very unfair

detailed_translations.chinese: 栏杆，横杆；铁轨，轨道；铁路
detailed_translations.english: the railway system

name: survival
trans: 幸存； 幸存者， 残存物

sentences.english: The doctors gave him a one in ten chance of survival .
sentences.chinese: 医生说他有十分之一的生存希望。

sentences.english: A lot of small companies are having to fight for survival (= work hard in order to continue to exist ) .
sentences.chinese: 很多小公司不得不挣扎求生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幸存； 幸存者， 残存物
detailed_translations.english: the state of continuing to live or exist

name: germ
trans: 微生物， 细菌； 幼芽

sentences.english: Put disinfectant down the toilet to kill any germs.
sentences.chinese: 在抽水马桶里投放消毒剂杀菌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 微生物， 细菌； 幼芽
detailed_translations.english: a very small living thing that can make you ill

sentences.english: an inner room
sentences.chinese: 内室

sentences.english: inner London
sentences.chinese: 伦敦中心区

sentences.english: the inner ear
sentences.chinese: 内耳

detailed_translations.english: on the inside or close to the centre of something

name: market
trans: 市场； 股市； 行情， 销路

sentences.english: Our main overseas market is Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要海外市场是日本。

detailed_translations.chinese: 市场； 股市； 行情， 销路
detailed_translations.english: a particular country or area where a company sells its goods or where a particular type of goods is sold

name: keen
trans: 热心的； 激烈的； 敏锐的， 敏捷的

sentences.english: keen students
sentences.chinese: 求知若渴的学生

sentences.english: The kids in my class are all very keen.
sentences.chinese: 我班上的学生都很好学。

sentences.english: She was new in the job and keen as mustard (= very keen ).
sentences.chinese: 她刚开始做这工作，热情很高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热心的； 激烈的； 敏锐的， 敏捷的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is keen is eager to work or learn, and enjoys doing it

sentences.english: I glimpsed a figure at the window.
sentences.chinese: 我瞥见窗前有个身影。

detailed_translations.english: to see someone or something for a moment without getting a complete view of them
to see someone or something for a moment without getting a complete view of them
a quick look at someone or something that does not allow you to see them clearly

sentences.english: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

detailed_translations.english: a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals

name: transfer
trans: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

name: footstep
trans: 脚步， 脚步声， 足迹

sentences.english: He heard someone’s footsteps in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 他听见门厅里有脚步声。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脚步， 脚步声， 足迹
detailed_translations.english: the sound each step makes when someone is walking

sentences.english: a Vietnam veteran
sentences.chinese: 越战老兵

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been a soldier, sailor etc in a war

name: indifferent
trans: 冷漠的， 不积极的； 一般的， 平平的

sentences.english: an indifferent cook
sentences.chinese: 手艺平平的厨师

detailed_translations.chinese: 冷漠的， 不积极的； 一般的， 平平的
detailed_translations.english: not particularly good

name: outside
trans: 在…的外面； 向…的外面； 除…以外

sentences.english: We turned off the outside lights and went to bed.
sentences.chinese: 我们关掉外头的电灯，上床睡觉了。

sentences.english: The house will need a lot of outside repairs before we can sell it.
sentences.chinese: 房子的外部需要好好修一修，之后我们才能把它卖出去。

detailed_translations.english: not inside a building

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…的外面； 向…的外面； 除…以外

detailed_translations.english: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre

name: nerve
trans: 神经； 勇敢， 胆量

sentences.english: a condition which affects the nerves in the back
sentences.chinese: 影响背部神经的疾病

detailed_translations.chinese: 神经； 勇敢， 胆量
detailed_translations.english: nerves are parts inside your body which look like threads and carry messages between the brain and other parts of the body

sentences.english: She thought of him with affection.
sentences.chinese: 她怀着喜爱想起了他。

detailed_translations.english: If you regard someone or something with affection, you like them and are fond of them

sentences.english: The eagle plumed its wing.
sentences.chinese: 这只鹰整理它的翅膀。

sentences.english: She looked down at her Viennese fan of eagle feathers.
sentences.chinese: 她的头低着，眼睛看着手中的威尼斯鹰羽扇。

sentences.english: She looked down at her viennese fan of eagle feathers.
sentences.chinese: 她的头低著，眼睛看著手中的威尼斯鹰羽扇。

detailed_translations.english: a very large strong bird with a beak like a hook that eats small animals, birds etc

sentences.english: She wants to cruise the canals of France in a barge.
sentences.chinese: 她想坐驳船游览法国的运河。

sentences.english: ...a holiday cruising around the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: …环游加勒比海的度假航行。

sentences.english: He and his wife were planning to go on a world cruise.
sentences.chinese: 他和妻子那时正计划进行一次环球海上航游。

detailed_translations.english: If you cruise an ocean, river, or canal, you travel around it or along it on a cruise
A cruise is a holiday during which you travel on a ship or boat and visit a number of places

sentences.english: the elementary principles of justice and democracy
sentences.chinese: 正义和民主的基本信条

sentences.english: You’ve made a very elementary mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个非常基本的错误。

detailed_translations.english: simple or basic

name: topic
trans: 题目， 论题， 话题

sentences.english: The environment is a popular topic these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今环境是一个热门话题。

sentences.english: The main topic for discussion will be the proposed new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的主要议题是拟建中的超级市场。

sentences.english: a wide range of topics
sentences.chinese: 广泛的话题

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目， 论题， 话题
detailed_translations.english: a subject that people talk or write about

name: solemn
trans: 庄严的， 隆重的； 严肃的

sentences.english: a solemn expression
sentences.chinese: 严肃的表情

sentences.english: Their faces suddenly grew solemn.
sentences.chinese: 他们的脸突然变得严肃起来。

sentences.english: a solemn procession of mourners
sentences.chinese: 庄重的送葬队伍

detailed_translations.chinese: 庄严的， 隆重的； 严肃的
detailed_translations.english: very serious and not happy, for example because something bad has happened or because you are at an important occasion

name: perceive
trans: 感知， 感觉， 察觉； 认识到， 意识到； 理解

sentences.english: That morning, he perceived a change in Franca’s mood.
sentences.chinese: 那天早上，他注意到弗兰卡情绪的变化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感知， 感觉， 察觉； 认识到， 意识到； 理解
detailed_translations.english: to understand or think of something or someone in a particular way

sentences.english: Please don’t omit any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
sentences.chinese: 请不要忽略任何细节，不管它多细小。

detailed_translations.english: to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it

sentences.english: He didn’t want to embarrass her by asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 他不想提问让她尴尬。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel ashamed, nervous, or uncomfortable, especially in front of other people

name: option
trans: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物或人， 选课

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物或人， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

sentences.english: His economic predictions are based on some erroneous assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 他的经济预测是基于错误假设之上的。

detailed_translations.english: erroneous ideas or information are wrong and based on facts that are not correct

name: raid
trans: 袭击； 突入查抄， 突入搜捕； 劫掠

sentences.english: a bombing raid
sentences.chinese: 轰炸

sentences.english: an air raid warning siren
sentences.chinese: 空袭警报

detailed_translations.chinese: 袭击； 突入查抄， 突入搜捕； 劫掠
detailed_translations.english: a short attack on a place by soldiers, planes, or ships, intended to cause damage but not take control

name: politics
trans: 政治， 政治学； 政纲， 政见

sentences.english: a good understanding of politics in China
sentences.chinese: 对中国政治很好的了解

sentences.english: modern American politics
sentences.chinese: 现代美国政治

sentences.english: Politics have always interested Anita.
sentences.chinese: 阿妮塔一直对政治感兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 政治， 政治学； 政纲， 政见
detailed_translations.english: ideas and activities relating to gaining and using power in a country, city etc

name: acute
trans: 严重的； 急性的； 灵敏的， 敏锐的； 精明的

sentences.english: The housing shortage is more acute than first thought.
sentences.chinese: 住房短缺情况比一开始想的要严重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重的； 急性的； 灵敏的， 敏锐的； 精明的
detailed_translations.english: an acute problem is very serious

name: limitation
trans: 限制， 限度； 局限

sentences.english: a nuclear limitation treaty
sentences.chinese: 核限制条约

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制， 限度； 局限
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of controlling or reducing something

name: sponsor
trans: 发起； 资助， 赞助； 支持

sentences.english: Who is the sponsor of the research program?
sentences.chinese: 谁是这个研究项目的发起人?。

sentences.english: The senator announced that he would sponsor the health care plan.
sentences.chinese: 这位参议员宣布他将发起这一保健计划。

detailed_translations.english: someone who officially introduces or supports a proposal for a new law

detailed_translations.chinese: 发起； 资助， 赞助； 支持
detailed_translations.english: to officially support a proposal for a new law

sentences.english: I to the kindergarten at the age of three.
sentences.chinese: 在我记忆中，我三岁就被送去幼儿园了。

sentences.english: She took me to the kindergarten and home every day, in spite of rain and wind.
sentences.chinese: 无论是下雨还是刮风，她每天带我在幼儿园和家之间穿梭。

detailed_translations.english: a school for children aged two to five

sentences.english: The experiment produced some unexpected results.
sentences.chinese: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.english: Her death was totally unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 她的死完全出人意料。

sentences.english: Hague’s announcement was not entirely unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 黑格的声明并非完全出乎意料。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe something that is surprising because you were not expecting it

name: crucial
trans: 至关重要的， 决定性的

sentences.english: The conservation of tropical forests is of crucial importance .
sentences.chinese: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 至关重要的， 决定性的
detailed_translations.english: something that is crucial is extremely important, because everything else depends on it

name: contribute
trans: 捐献， 捐款； 投稿

sentences.english: The three sons also contribute to the family business.
sentences.chinese: 3个儿子也为家族企业做贡献。

detailed_translations.chinese: 捐献， 捐款； 投稿
detailed_translations.english: to give money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in

name: faith
trans: 信任； 信心； 信仰， 信条； 忠诚

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 信任； 信心； 信仰， 信条； 忠诚
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of trust or confidence in someone or something

sentences.english: an emergency generator
sentences.chinese: 应急发电机

detailed_translations.english: a machine that produces electricity

name: insert
trans: 插入， 嵌入； 登载

sentences.english: He took a small key from his pocket and slowly inserted it into the lock.
sentences.chinese: 他从衣袋里掏出一把小钥匙，然后缓缓地将其插入锁孔里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 插入， 嵌入； 登载
detailed_translations.english: to put something inside or into something else

name: remark
trans: 话语； 谈论， 评论

sentences.english: ‘This house must be very old,’ he remarked.
sentences.chinese: “这幢房子一定很古老了。”他说道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something, especially about something you have just noticed

detailed_translations.chinese: 话语； 谈论， 评论
detailed_translations.english: something that you say when you express an opinion or say what you have noticed

name: forbid
trans: 禁止， 不许， 阻止

sentences.english: Lack of space forbids listing the names of all those who contributed.
sentences.chinese: 由于篇幅限制，无法列出所有捐款人的姓名。

detailed_translations.chinese: 禁止， 不许， 阻止
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that they are not allowed to do something, or that something is not allowed

sentences.english: Can I borrow your microscope?
sentences.chinese: 可以借你的显微镜吗?。

sentences.english: Tell me what you see through the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 告诉我你透过这个显微镜所看到的东西。

sentences.english: Bacteria under the microscope, even those with no flagella, often bounce about in the water.
sentences.chinese: 在显微镜下，细菌，甚至包括那些没有鞭毛的细菌，经常在水中跳来跳去。

detailed_translations.english: a scientific instrument that makes extremely small things look larger

sentences.english: The care of old people necessarily involves quite a lot of heavy lifting.
sentences.chinese: 照顾老年人必定要干很多搬重物的活儿。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that cannot be different or be avoided

name: highlight
trans: 最精彩的部分； 最重要的事件

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it

detailed_translations.chinese: 最精彩的部分； 最重要的事件
detailed_translations.english: the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

name: candidate
trans: 候选人； 投考者， 申请求职者

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

detailed_translations.chinese: 候选人； 投考者， 申请求职者
detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

sentences.english: The final cost could be as much as one billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 最后的费用可能高达十亿美元。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000,000

name: parallel
trans: 平行的；类似的；并列的，并联的
可相比拟的事物；相似处；平行线，平行面；纬线
与…平行； 与…相似， 与…相当， 比得上

sentences.english: Lines AB and CD are parallel. AB
sentences.chinese: 线与CD线平行。

sentences.english: two parallel roads
sentences.chinese: 两条平行的道路

sentences.english: Take the road running parallel to the main road just after the village.
sentences.chinese: 过那个村子后走与主干道平行的路。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平行的；类似的；并列的，并联的
detailed_translations.english: two lines, paths etc that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart along their whole length

detailed_translations.chinese: 可相比拟的事物；相似处；平行线，平行面；纬线
detailed_translations.english: a relationship or similarity between two things, especially things that exist or happen in different places or at different times

detailed_translations.chinese: 与…平行； 与…相似， 与…相当， 比得上
detailed_translations.english: if one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and seem to be related

name: reject
trans: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回

sentences.english: Sarah rejected her brother’s offer of help.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

sentences.english: Dexter flatly rejected (= completely rejected ) calls for his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 德克斯特断然拒绝让他辞职的要求。

sentences.english: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept, believe in, or agree with something
a product that has been rejected because there is something wrong with it

sentences.english: You’ll just have to be patient and wait till I’m off the phone.
sentences.chinese: 你只能耐心点，等我打完电话。

detailed_translations.english: able to wait calmly for a long time or to accept difficulties, people’s annoying behaviour etc without becoming angry
someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

sentences.english: Do you have any experience as a cashier?
sentences.chinese: 你是否有出纳员的工作经验？

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to receive or pay out money in a shop

name: sheer
trans: 完全的，十足的；陡峭的，垂直的；极薄的，透明的

sentences.english: cliffs which rose sheer from the sea
sentences.chinese: 从海面垂直拔起的悬崖

detailed_translations.english: straight up or down in an almost vertical line
to change direction suddenly, especially in order to avoid something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全的，十足的；陡峭的，垂直的；极薄的，透明的
detailed_translations.english: a sheer drop, cliff, slope etc is very steep and almost vertical

name: miracle
trans: 奇迹， 令人惊奇的人

sentences.english: Do you believe in miracles?
sentences.chinese: 你相信神迹吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇迹， 令人惊奇的人
detailed_translations.english: an action or event believed to be caused by God, which is impossible according to the ordinary laws of nature

sentences.english: Because we need to give profit to the capital, otherwise we get no capital.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们需要为了资本来获得利益，否则就得不到资本。

detailed_translations.english: to be useful or helpful to someone
money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to be useful or helpful to someone

sentences.english: The land was returned to its original owner.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地归还给了原主。

sentences.english: The kitchen still has many original features (= parts that were there when the house was first built ).
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房仍保留着当初的许多特点。

sentences.english: the original meaning of the word
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的原意

sentences.english: The original plan was to fly out to New York.
sentences.chinese: 原先的计划是飞往纽约。

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening first, before other people or things
a work of art or a document that is not a copy, but is the one produced by the writer or artist

name: wit
trans: 风趣； 妙语； 智力， 才智， 智能

sentences.english: a woman of great wit and charm
sentences.chinese: 说话风趣、风韵动人的女人

detailed_translations.chinese: 风趣； 妙语； 智力， 才智， 智能
detailed_translations.english: the ability to say things that are clever and amusing

name: handful
trans: 一把， 少数， 一小撮

sentences.english: There were only a handful of people there.
sentences.chinese: 那里只有几个人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一把， 少数， 一小撮
detailed_translations.english: an amount that you can hold in your hand

name: assignment
trans: 任务， 指定的作业； 分配， 指派

sentences.english: a history assignment
sentences.chinese: 历史作业

detailed_translations.chinese: 任务， 指定的作业； 分配， 指派
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is given to someone as part of their job

sentences.english: nylon fabric
sentences.chinese: 尼龙织物

sentences.english: The tent was made of nylon.
sentences.chinese: 那顶帐篷是尼龙做的。

detailed_translations.english: a strong artificial material that is used to make plastics, clothes, rope etc

sentences.english: Alan stretched and yawned.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦伸伸懒腰，打了个呵欠。

detailed_translations.english: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored
an act of yawning

sentences.english: an electric blanket
sentences.chinese: 电热毯

detailed_translations.english: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity

name: terminal
trans: 晚期的，不治的；末端的，终点的，极限的
终点； 终端； 接线端

sentences.english: terminal cancer
sentences.chinese: 晚期癌症

detailed_translations.chinese: 晚期的，不治的；末端的，终点的，极限的
detailed_translations.english: a terminal illness cannot be cured, and causes death

detailed_translations.chinese: 终点； 终端； 接线端
detailed_translations.english: a piece of computer equipment consisting of at least a  keyboard  and a screen, that you use for putting in or taking out information from a large computer

sentences.english: the United Kingdom
sentences.chinese: 联合王国

detailed_translations.english: a country ruled by a king or queen

name: differ
trans: 不同， 相异； 发生分歧

sentences.english: The two systems differ in many respects.
sentences.chinese: 这两个系统在许多方面不同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不同， 相异； 发生分歧
detailed_translations.english: if two people or groups differ about something, they have opposite opinions

name: various
trans: 各种各样的， 不同的

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

sentences.english: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
sentences.chinese: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

detailed_translations.english: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned

name: depression
trans: 抑郁， 沮丧； 不景气， 萧条； 洼地， 凹陷

sentences.english: Mr. Thomas was suffering from depression.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯先生当时正受抑郁症折磨。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抑郁， 沮丧； 不景气， 萧条； 洼地， 凹陷
detailed_translations.english: the period during the 1930s when there was not much business activity and not many jobs

name: reduction
trans: 减少， 缩小； 下降， 降低

sentences.english: strategies for noise reduction
sentences.chinese: 减少噪音的对策

sentences.english: The company promised they would make no staff reductions for at least two years.
sentences.chinese: 公司承诺至少两年不裁员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 减少， 缩小； 下降， 降低
detailed_translations.english: a decrease in the size, price, or amount of something, or the act of decreasing something

name: extent
trans: 广度； 范围； 程度

sentences.english: They examined the extent to which (= how much ) age affected language-learning ability.
sentences.chinese: 他们调查了年龄会在多大程度上影响语言学习能力。

sentences.english: (= how much ) did she influence his decision?
sentences.chinese: 她在多大程度上影响了他的决定？

detailed_translations.chinese: 广度； 范围； 程度
detailed_translations.english: used to say how true something is or how great an effect or change is

sentences.english: I had no dollars, but offered him an equivalent amount of sterling.
sentences.chinese: 我没有美金，但给了他等值的英镑。

detailed_translations.english: having the same value, purpose, job etc as a person or thing of a different kind
something that has the same value, purpose, job etc as something else

sentences.english: Hundreds and thousands of africans are thrown into gaol each year under pass laws.
sentences.chinese: 由于《通行证法》，每年有成千上万的南非黑人被关进监狱。

sentences.english: American consumers prefer white eggs; conversely, British buyers like brown eggs.
sentences.chinese: 美国的消费者喜欢白色的鸡蛋，而英国的消费者却相反，他们喜欢棕色的鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: used when one situation is the opposite of another

sentences.english: spaghetti sauces
sentences.chinese: 意大利面酱

detailed_translations.english: a thick cooked liquid that is served with food to give it a particular taste

sentences.english: Smoking is banned in the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something must not be done, seen, used etc
an official order that prevents something from being used or done

sentences.english: The idea of travelling through time fascinates me.
sentences.chinese: 穿越时光的想法深深吸引着我。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something fascinates you, you are attracted to them and think they are extremely interesting
if someone or something fascinates you, you are attracted to them and think they are extremely interesting

name: suffer
trans: 遭受， 忍受， 容许； 受痛苦， 受损

sentences.english: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遭受， 忍受， 容许； 受痛苦， 受损
detailed_translations.english: to experience physical or mental pain

name: diplomatic
trans: 外交的， 从事外交的； 策略的， 有手腕的

sentences.english: Diplomatic efforts to end the fighting began on October 25.
sentences.chinese: 停战的外交努力于10月25日开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外交的， 从事外交的； 策略的， 有手腕的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the work of diplomats

name: bat
trans: 蝙蝠； 球棒， 球拍

sentences.english: ...a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: …一只棒球棒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 蝙蝠； 球棒， 球拍
detailed_translations.english: a small animal like a mouse with wings that flies around at night

name: neighbourhood
trans: 四邻； 附近； 接近

sentences.english: Be quiet! You’ll wake up the whole neighbourhood!
sentences.chinese: 安静点！ 你会把邻居全都吵醒的！

detailed_translations.chinese: 四邻； 附近； 接近
detailed_translations.english: the area around you or around a particular place, or the people who live there

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

name: complex
trans: 由许多部分组成的， 复合的； 复杂的， 难懂的

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的， 复合的； 复杂的， 难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

name: rank
trans: 给…评定等级； 列入， 占特定等级
军衔，职衔；地位，社会阶层；排，行列

sentences.english: There were several pairs of riding boots ranked neatly in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 门厅里整齐地摆放着几双马靴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…评定等级； 列入， 占特定等级
detailed_translations.english: to arrange objects in a line or row

detailed_translations.chinese: 军衔，职衔；地位，社会阶层；排，行列
detailed_translations.english: the position or level that someone holds in an organization, especially in the police or the army, navy etc

name: assumption
trans: 假定， 臆断； 担任， 承担

sentences.english: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.
sentences.chinese: 你会做出不以你能报道的任何事实为依据的一种假设。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假定， 臆断； 担任， 承担
detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true although you have no definite proof

sentences.english: At what age can you start drawing your pension ?
sentences.chinese: 从多少岁可以开始领取养老金？

sentences.english: If you are self-employed, you should think about taking out a private pension .
sentences.chinese: 如果你是自由职业者，应该考虑办理私人养老金事宜。

sentences.english: Many people find it hard to live on a basic state pension .
sentences.chinese: 许多人发现仅凭国家基本养老金不能养活自己。

sentences.english: She pays a quarter of her salary into a pension plan.
sentences.chinese: 她将每月工资的四分之一用于养老金计划。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money paid regularly by the government or company to someone who does not work any more, for example because they have reached the age when people stop working or because they are ill
to grant a pension to

name: giant
trans: 巨人，巨物；才智超群的人

sentences.english: a giant electronics company
sentences.chinese: 一家电子产品巨头

sentences.english: a giant tortoise
sentences.chinese: 巨龟

detailed_translations.english: extremely big, and much bigger than other things of the same type

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨人，巨物；才智超群的人
detailed_translations.english: an extremely tall strong man, who is often bad and cruel, in children’s stories

sentences.english: a loose, fluid style of dancing
sentences.chinese: 舒展而优美的舞姿

detailed_translations.english: fluid movements are smooth, relaxed, and graceful
a liquid

sentences.english: ...a short ferry ride across the bay.
sentences.chinese: …一趟跨海湾的短途渡轮旅程。

sentences.english: ...the Bay of Bengal.
sentences.chinese: …孟加拉湾。

detailed_translations.english: A bay is a part of a coast where the land curves inward

name: outlet
trans: 出口， 出路； 发泄途径

sentences.english: Her father had found an outlet for his ambition in his work.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲在工作中找到了施展抱负的途径。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出口， 出路； 发泄途径
detailed_translations.english: a way of expressing or getting rid of strong feelings

sentences.english: She smoked and drank, neglected the children, and left the clothes unmended.
sentences.chinese: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.english: a neglected garden
sentences.chinese: 疏于打理的花园

sentences.english: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.chinese: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to look after someone or something properly
failure to look after something or someone, or the condition of not being looked after

name: addition
trans: 加， 加法； 附加物

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

sentences.english: Several gangs were operating in the area.
sentences.chinese: 有好几个犯罪团伙在这个地区活动。

sentences.english: Armed gangs have hijacked lorries.
sentences.chinese: 武装犯罪团伙劫持了卡车。

detailed_translations.english: a group of criminals who work together

name: shrink
trans: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩

sentences.english: I’m worried about washing that shirt in case it shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不太敢洗那件衬衫，怕它会缩水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩
detailed_translations.english: to become smaller, or to make something smaller, through the effects of heat or water

name: ancestor
trans: 祖宗， 祖先； 原型； 先驱

sentences.english: My ancestors were French.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先是法国人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祖宗， 祖先； 原型； 先驱
detailed_translations.english: a member of your family who lived a long time ago

sentences.english: From the context of the text, I find the next pretext for selling the textile.
sentences.chinese: 我从课文的前后关系中找到卖纺织品的下一个借口。

sentences.english: In fact, some of these textile innovations are appearing on the catwalk.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，有些纺织品创新正在登上时装表演的舞台。

detailed_translations.english: any type of woven cloth that is made in large quantities, used especially by people in the business of making clothes etc

sentences.english: the former Soviet Union
sentences.chinese: 前苏联

sentences.english: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.chinese: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: He started to panic when he saw the gun.
sentences.chinese: 他看见枪就慌了起来。

sentences.english: Don’t panic! We’ll soon get you out of there.
sentences.chinese: 别慌！我们马上就把你从那儿弄出来。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly feel so frightened that you cannot think clearly or behave sensibly, or to make someone do this
a sudden strong feeling of fear or nervousness that makes you unable to think clearly or behave sensibly

name: extend
trans: 延长， 扩大； 提供， 给予； 伸展， 达到

sentences.english: Management have agreed to extend the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 管理层已同意延长最后期限。

sentences.english: Both vehicles ended up in a ditch.
sentences.chinese: 两辆车都掉进了沟里。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole dug at the side of a field, road etc to hold or remove unwanted water

name: deck
trans: 甲板， 舱面； 层面

sentences.english: Eddie returned to the flight deck (= the part of an aircraft where the pilot sits ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃迪回到了驾驶舱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 甲板， 舱面； 层面
detailed_translations.english: one of the levels on a bus, plane etc

name: scare
trans: 吓， 使害怕； 受惊吓， 感到害怕

sentences.english: Loud noises can scare animals or birds.
sentences.chinese: 噪声太大会惊吓到鸟兽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吓， 使害怕； 受惊吓， 感到害怕
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel frightened
a sudden feeling of fear

name: thunder
trans: 打雷， 轰隆响； 大声喊， 吼
雷，雷声；擂鼓般的响声，轰隆声

sentences.english: The children came thundering downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们噔噔噔地走下楼梯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打雷， 轰隆响； 大声喊， 吼
detailed_translations.english: if it thunders, there is a loud noise in the sky, usually after a flash of lightning

detailed_translations.chinese: 雷，雷声；擂鼓般的响声，轰隆声
detailed_translations.english: the loud noise that you hear during a storm, usually after a flash of lightning

name: observe
trans: 注意到， 观察； 评说； 遵守

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

detailed_translations.chinese: 注意到， 观察； 评说； 遵守
detailed_translations.english: to see and notice some­thing

sentences.english: humorous stories
sentences.chinese: 诙谐的故事

sentences.english: The film has some mildly humorous moments.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中有些略显幽默的片段。

detailed_translations.english: funny and enjoyable

name: furnish
trans: 供应， 提供； 装备

sentences.english: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.chinese: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

detailed_translations.chinese: 供应， 提供； 装备
detailed_translations.english: to supply or provide something

name: bet
trans: 打赌； 赌金， 赌注

sentences.english: How much do you want to bet?
sentences.chinese: 你想赌多少钱？

detailed_translations.english: to risk money on the result of a race, game, competition, or other future event

detailed_translations.chinese: 打赌； 赌金， 赌注
detailed_translations.english: an agreement to risk money on the result of a race, game etc or on something happening, or the money that you risk

name: contact
trans: 与…接触， 与…取得联系

sentences.english: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.english: Contact the Women's Alliance for further details.
sentences.chinese: 请联系妇女联合会获取详情。

detailed_translations.english: communication with a person, organization, country etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 与…接触， 与…取得联系
detailed_translations.english: If you contact someone, you telephone them, write to them, or go to see them in order to tell or ask them something

name: rare
trans: 稀有的， 冷僻的； 珍奇的； 出类拔萃的； 稀薄的； 煎得嫩的

sentences.english: I like my steak rare.
sentences.chinese: 请给我做半熟的牛排。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稀有的， 冷僻的； 珍奇的； 出类拔萃的； 稀薄的； 煎得嫩的
detailed_translations.english: meat that is rare has only been cooked for a short time and is still red

name: discharge
trans: 释放， 排出； 卸货

sentences.english: Hospitals now tend to discharge patients earlier than in the past.
sentences.chinese: 与过去相比，现在医院更趋向于让病人早些出院。

detailed_translations.chinese: 释放， 排出； 卸货
detailed_translations.english: to send out gas, liquid, smoke etc, or to allow it to escape
when gas, liquid, smoke etc is sent out, or the substance that is sent out

sentences.english: a special diet that excludes dairy products
sentences.chinese: 不包含奶制品的特别食谱

sentences.english: The judges decided to exclude evidence which had been unfairly attained.
sentences.chinese: 法官裁决不接纳以不正当手段获取的证据。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately not include something

name: criticism
trans: 批评， 批判； 评论， 评论文章

sentences.english: Despite strong criticism , the new system is still in place.
sentences.chinese: 尽管遭到了猛烈的批评，新制度依然原封不动。

sentences.english: There has been widespread criticism of the decision.
sentences.chinese: 这一决定受到了普遍的批评。

sentences.english: We try to give students constructive criticism .
sentences.chinese: 我们设法对学生提出有建设性的批评。

sentences.english: Another criticism levelled at him was that his teaching methods were old-fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个针对他的批评是，他的教学方法已经过时。

sentences.english: The government’s economic strategy has attracted a lot of criticism .
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策招致了大量的批评。

sentences.english: You must learn to accept criticism .
sentences.chinese: 你必须学会接受批评。

sentences.english: Many employees find it hard to take even mild criticism .
sentences.chinese: 有许多员工甚至连轻微的批评也很难接受。

sentences.english: His actions provoked severe criticism from civil rights groups.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为招致了民权组织的严厉批评。

sentences.english: the storm of criticism that followed his announcement
sentences.chinese: 他的声明引来的批评浪潮

detailed_translations.chinese: 批评， 批判； 评论， 评论文章
detailed_translations.english: remarks that say what you think is bad about someone or something

sentences.english: It is a matter of the utmost urgency to find out what has happened to these people.
sentences.chinese: 当务之急是弄清楚这些人出了什么事。

sentences.english: Security matters are treated with the utmost seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 安全问题受到极为严肃的对待。

detailed_translations.english: You can use utmost to emphasize the importance or seriousness of something or to emphasize the way that it is done
the most that can be done

name: image
trans: 像； 形象； 映像； 形象的描述

sentences.english: He had the clearest image in his mind of his mother and father.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中对父母的印象极其清晰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 像； 形象； 映像； 形象的描述
detailed_translations.english: the opinion people have of a person, organization, product etc, or the way a person, organization etc seems to be to the public

sentences.english: a management consultancy
sentences.chinese: 管理咨询公司

sentences.english: a consultancy firm
sentences.chinese: 咨询公司

detailed_translations.english: a company that gives advice on a particular subject

name: ribbon
trans: 缎带， 丝带； 色带

sentences.english: little girls with ribbons in their hair
sentences.chinese: 头发上系着丝带的小姑娘们

sentences.english: a bundle of letters tied with pale blue ribbon
sentences.chinese: 一捆用淡蓝色丝带扎好的信

sentences.english: The ribbon was cut and the new station was officially open.
sentences.chinese: 剪彩后，新车站正式开始运营。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缎带， 丝带； 色带
detailed_translations.english: a narrow piece of attractive cloth that you use, for example, to tie your hair or hold things together

name: garbage
trans: 垃圾， 废物； 废话； 无用的资料

sentences.english: Can you take out the garbage when you go?
sentences.chinese: 你走的时候把垃圾带出去好吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 垃圾， 废物； 废话； 无用的资料
detailed_translations.english: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away

name: complain
trans: 抱怨， 诉苦； 控告， 投诉

sentences.english: Miners have complained bitterly that the government did not fulfil their promises.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们已愤愤地抱怨政府没有兑现他们的承诺。

sentences.english: The couple complained about the high cost of visiting Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇抱怨了游览欧洲的高昂花费。

sentences.english: I shouldn't complain, I've got a good job to go back to.
sentences.chinese: 我不该抱怨，我已有可回去干的一份好工作。

sentences.english: "I wish someone would do something about it," he complained.
sentences.chinese: “我希望有人能对此做点什么，”他抱怨道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抱怨， 诉苦； 控告， 投诉
detailed_translations.english: If you complain about a situation, you say that you are not satisfied with it

sentences.english: flights between a Greek island and the mainland
sentences.chinese: 希腊一海岛和本土之间的航班

detailed_translations.english: the main area of land that forms a country, as compared to islands near it that are also part of that country

name: homogeneous
trans: 同种类的， 同性质的， 有相同特征的

sentences.english: The unemployed are not a homogeneous group.
sentences.chinese: 失业者并不都是同一类人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 同种类的， 同性质的， 有相同特征的
detailed_translations.english: Homogeneous is used to describe a group or thing which has members or parts that are all the same

name: anxiety
trans: 焦虑， 忧虑； 渴望， 热望

sentences.english: his feelings of anxiety
sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

detailed_translations.chinese: 焦虑， 忧虑； 渴望， 热望
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting to do something very much

sentences.english: Resist the temptation to buy the item until you’re certain you need it.
sentences.chinese: 要抵挡住购买的诱惑，除非你确有需要。

sentences.english: I finally gave in to the temptation and had a cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 我最终还是屈从诱惑，抽了一支烟。

detailed_translations.english: a strong desire to have or do something even though you know you should not

name: adjust
trans: 调整， 调节， 校正

sentences.english: Check and adjust the brakes regularly.
sentences.chinese: 经常检查并调节刹车装置。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 尝尝汤的味道，然后调整佐料用量。

sentences.english: If your employment status changes, your tax code will be adjusted accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 如果就业状况改变，你的免税代码也会作相应调整。

detailed_translations.chinese: 调整， 调节， 校正
detailed_translations.english: to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Skinner was the psychologist who popularized behavior modification.
sentences.chinese: 斯金纳就是那位使行为矫正概念得到普及的心理学家。

detailed_translations.english: to make a difficult subject or idea able to be easily understood by ordinary people who have no special knowledge about it

name: burst
trans: 爆裂，爆炸；挤满；突然打开；突然发作

sentences.english: The pipes had burst and the house was under two feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 水管爆裂，房子被水淹了两英尺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爆裂，爆炸；挤满；突然打开；突然发作
detailed_translations.english: if something bursts, or if you burst it, it breaks open or apart suddenly and violently so that its contents come out
to open suddenly
the act of something bursting or the place where it has burst

name: vigorous
trans: 朝气蓬勃的； 有力的， 用力的

sentences.english: Your dog needs at least 20 minutes of vigorous exercise every day.
sentences.chinese: 你的狗每天需要进行至少20分钟的剧烈运动。

sentences.english: Environmentalists have begun a vigorous campaign to oppose nuclear dumping in the area.
sentences.chinese: 环保人士已经发动了一场积极的运动，反对在该地区倾倒核废物。

sentences.english: a vigorous debate
sentences.chinese: 一场激烈的辩论

sentences.english: Vigorous efforts are being made to find a solution to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 正积极地寻找办法解决这个问题。

sentences.english: The measures provoked vigorous opposition in right-wing circles.
sentences.chinese: 这些举措激起了右翼群体的强烈反对。

detailed_translations.chinese: 朝气蓬勃的； 有力的， 用力的
detailed_translations.english: using a lot of energy and strength or determination

sentences.english: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.english: students who run up huge debts
sentences.chinese: 欠下巨额债务的学生

detailed_translations.english: a sum of money that a person or organization owes
a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool

name: necessity
trans: 必需品； 必要性， 需要

sentences.english: She saw books as a necessity, not a luxury.
sentences.chinese: 她视书籍为必需品而非奢侈品。

sentences.english: A car is an absolute necessity if you live in the country.
sentences.chinese: 你要是住在乡下，绝对需要有辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必需品； 必要性， 需要
detailed_translations.english: something that you need to have in order to live

sentences.english: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.chinese: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。

sentences.english: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
sentences.chinese: 大雾笼罩了田野。

sentences.english: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午，雾散了。

detailed_translations.english: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

name: frame
trans: 给…镶框； 陷害， 诬告； 制定； 表达

sentences.english: They removed the picture from its wooden frame.
sentences.chinese: 他们把画从木镜框中取下来。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wood, metal, plastic etc that surrounds something such as a picture or window, and holds it in place

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…镶框； 陷害， 诬告； 制定； 表达
detailed_translations.english: to put a picture in a structure that will hold it firmly

name: lucky
trans: 幸运的， 侥幸的； 吉利的

sentences.english: I didn’t really know your name – it was just a lucky guess .
sentences.chinese: 我并不知道你的名字―只是运气好猜中的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幸运的， 侥幸的； 吉利的
detailed_translations.english: having good luck

name: origin
trans: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

sentences.english: Energy consumption rises as countries industrialize.
sentences.chinese: 能源消耗随着各国工业化而增加。

detailed_translations.english: When a country industrializes or is industrialized, it develops a lot of industries

name: clash
trans: 发生冲突；不协调；砰地相撞，发出刺耳的撞击声
冲突； 不协调； 刺耳的撞击声

sentences.english: Troops clashed near the border.
sentences.chinese: 军队在边境附近发生了冲突。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发生冲突；不协调；砰地相撞，发出刺耳的撞击声
detailed_translations.english: if two armies, groups etc clash, they start fighting – used in news reports

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突； 不协调； 刺耳的撞击声
detailed_translations.english: a short fight between two armies or groups – used in news reports

sentences.english: ...the introduction of legislation to compel cyclists to wear a helmet.
sentences.chinese: …强制骑车人戴头盔的法律的引入。

detailed_translations.english: to force someone to do something

name: capable
trans: 有能力的， 有才能的

sentences.english: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

sentences.english: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

sentences.english: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 有能力的， 有才能的
detailed_translations.english: having the qualities or ability needed to do something

name: depress
trans: 使沮丧； 使不景气； 削弱， 抑制

sentences.english: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.chinese: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

sentences.english: It depresses me that nobody seems to care.
sentences.chinese: 似乎没有人在乎，这让我感到很沮丧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使沮丧； 使不景气； 削弱， 抑制
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very unhappy

name: parade
trans: 游行， 列队前进； 招摇而行

sentences.english: More than four thousand soldiers, sailors, and airmen paraded down the Champs Elysées.
sentences.chinese: 超过四千名士兵、水手和飞行员沿着香榭丽舍大街游行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 游行， 列队前进； 招摇而行
detailed_translations.english: to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something
a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street

name: burden
trans: 加重压于， 烦扰； 负担， 装载

sentences.english: His family responsibilities had started to become a burden.
sentences.chinese: 家庭责任已开始成为他的负担。

detailed_translations.english: something difficult or worrying that you are responsible for

detailed_translations.chinese: 加重压于， 烦扰； 负担， 装载

name: precaution
trans: 预防； 防备， 警惕

sentences.english: Fire precautions were neglected.
sentences.chinese: 防火措施被忽视了。

sentences.english: Vets took precautions to prevent the spread of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 兽医们为防止疾病蔓延采取了预防措施。

detailed_translations.chinese: 预防； 防备， 警惕
detailed_translations.english: something you do in order to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening

name: lemon
trans: 柠檬； 柠檬树； 柠檬黄， 淡黄色

sentences.english: a slice of lemon
sentences.chinese: 一片柠檬

sentences.english: Add a few drops of lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: 加几滴柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 柠檬； 柠檬树； 柠檬黄， 淡黄色
detailed_translations.english: a fruit with a hard yellow skin and sour juice

name: personality
trans: 人格， 个性； 人物， 名人

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 人格， 个性； 人物， 名人
detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

name: plot
trans: 密谋， 计划； 绘制…的平面图， 在图上标绘…的位置
故事情节；计划，密谋；小块土地

sentences.english: The minister was found guilty of plotting the downfall of the government.
sentences.chinese: 那名部长被判犯有阴谋颠覆政府罪。

sentences.english: the story of a woman who plots revenge
sentences.chinese: 一个女人策划报复的故事

detailed_translations.chinese: 密谋， 计划； 绘制…的平面图， 在图上标绘…的位置
detailed_translations.english: to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事情节；计划，密谋；小块土地
detailed_translations.english: a secret plan by a group of people to do something harmful or illegal

name: sanction
trans: 批准， 认可； 约束因素， 约束力；  国际制裁

sentences.english: The church refused to sanction the king’s second marriage.
sentences.chinese: 教会拒绝批准国王的第二次婚姻。

detailed_translations.english: to officially accept or allow something

detailed_translations.chinese: 批准， 认可； 约束因素， 约束力；  国际制裁
detailed_translations.english: official orders or laws stopping trade, communication etc with another country, as a way of forcing its leaders to make political changes

name: rate
trans: 被评价； 被列入特定级别
速度，速率；比率；价格，费用；等级
评估；给…定级，把…列为；值得，应得

sentences.english: Immediately his heart rate (= the number of beats per minute ) increased.
sentences.chinese: 他的心率立即加快了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 被评价； 被列入特定级别
detailed_translations.english: to be considered as having a particular quality, value, or standard

detailed_translations.chinese: 速度，速率；比率；价格，费用；等级
detailed_translations.english: the number of times something happens, or the number of examples of something within a certain period

detailed_translations.chinese: 评估；给…定级，把…列为；值得，应得
detailed_translations.english: to deserve something

name: alert
trans: 警戒， 戒备； 警报

sentences.english: The animal raised its head, suddenly alert.

sentences.english: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: as much as is needed for a particular purpose

name: claim
trans: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；以…为其成果；需要，值得
要求， 认领， 索赔； 声称； 断言

sentences.english: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.
sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders will claim victory if the turnout is lower than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；以…为其成果；需要，值得
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求， 认领， 索赔； 声称； 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.english: an antique rosewood desk
sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

detailed_translations.english: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable
a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

sentences.english: Sow the seeds in late March.
sentences.chinese: 三月底播种。

detailed_translations.english: to plant or scatter seeds on a piece of ground

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: petroleum-based products
sentences.chinese: 石油产品

detailed_translations.english: oil that is obtained from below the surface of the Earth and is used to make petrol,  paraffin  , and various chemical substances

name: communication
trans: 通讯， 交流， 交际； 通信工具， 交通联系

sentences.english: Good communication is vital in a large organization.
sentences.chinese: 在大机构里良好的沟通是极为重要的。

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication .
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通讯， 交流， 交际； 通信工具， 交通联系
detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

name: directly
trans: 直接地； 正好地， 截然； 立即

sentences.english: The new property tax law won’t directly affect us.
sentences.chinese: 新的财产税法不会直接影响到我们。

sentences.english: We hope to bring together the countries directly involved in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望让直接卷入冲突的各国重归于好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地； 正好地， 截然； 立即
detailed_translations.english: with no other person, action, process etc between

name: tolerance
trans: 忍受， 容忍， 忍耐力； 公差

sentences.english: ...his tolerance and understanding of diverse human nature.
sentences.chinese: …他对各种人性的宽容和理解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忍受， 容忍， 忍耐力； 公差
detailed_translations.english: willingness to allow people to do, say, or believe what they want without criticizing or punishing them

sentences.english: Tom knelt down and patted the dog.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆跪下来轻轻拍了拍那只狗。

detailed_translations.english: to be in or move into a position where your body is resting on your knees

name: porter
trans: 搬运工人； 看门人， 大楼管理员

sentences.chinese: 我们的出租车停在老德里车站，一个搬运工疾步跑向车门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬运工人； 看门人， 大楼管理员
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc

sentences.english: Make sure all the windows are securely fastened before you leave.
sentences.chinese: 离开前要确保所有的窗子都已关严。

detailed_translations.english: to firmly close a window, gate etc so that it will not open, or to become firmly closed

name: contest
trans: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳

sentences.english: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.chinese: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.english: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.english: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.chinese: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.english: the 1975 Liberal leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 1975年自由党的领导权之争

detailed_translations.english: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳
detailed_translations.english: to say formally that you do not accept something or do not agree with it

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

name: dirt
trans: 灰尘， 土； 污物， 污垢

sentences.chinese: 你没看见那车上沾了多少泥！

sentences.english: His face and hands were black with dirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸和手黑乎乎的，全是泥。

sentences.english: a patch of grass, covered in dog dirt
sentences.chinese: 满是狗屎的一小片草地

detailed_translations.chinese: 灰尘， 土； 污物， 污垢
detailed_translations.english: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust

sentences.chinese: 我们提供物理、 天体物理和数学领域的课程。

sentences.english: We are entering here into one of the most complex domains in astrophysics.
sentences.chinese: 这里我们涉及到了天体物理学中最复杂的领域之一。

sentences.chinese: 如果外星人懂得天体物理学，他们可能会自信地预测到，地球这个生物圈将在太阳燃烧并灭亡之后几十亿年之内面临毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the chemical structure of the stars and the forces that influence them

sentences.english: What we are seeking, after all, is not simply an agreement to limit greenhouse gas emissions.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻求的目标毕竟不只是一项限制温室气体排放的协议。

sentences.chinese: 我认为每一个人都是我们每天的行动和选择中排放的温室气体的责任。

sentences.chinese: 但是过了不久，黏土又给人放进了一间温室，这里阳光和煦地照射着它，并且经常给它喷水，这样就在它一天天静静等候的时候，某种变化终于开始到来。

detailed_translations.english: a glass building used for growing plants that need warmth, light, and protection

trans: 保护， 维持； 保存； 腌制

sentences.chinese: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

sentences.chinese: 白天的气温仅零上5度。

used to show that one number or amount is added to another
a  plus sign

trans: 建立， 设立； 确立； 证实

sentences.chinese: 博恩市是德国移民于19世纪40年代建立的。

sentences.english: Our goal is to establish a new research centre in the North.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是在北方建立一个新的研究中心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建立， 设立； 确立； 证实

sentences.chinese: 该产业经历了一轮快速扩张。

detailed_translations.english: when something increases in size, range, amount etc

sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

sentences.chinese: 没有强行闯入的迹象。

sentences.chinese: 您可以通过实现这个接口来处理许可检查的结果。

sentences.chinese: 因为你没有驾驶执照，所以不允许你开车。

detailed_translations.english: produced by combining different artificial substances, rather than being naturally produced

sentences.chinese: 联合国总部

detailed_translations.english: the main building or offices used by a large company or organization

sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

trans: 短文， 散文， 小品文

sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 短文， 散文， 小品文

trans: 俯瞰； 检查； 测量

sentences.english: Of the 100 companies surveyed, 10% had a turnover of £50 m to £99 m.
sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.chinese: 浴缸塞子

name: bunch
trans: 集中， 挤在一起； 形成一束

sentences.chinese: 她把布揉成一团扔了。

detailed_translations.english: to pull material together tightly in folds
a group of things that are fastened, held, or growing together
to hold or tie things together in a bunch

sentences.chinese: 有什么不对劲吗？你看起来有点紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a tense situation is one in which you feel very anxious and worried because of something bad that might happen
to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

sentences.english: The match had to be postponed until next week.
sentences.chinese: 比赛不得不推迟到下周举行。

sentences.chinese: 对他的审判被无限期推迟了。

sentences.chinese: 客人们以香槟为新娘新郎敬酒。

detailed_translations.english: a woman at the time she gets married or just after she is married

trans: 有利的， 赞成的； 顺利的

detailed_translations.english: suitable and likely to make something happen or succeed

sentences.english: the sound of hammering and sawing
sentences.chinese: 锤打和拉锯的声音

the part of a gun that hits the explosive charge that fires a bullet

sentences.english: a box of candies
sentences.chinese: 一盒糖果

sentences.english: a candy bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: Do you want a piece of candy?
sentences.chinese: 你要吃颗糖吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sweet food made from sugar or chocolate

sentences.english: The seal on the box broke when it fell from its hiding-place.
sentences.chinese: 盒子从隐藏处掉下时上面的封口破了。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea animal that eats fish and lives around coasts

name: mental
trans: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

name: decent
trans: 像样的， 过得去的， 体面的； 宽厚的， 大方的； 正派的； 合乎礼仪的， 得体的

sentences.chinese: 得体的葬礼

sentences.english: Paul visited the local bars more frequently than was decent for a senior lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 保罗过于频繁地光顾当地酒吧，不太合乎高级讲师的身份。

sentences.english: The chairman did the decent thing (= did what people thought he ought to ) and resigned.
sentences.chinese: 主席体面地辞去了职务。
