sentences.english: the storage of highly radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 高放射性材料的存放

detailed_translations.english: the process of keeping or putting something in a special place while it is not being used

sentences.english: The state police are investigating the incident.
sentences.chinese: 州警察正调查此事。

sentences.english: The study investigates the impact of violent TV programming on children.
sentences.chinese: 该研究调查暴力电视节目对儿童的影响。

sentences.english: I heard a noise and went downstairs to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 我听见响声，就下楼去看个究竟。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find out the truth about something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

sentences.english: a victim of racial discrimination
sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的受害者

sentences.english: This part of the community needs to be protected from racial prejudice .
sentences.chinese: 需保护社区里的这一部分人，使其免受种族偏见的伤害。

sentences.english: evidence of racial harassment
sentences.chinese: 种族骚扰的证据

sentences.english: the campaign for racial equality
sentences.chinese: 争取种族平等的运动

sentences.english: the need for tolerance and racial harmony
sentences.chinese: 包容与种族融洽的必要性

detailed_translations.english: relating to the relationships between different races of people who now live in the same country or area

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another
a piece of equipment that starts or stops the flow of electricity to a machine, light etc when you push it

sentences.english: ...his niece, the daughter of his eldest sister.
sentences.chinese: …他的外甥女，他大姐的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: the daughter of your brother or sister, or the daughter of your wife’s or husband’s brother or sister

sentences.english: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.english: issues of considerable importance
sentences.chinese: 相当重要的问题

sentences.english: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important

name: auxiliary
trans: 辅助的， 附属的； 后备的

sentences.english: an auxiliary nurse
sentences.chinese: 助理护士

sentences.english: auxiliary staff
sentences.chinese: 辅助员工

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的， 附属的； 后备的
detailed_translations.english: auxiliary workers provide additional help for another group of workers

name: heal
trans: 愈合， 痊愈， 恢复健康
使愈合，治愈，使康复；调停，消除

sentences.english: It took three months for my arm to heal properly.
sentences.chinese: 我的胳膊三个月之后才痊愈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 愈合， 痊愈， 恢复健康
detailed_translations.english: if a wound or a broken bone heals or is healed, the flesh, skin, or bone grows back together and becomes healthy again

detailed_translations.chinese: 使愈合，治愈，使康复；调停，消除
detailed_translations.english: if a wound or a broken bone heals or is healed, the flesh, skin, or bone grows back together and becomes healthy again

name: reserve
trans: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

name: somehow
trans: 由于某种原因， 不知怎么的； 以某种方式

sentences.english: Don’t worry, we’ll get the money back somehow.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我们总会把那些钱拿回来的。

sentences.english: Somehow, I managed to lose my keys.
sentences.chinese: 我不知怎的竟然把钥匙弄丢了。

sentences.english: Maybe we could glue it together somehow or other .
sentences.chinese: 也许我们可以想什么办法把它粘起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由于某种原因， 不知怎么的； 以某种方式
detailed_translations.english: in some way, or by some means, although you do not know how

name: dive
trans: 跳水； 潜水；  俯冲

sentences.english: Diving off the cliffs is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 从悬崖上跳水是很危险的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跳水； 潜水；  俯冲
detailed_translations.english: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

name: brick
trans: 砖， 砖块， 砖状物

sentences.english: a brick wall
sentences.chinese: 砖墙

sentences.english: a house made of brick
sentences.chinese: 砖房

sentences.english: Protesters attacked the police with stones and bricks.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者用石头和砖块袭击警察。

detailed_translations.chinese: 砖， 砖块， 砖状物
detailed_translations.english: a hard block of baked clay used for building walls, houses etc

name: sympathy
trans: 同情； 一致， 支持， 赞同

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.chinese: 同情； 一致， 支持， 赞同
detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

sentences.english: a rubbish heap
sentences.chinese: 垃圾堆

sentences.english: We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
sentences.chinese: 我们把树枝堆起来烧。

detailed_translations.english: a large untidy pile of things

name: consumer
trans: 消费者， 用户， 消耗者

sentences.english: Consumers will soon be paying higher airfares.
sentences.chinese: 不久消费者就要支付更高的机票价了。

sentences.english: It will offer a wider choice of goods for the consumer (= consumers in general ) .
sentences.chinese: 它将为消费者提供更多的商品选择。

sentences.english: Consumer demand led to higher imports of manufactured goods.
sentences.chinese: 消费者需求促使制造商品的进口量增加了。

sentences.english: Consumer spending was down by 0.1% last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月消费支出下降了0.1%。

sentences.english: sources of consumer advice
sentences.chinese: 给予消费者建议的信息来源

detailed_translations.chinese: 消费者， 用户， 消耗者
detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and uses products and services

sentences.english: Survivors of the crash were rescued by helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 空难的生还者被直升机救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: to save someone or something from a situation of danger or harm

sentences.english: She has gone from being a healthy, fit, and sporty young woman to being a cripple.
sentences.chinese: 她从一个健康、强壮、爱好体育运动的年轻姑娘变成了一个残疾人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is unable to walk properly because their legs are damaged or injured - now considered offensive
to hurt someone badly so that they cannot walk properly

name: highly
trans: 高度地， 极， 非常赞许地

sentences.english: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的母亲对学校的处理方法持强烈的批评态度。

sentences.english: highly competitive industries
sentences.chinese: 竞争非常激烈的行业

sentences.english: a highly desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 宜居的街区

sentences.english: T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’ T.S.
sentences.chinese: 艾略特极有影响力的诗作《荒原》

sentences.english: a highly controversial issue
sentences.chinese: 有很大争议的问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 高度地， 极， 非常赞许地
detailed_translations.english: very

name: brief
trans: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要
detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

sentences.english: a computer keyboard
sentences.chinese: 计算机键盘

detailed_translations.english: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine

name: initiative
trans: 主动性； 首创精神； 主动的行动， 倡议； 主动权

sentences.english: I wish my son would show more initiative.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的儿子能表现得再主动一些。

sentences.english: Don’t keep asking me for advice. Use your initiative.
sentences.chinese: 别老是要我给你出主意，发挥一下你自己的决断能力吧。

sentences.english: Lt. Carlos was not obeying orders. He acted on his own initiative (= he was not told what to do ).
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯中尉没有服从命令，而是自作主张。

detailed_translations.chinese: 主动性； 首创精神； 主动的行动， 倡议； 主动权
detailed_translations.english: the ability to make decisions and take action without waiting for someone to tell you what to do

name: recover
trans: 重新获得， 挽回； 恢复

sentences.english: Four paintings stolen from the gallery have been recovered.
sentences.chinese: 美术馆的四幅被盗画作已经失而复得。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新获得， 挽回； 恢复
detailed_translations.english: to get back something that was taken from you, lost, or almost destroyed

sentences.english: The amount of available water determines the number of houses that can be built.
sentences.chinese: 可用的水量决定可以建造多少房子。

sentences.english: The age of a wine is a determining factor as to how it tastes.
sentences.chinese: 酒的年份对于酒的味道是个决定性因素。

detailed_translations.english: if something determines something else, it directly influences or decides it
to find out the facts about something

name: nature
trans: 大自然； 本性； 性质

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大自然； 本性； 性质
detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

name: social
trans: 社会的； 交际的， 社交的

sentences.english: social issues, such as unemployment and education
sentences.chinese: 失业和教育之类的社会问题

sentences.english: the country’s serious social problems
sentences.chinese: 该国严重的社会问题

sentences.english: a challenge to the social order
sentences.chinese: 对社会秩序的一个挑战

detailed_translations.chinese: 社会的； 交际的， 社交的
detailed_translations.english: relating to human society and its organization, or the quality of people’s lives

sentences.english: When somebody comes for treatment I always ask them if they are on any medication.
sentences.chinese: 有人来治疗时，我总是会问他们是否在服药。

detailed_translations.english: medicine or drugs given to people who are ill

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: to make a hole in something using a drill
a method of teaching students, sports players etc something by making them repeat the same lesson, exercise etc many times

sentences.english: a group of highly intelligent (= very intelligent )students
sentences.chinese: 一组聪明异常的学生

sentences.english: Sontag was once famously described as the most intelligent woman in America.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔格曾被称为美国最聪明的女人，这是众人皆知的事。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent person has a high level of mental ability and is good at understanding ideas and thinking clearly

name: clerk
trans: 店员， 办事员， 职员

sentences.english: a clerk in a commercial firm
sentences.chinese: 一家商行的文员

detailed_translations.chinese: 店员， 办事员， 职员
detailed_translations.english: someone who keeps records or accounts in an office

name: lobby
trans: 大厅；休息室；院外活动集团

sentences.english: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.chinese: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。

detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

detailed_translations.chinese: 大厅；休息室；院外活动集团
detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building

name: acknowledge
trans: 承认， 承认…的权威； 告知收到， 确认； 对…表示感谢， 报偿

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: Claire acknowledged that she was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔承认有罪。

sentences.english: The government must acknowledge what is happening and do something about it.
sentences.chinese: 对于目前的情况，政府必须承认其存在并对此采取措施。

sentences.english: ‘Maybe you are right,’ she acknowledged.
sentences.chinese: “也许你是对的。”她承认道。

sentences.english: This is a fact that most smokers readily acknowledge .
sentences.chinese: 这是大多数烟民都愿意承认的事实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认， 承认…的权威； 告知收到， 确认； 对…表示感谢， 报偿
detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

name: equip
trans: 装备， 配备； 使有准备

sentences.english: They try to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽量给他们的车辆配备各种小装置以应付任何可能的突发状况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装备， 配备； 使有准备
detailed_translations.english: to provide a person or place with the things that are needed for a particular kind of activity or work

name: radiation
trans: 放射物， 辐射能； 辐射

sentences.english: An accident at the power station could result in large amounts of radiation being released.
sentences.chinese: 发电站事故会造成大量核辐射泄漏。

sentences.english: a lethal dose of radiation
sentences.chinese: 致命剂量的辐射

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射物， 辐射能； 辐射
detailed_translations.english: a form of energy that comes especially from nuclear reactions, which in large amounts is very harmful to living things

sentences.english: the Christian religion
sentences.chinese: 基督教

sentences.english: the Christian church
sentences.chinese: 基督教会

sentences.english: a Christian minister
sentences.chinese: 基督教牧师

detailed_translations.english: related to Christianity
a person who believes in the ideas taught by Jesus Christ

sentences.english: She felt the blood pulsing through her veins .
sentences.chinese: 她觉得血液冲击着自己的血管。

sentences.english: Colored lights pulsed in time to the music.
sentences.chinese: 彩灯随着音乐节拍闪动。

detailed_translations.english: to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound
the regular beat that can be felt, for example at your wrist, as your heart pumps blood around your body

sentences.english: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.english: The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.chinese: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

detailed_translations.english: very great comfort and pleasure, such as you get from expensive food, beautiful houses, cars etc

name: spiritual
trans: 精神的， 心灵的； 宗教的

sentences.english: Painting helps fill a spiritual need for beauty.
sentences.chinese: 绘画可以满足对美的精神需求。

sentences.english: spiritual values
sentences.chinese: 精神价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神的， 心灵的； 宗教的
detailed_translations.english: relating to your spirit rather than to your body or mind

name: worthwhile
trans: 值得花时间的， 值得做的

sentences.english: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 值得花时间的， 值得做的
detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

name: mould
trans: 霉，霉菌；模型，铸模；性格，气质
用模子做， 浇铸； 使形成， 把…铸造成

sentences.english: Another method, used especially for figures, was to pour the clay into a mould.
sentences.chinese: 另一个方法是把黏土倒入模具中，尤其用于铸造人像。

sentences.english: lime jell-o in a mould
sentences.chinese: 装在果冻模里的来檬果冻

detailed_translations.chinese: 霉，霉菌；模型，铸模；性格，气质
detailed_translations.english: a hollow container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, so that when it becomes solid, it takes the shape of the container

detailed_translations.chinese: 用模子做， 浇铸； 使形成， 把…铸造成
detailed_translations.english: to shape a soft substance by pressing or rolling it or by putting it into a mould

sentences.english: Marketing techniques are becoming increasingly sophisticated.
sentences.chinese: 市场营销技巧越来越巧妙。

sentences.english: Increasingly, young people distrust all forms of government.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人越来越不相信任何形式的政府。

detailed_translations.english: more and more all the time

sentences.english: He slipped and fell, badly bruising an elbow.
sentences.chinese: 他滑倒了，严重挫伤了一只胳膊肘。

detailed_translations.english: the joint where your arm bends
to push someone with your elbows, especially in order to move past them

sentences.english: Would you like some salad with your pasta?
sentences.chinese: 你的意大利面要配些色拉吗？

sentences.english: a spinach salad
sentences.chinese: 菠菜色拉

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of raw vegetables, especially  lettuce  ,  cucumber  , and tomato

name: strategic
trans: 对全局有重要意义的， 关键的； 战略的

sentences.english: UN forces made a strategic withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 联合国部队作了战略性撤退。

sentences.english: strategic planning meetings
sentences.chinese: 战略计划会议

sentences.english: a strategic decision to move production to Hungary
sentences.chinese: 把生产转至匈牙利的战略决定

detailed_translations.chinese: 对全局有重要意义的， 关键的； 战略的
detailed_translations.english: done as part of a plan, especially in a military, business, or political situation

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

sentences.english: ‘What do you wear when you go out?’ ‘Well, it varies.’
sentences.chinese: “你出门的时候通常穿什么衣服？”“噢，得看情况。"

detailed_translations.english: if something varies, it changes depending on the situation

name: readily
trans: 乐意地， 欣然地； 容易地； 很快地， 立即

sentences.english: Boats are readily available to visitors.
sentences.chinese: 游客可以很方便地租到船只。

sentences.english: The information is readily accessible on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 这些信息在因特网上一查就能找到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐意地， 欣然地； 容易地； 很快地， 立即
detailed_translations.english: quickly and easily

sentences.english: We had to stoop to pass through the low entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我们得弯腰通过那低矮的入口。

sentences.english: Dave stooped down to tie his shoes.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫俯身系鞋带。

detailed_translations.english: to bend your body forward and down
if you have a stoop, your shoulders are bent forward

name: upper
trans: 上面的， 地位较高的

sentences.english: the upper lip
sentences.chinese: 上唇

detailed_translations.chinese: 上面的， 地位较高的
detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

sentences.english: Interest rates rocketed up.
sentences.chinese: 利率飞涨。

detailed_translations.english: if a price or amount rockets, it increases quickly and suddenly
a vehicle used for travelling or carrying things into space, which is shaped like a big tube

sentences.english: a splendid idea
sentences.chinese: 很妙的主意

sentences.english: a splendid opportunity
sentences.chinese: 绝佳的机会

sentences.english: The staff are doing a splendid job.
sentences.chinese: 员工们干得非常棒。

detailed_translations.english: very good

sentences.english: Fairfax County, Virginia
sentences.chinese: 弗吉尼亚州费尔法克斯县

detailed_translations.english: an area of a state or country that has its own government to deal with local matters

name: respondent
trans: 回答者； 响应者； 被告

sentences.english: Only 62 percent of respondents said they were satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 回复调查的人中只有62%表示满意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答者； 响应者； 被告
detailed_translations.english: someone who has to defend their own case in a law court, especially in a  divorce  case

name: episode
trans: 一个事件； 插曲， 片段； 连续剧的一集

sentences.english: Watch next week’s thrilling episode!
sentences.chinese: 请收看下周精彩的一集！

detailed_translations.chinese: 一个事件； 插曲， 片段； 连续剧的一集
detailed_translations.english: a television or radio programme that is one of a series of programmes in which the same story is continued each week

sentences.english: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.chinese: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time

name: determination
trans: 决心， 决定； 确定

sentences.english: his dogged determination (= very strong determination ) to succeed
sentences.chinese: 他想要成功的坚定决心

detailed_translations.chinese: 决心， 决定； 确定
detailed_translations.english: the act of deciding something officially

name: discipline
trans: 训练； 惩罚， 处罚

sentences.english: The book gives parents advice on discipline.
sentences.chinese: 这本书指导父母如何管教孩子。

sentences.english: serious discipline problems in the police force
sentences.chinese: 警察队伍内严重的纪律问题

detailed_translations.english: a way of training someone so that they learn to control their behaviour and obey rules

detailed_translations.chinese: 训练； 惩罚， 处罚
detailed_translations.english: to punish someone in order to keep order and control

sentences.english: She was evidently a heavy smoker.
sentences.chinese: 她显然烟瘾很大。

sentences.english: He was evidently in pain.
sentences.chinese: 他显然很痛。

sentences.english: She was evidently upset by what she saw.
sentences.chinese: 她显然对所见到的事情感到不快。

sentences.english: Evidently, the builders had finished and gone home early.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，建筑工人干完活后早早回家了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something is true because you can see that it is true

sentences.english: Scientists need to be objective when doing research.
sentences.chinese: 科学家做研究时要客观。

detailed_translations.english: based on facts, or making a decision that is based on facts rather than on your feelings or beliefs
something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics

name: injure
trans: 伤害， 损害， 使遭受损伤

sentences.english: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伤害， 损害， 使遭受损伤
detailed_translations.english: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack

sentences.english: The men claim they have been victimized because of their political activity.
sentences.chinese: 那些人声称他们因为自己的政治活动而受到了迫害。

detailed_translations.english: to treat someone unfairly because you do not like them, their beliefs, or the race they belong to

sentences.english: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.english: Environmental groups are exerting pressure on the government to tighten pollution laws.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织在向政府施加压力，要求从严执行环保法律法规。

detailed_translations.english: to use your power, influence etc in order to make something happen

sentences.english: a Chinese province
sentences.chinese: 中国的一个省

detailed_translations.english: one of the large areas into which some countries are divided, and which usually has its own local government

name: scandal
trans: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨

sentences.english: It caused quite a scandal when he left his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.english: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal .
sentences.chinese: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.english: He has been at the centre of a political scandal .
sentences.chinese: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.english: a major scandal involving the government
sentences.chinese: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.english: a series of financial scandals
sentences.chinese: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.english: a sex scandal that ruined his reputation
sentences.chinese: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.english: They had already left the country when the scandal broke .
sentences.chinese: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨
detailed_translations.english: an event in which someone, especially someone important, behaves in a bad way that shocks people

name: horrible
trans: 令人恐惧的， 可怕的； 骇人听闻的； 极讨厌的， 使人不愉快的； 糟透的

sentences.english: The weather has been really horrible all week.
sentences.chinese: 整个星期天气都很糟。

sentences.english: a horrible smell
sentences.chinese: 极难闻的气味

detailed_translations.english: a railway system that runs under the ground below a big city

sentences.english: Have steps been taken to acquaint breeders with their right to apply for licenses?

detailed_translations.english: a material that is elastic can stretch and then go back to its usual length or size

Elastic is a rubber material that stretches when you pull it and returns to its original size and shape when you let it go. Elastic is often used in clothes to make them fit tightly, for example, around the waist.

name: assist
trans: 援助， 帮助， 协助

trans: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的

sentences.chinese: 大量难民涌过边境。

sentences.english: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的

sentences.chinese: 军队将不得不干预以阻止进一步的战斗。

sentences.chinese: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.chinese: 曼联和阿森纳均为夺冠的热门球队。

trans: 限制， 使局限； 使不外出， 禁闭

sentences.chinese: 极端主义者公开鼓吹使用暴力。

sentences.english: military equipment

sentences.chinese: 政府警告说，如果叛乱分子不从该地区撤出，就要采取军事行动。

sentences.chinese: 美国准备动用武力达成目的。

sentences.chinese: 欧洲军事力量发动的袭击

detailed_translations.english: used by, involving, or relating to the army, navy, or airforce
the military forces of a country

sentences.chinese: 她勉强笑了笑。

sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.chinese: 严寒

sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

one of a set of numbers which give the exact position of a point on a map, computer screen etc

sentences.chinese: 一切生物都要适应环境条件的变化。

sentences.chinese: 去年流感大暴发期间有五百多人死亡。

sentences.english: (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.

sentences.chinese: 想象一下骑着自行车和摩托车走在拐弯处时，你朝着拐角处倾斜，这在物理上仍然保持了完全笔直。

name: remarkable

sentences.chinese: 她取得了显著的进步。

sentences.english: a remarkable coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的巧合

sentences.english: He’s a remarkable man .
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人。

name: brake

sentences.chinese: 他听到当汽车刹车为避免撞车时轮胎发出了刺耳的尖声。

name: tube

sentences.chinese: 一管牙膏

detailed_translations.english: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through

sentences.chinese: 海军军官

sentences.english: naval battles
sentences.chinese: 海战

detailed_translations.english: relating to the navy or used by the navy

name: failure
trans: 失败， 失败的人； 失灵， 故障； 不履行

sentences.english: Successful people often aren’t very good at dealing with failure.
sentences.chinese: 一帆风顺的人往往不太擅长应对失败。

detailed_translations.chinese: 失败， 失败的人； 失灵， 故障； 不履行
detailed_translations.english: a lack of success in achieving or doing something

sentences.english: He is studying accountancy or he is an accountancy student.
sentences.chinese: 他正在学习会计学或他是一名会计专业的学生。

sentences.chinese: 企业环境的优劣直接影响会计工作质量的高低。

detailed_translations.english: the profession or work of keeping or checking financial accounts, calculating taxes etc

name: forge
trans: 打制， 锻造； 伪造

sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的信用卡，并假冒我的签名。

sentences.english: a forged passport

sentences.english: My bedroom carpet is green.
sentences.chinese: 我卧室里的地毯是绿色的。

sentences.english: All the rooms had fitted carpets (= carpets cut to fit the shape of the rooms ) .
sentences.chinese: 所有的房间都铺了全室地毯。

detailed_translations.english: heavy woven material for covering floors or stairs, or a piece of this material

name: solve
trans: 解答； 解释； 解决

sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma

detailed_translations.chinese: 解答； 解释； 解决

name: demonstrate
trans: 说明； 论证； 表露

sentences.english: The study demonstrates the link between poverty and malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究证明了贫困与营养不良之间的联系。

sentences.english: The government now has an opportunity to demonstrate its commitment to reform.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在有机会表明改革的决心了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明； 论证； 表露
detailed_translations.english: to show or prove something clearly

name: region
trans: 地区， 地带， 区域； 范围， 幅度

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

detailed_translations.chinese: 地区， 地带， 区域； 范围， 幅度
detailed_translations.english: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits

name: support
trans: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you agree with an idea, group, or person, and usually to help them because you want them to succeed

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

sentences.english: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.chinese: 客户们通常提前付费，或按月，或按季度，或按年。

detailed_translations.english: Yearly is also an adverb
happening or appearing every year or once a year

name: deceive
trans: 欺骗， 蒙蔽， 行骗

sentences.english: He had been deceived by a young man claiming to be the son of a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 他被一个自称是百万富翁之子的年轻人骗了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欺骗， 蒙蔽， 行骗
detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true

sentences.english: a china cup and saucer
sentences.chinese: 一套瓷茶杯和杯托

detailed_translations.english: a small round plate that curves up at the edges, that you put a cup on

sentences.english: The best way to explore the island is to hire a car.
sentences.chinese: 在该岛寻幽访胜的最好方式就是租用一辆汽车。

sentences.english: What does it cost to hire a boat for a week?
sentences.chinese: 一艘小船租用一星期的费用是多少？

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to borrow something for a short period of time

sentences.english: Carlotta’s 39? No kidding?
sentences.chinese: 卡洛塔39岁了？不是开玩笑吧？

detailed_translations.english: to say something that is not true, especially as a joke
a child
a grey or brown animal like a horse, but smaller and with long ears

name: destination
trans: 目的地， 终点， 目标

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 目的地， 终点， 目标
detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

sentences.english: a vertical line
sentences.chinese: 垂直线

sentences.english: the vertical axis of a graph
sentences.chinese: 图的纵轴

sentences.english: vertical window blinds
sentences.chinese: 垂直百叶窗

detailed_translations.english: pointing up in a line that forms an angle of 90˚ with a flat surface

name: learning
trans: 学习； 学问， 知识

sentences.english: a man of great learning
sentences.chinese: 学识渊博的人

detailed_translations.chinese: 学习； 学问， 知识
detailed_translations.english: knowledge gained through reading and study

name: monument
trans: 纪念碑， 纪念馆； 历史遗迹

sentences.english: He erected a monument on the spot where his daughter was killed.
sentences.chinese: 他在女儿遇难的地方立了块纪念碑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纪念碑， 纪念馆； 历史遗迹
detailed_translations.english: a building,  statue  , or other large structure that is built to remind people of an important event or famous person

sentences.english: It is a misconception that Peggy was fabulously wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 说佩吉以前极其富有，这是一个错误的看法。

detailed_translations.english: an idea which is wrong or untrue, but which people believe because they do not understand the subject properly

name: damp
trans: 使潮湿； 使沮丧； 抑制

sentences.english: Wipe the leather with a damp cloth.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布擦拭皮面。

sentences.english: a cold, damp day
sentences.chinese: 寒冷潮湿的一天

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, often in an unpleasant way
water in walls or in the air that causes things to be slightly wet

detailed_translations.chinese: 使潮湿； 使沮丧； 抑制
detailed_translations.english: to dampen something

name: vivid
trans: 鲜艳的； 生动的， 栩栩如生的

sentences.english: I’ve got vivid memories of that summer.
sentences.chinese: 我对那年夏天记忆犹新。

sentences.english: He had a vivid picture of her in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的脑海中清晰地留着她的形象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鲜艳的； 生动的， 栩栩如生的
detailed_translations.english: vivid memories, dreams, descriptions etc are so clear that they seem real

name: honey
trans: 蜜， 蜂蜜； 甜， 甜蜜； [常用于称呼] 宝贝儿

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 蜜， 蜂蜜； 甜， 甜蜜； [常用于称呼] 宝贝儿
detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

sentences.english: Fix the frame in position and tighten the screws .
sentences.chinese: 把框子固定在正确位置上，拧紧螺丝。

detailed_translations.english: a thin pointed piece of metal that you push and turn in order to fasten pieces of metal or wood together
to attach one thing to another using a screw

name: gap
trans: 缺口； 间隔； 差距； 缺陷

sentences.english: a gap in the traffic
sentences.chinese: 车流中的一个空档

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺口； 间隔； 差距； 缺陷
detailed_translations.english: a low place between two higher parts of a mountain

sentences.english: We found the missing piece of the jigsaw under the chair.
sentences.chinese: 我们在椅子下面找到了那块丢失的拼图。

sentences.english: The keys have been missing for ages.
sentences.chinese: 钥匙早已丢失了。

detailed_translations.english: something that is missing is not in its usual place, so that you cannot find it

sentences.english: The report emphasizes the importance of improving safety standards.
sentences.chinese: 报告强调了改进安全标准的重要性。

sentences.english: Logan made a speech emphasizing the need for more volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 罗根发表演讲，强调需要更多的志愿者。

detailed_translations.english: to say something in a strong way

name: virtue
trans: 善， 美德； 优点， 长处

sentences.english: Women have often been used as symbols of virtue.
sentences.chinese: 女性常被用作美德的象征。

detailed_translations.chinese: 善， 美德； 优点， 长处
detailed_translations.english: moral goodness of character and behaviour

name: normal
trans: 正常的， 平常的； 正规的， 规范的

sentences.english: A normal working week is 40 hours.
sentences.chinese: 一个正常的工作周是40小时。

sentences.english: She was assessed in the normal way, and placed on the waiting list.
sentences.chinese: 她接受了正常的评估后被列入等候名单。

sentences.english: All I want is to lead a normal life.
sentences.chinese: 我想要的只是能过正常的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正常的， 平常的； 正规的， 规范的
detailed_translations.english: usual, typical, or expected

sentences.english: Esperanto has always been popular among socialists.
sentences.chinese: 世界语在社会主义者中一直很受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: someone who believes in socialism, or who is a member of a political party that supports socialism

name: gradual
trans: 逐渐的， 渐进的； 坡度平缓的

sentences.english: There has been a gradual change in climate.
sentences.chinese: 气候渐渐发生了变化。

sentences.english: the gradual decline in manufacturing industry
sentences.chinese: 制造业的逐渐衰退

sentences.english: Education is a gradual process.
sentences.chinese: 教育是一个循序渐进的过程。

detailed_translations.chinese: 逐渐的， 渐进的； 坡度平缓的
detailed_translations.english: happening slowly over a long period of time

name: figure
trans: 出现； 合乎情理； 计算； 认为， 猜想
数字；人物；算术；体形，体态；轮廓；画像，塑像；图，图形

sentences.english: Reform now figures high on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出现； 合乎情理； 计算； 认为， 猜想
detailed_translations.english: to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something

detailed_translations.chinese: 数字；人物；算术；体形，体态；轮廓；画像，塑像；图，图形
detailed_translations.english: the activity of adding, multiplying etc numbers

sentences.english: iron ore
sentences.chinese: 铁矿石

sentences.english: veins of rich ore
sentences.chinese: 富矿脉

detailed_translations.english: rock or earth from which metal can be obtained

sentences.english: a slight improvement
sentences.chinese: 些许的改进

sentences.english: a slight increase
sentences.chinese: 少许的增加

sentences.english: a slight change of plan
sentences.chinese: 计划的略微变动

sentences.english: a slight pause
sentences.chinese: 稍稍的停顿

sentences.english: a slight problem
sentences.chinese: 小问题

detailed_translations.english: small in degree
to offend someone by treating them rudely or without respect

name: previous
trans: 先的， 前的； 以前的

sentences.english: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先的， 前的； 以前的
detailed_translations.english: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about

name: transmit
trans: 传送， 传递； 传染； 播送， 发射

sentences.english: The US Open will be transmitted live via satellite.
sentences.chinese: 美国公开赛将通过卫星现场直播。

sentences.english: The system transmits information over digital phone lines.
sentences.chinese: 这一系统通过数字电话线路传输信息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 传送， 传递； 传染； 播送， 发射
detailed_translations.english: to send out electronic signals, messages etc using radio, television, or other similar equipment

sentences.english: From then on we proceeded to build socialism.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，我们开始建设社会主义。

sentences.english: We should rally under the banner of socialism.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当在社会主义的旗帜下团结起来。

sentences.english: Every line of serious work that I have written since 1936 has been written, directly or indirectly, against totalitarianism and for democratic socialism, as I understand it.
sentences.chinese: 1936年以来，我的严肃作品中的每一行都是为间接或直接地反对极权主义，拥护我所理解的民主社会主义而写的。

detailed_translations.english: an economic and political system in which large industries are owned by the government, and taxes are used to take some wealth away from richer citizens and give it to poorer citizens

sentences.english: Vigorous exercise increases oxygen consumption.
sentences.chinese: 剧烈运动增加氧的消耗。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of energy, oil, electricity etc that is used

name: argue
trans: 争论，争辩，辩论；主张；说服

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way

detailed_translations.chinese: 争论，争辩，辩论；主张；说服
detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way

name: technology
trans: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

sentences.english: Over the last two years the president’s position has weakened.
sentences.chinese: 过去两年来，总统的地位被削弱了。

sentences.english: Changes in policy have weakened the power of the trade unions.
sentences.chinese: 政策的变化削弱了工会的力量。

sentences.english: The absence of this witness has weakened the case against the accused.
sentences.chinese: 这名证人的缺席削弱了对被告的指控力度。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something less powerful or less important, or to become less powerful

sentences.english: The systems are getting smaller and using lower voltages.
sentences.chinese: 这些系统正变得更小而且使用更低的电压。

detailed_translations.english: electrical force measured in volts

name: damn
trans: 该死，见鬼〔表示很生气或失望〕
该死的〔表示对某人或某事物生气〕

sentences.english: Damn! I’ve left my keys in the office.
sentences.chinese: 见鬼！我把钥匙忘在办公室了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 该死，见鬼〔表示很生气或失望〕
detailed_translations.english: used when you are very annoyed or disappointed
used to emphasize a statement

detailed_translations.chinese: 该死的〔表示对某人或某事物生气〕
detailed_translations.english: used when you are angry or annoyed with someone or something

name: superior
trans: 上级的，较高的；优越的；有优越感的，高傲的

sentences.english: She had that superior tone of voice.
sentences.chinese: 她带着那种傲慢的语气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上级的，较高的；优越的；有优越感的，高傲的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are better than other people – used to show disapproval
someone who has a higher rank or position than you, especially in a job

name: location
trans: 位置， 场所； 外景拍摄地

sentences.english: His apartment is in a really good location.
sentences.chinese: 他的公寓地段很好。

sentences.english: its isolatedgeographical location
sentences.chinese: 它偏远的地理位置

detailed_translations.chinese: 位置， 场所； 外景拍摄地
detailed_translations.english: a particular place, especially in relation to other areas, buildings etc

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

sentences.english: The firm went bankrupt before the building work was completed.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工程尚未竣工，公司就破产了。

sentences.english: In 1977 he was declared bankrupt (=  by a court  ) .
sentences.chinese: 1977年，他被宣布破产。

sentences.english: Mr Trent lost his house when he was made bankrupt .
sentences.chinese: 特伦特先生破产以后房子也没有了。

sentences.english: Seventeen years of war left the country bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 17年的战争把国家耗空了。

sentences.english: a bankrupt electrical company
sentences.chinese: 一家破产的电力公司

detailed_translations.english: without enough money to pay what you owe

name: punctual
trans: 严守时刻的， 准时的

sentences.english: She’s always very punctual for appointments.
sentences.chinese: 她一向准时赴约。

sentences.english: the punctual payment of invoices
sentences.chinese: 准时结清费用清单

detailed_translations.chinese: 严守时刻的， 准时的
detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or being done at exactly the time that has been arranged

name: advertise
trans: 为…做广告， 宣传； 公告； 登广告

sentences.english: They no longer advertise alcohol or cigarettes at sporting events.
sentences.chinese: 他们不再在体育赛事上做烟酒广告了。

sentences.english: Colleges and universities have found that it pays to advertise (=  advertising brings good results  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大专院校发现做广告效果很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…做广告， 宣传； 公告； 登广告
detailed_translations.english: to tell the public about a product or service in order to persuade them to buy it

name: compromise
trans: 妥协； 危及； 放弃

sentences.english: She admitted that she was unable to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妥协； 危及； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to reach an agreement in which everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first
an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

name: sack
trans: 解雇； 洗劫， 劫掠

sentences.english: They’ve never actually given anyone the sack .
sentences.chinese: 他们从未真的辞退过什么人。

sentences.english: He got the sack for stealing.
sentences.chinese: 他因偷东西而被解雇。

sentences.english: She claimed she’d been threatened with the sack.
sentences.chinese: 她称自己受到过解雇的威胁。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is dismissed from their job

detailed_translations.chinese: 解雇； 洗劫， 劫掠
detailed_translations.english: to dismiss someone from their job

sentences.english: She loaded the new software .
sentences.chinese: 她给电脑装上新的软件。

sentences.english: a software company
sentences.chinese: 软件公司

detailed_translations.english: the sets of programs that tell a computer how to do a particular job

sentences.english: a Shakespeare seminar
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚研讨班

detailed_translations.english: a class at a university or college for a small group of students and a teacher to study or discuss a particular subject

sentences.english: After a lifetime of poverty, his last few years were spent in comparable comfort.
sentences.chinese: 他穷了一辈子，最后几年还算过得比较舒适。

sentences.english: She didn’t want to leave the comparative safety of the shelter.
sentences.chinese: 她不愿离开相对来说还算安全的掩蔽处。

detailed_translations.english: comfort freedom, wealth etc that is quite good when compared to how comfortable, free, or rich etc something or someone else is

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

sentences.english: He is really a fruitful novelist.
sentences.chinese: 他真是一位多产的小说家。

detailed_translations.english: land that is fruitful produces a lot of crops

sentences.english: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.
sentences.chinese: 说他撒谎，他非常生气。

sentences.english: She reacted very badly (= was very upset ) when her parents split up.
sentences.chinese: 父母离婚的时候，她非常难过。

sentences.english: You have to react quickly to circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 你必须对形势迅速作出反应。

detailed_translations.english: to behave in a particular way or show a particular emotion because of something that has happened or been said
a large imaginary animal that has wings and a long tail and can breathe out fire

name: hesitant
trans: 犹豫的； 吞吞吐吐的

sentences.english: Gail gave me a hesitant little smile.
sentences.chinese: 盖尔迟疑地对我微微一笑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犹豫的； 吞吞吐吐的
detailed_translations.english: uncertain about what to do or say because you are nervous or unwilling

name: beyond
trans: 在…的那边，远于；迟于；越出

sentences.english: The financing of home ownership will continue through the 1990s and beyond.
sentences.chinese: 房屋产权的融资将持续到20世纪90年代及以后。

detailed_translations.english: Beyond is also an adverb

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…的那边，远于；迟于；越出
detailed_translations.english: on or to the further side of something

sentences.english: War is hell.
sentences.chinese: 战争是人间地狱。

detailed_translations.english: the place where the souls of bad people are believed to be punished after death, especially in the Christian and Muslim religions

name: feedback
trans: 回授， 反馈， 反应

sentences.english: How can I provide feedback without making someone angry?
sentences.chinese: 我怎样才能提出反馈意见又不会得罪人呢？

detailed_translations.chinese: 回授， 反馈， 反应
detailed_translations.english: advice, criticism etc about how successful or useful something is

sentences.english: That pile of rubbish is a fire hazard (= something that is likely to cause a fire ).
sentences.chinese: 那堆垃圾是火灾隐患。

detailed_translations.english: something that may be dangerous, or cause accidents or problems
to risk losing your money, property etc in an attempt to gain something

sentences.english: Nothing justifies murdering another human being.
sentences.chinese: 什么都不能成为谋杀他人的正当理由。

detailed_translations.english: to be a good and acceptable reason for something

sentences.english: Workers are being encouraged to take voluntary redundancy.
sentences.chinese: 工人被鼓励主动离职。

detailed_translations.english: done willingly and without being forced

name: connection
trans: 联系， 关系； 连接， 衔接； 连贯性； 熟人， 关系

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.chinese: 她打开顶灯，环视这间小屋。

trans: 推断出， 推论出； 结束， 终了； 缔结， 议定

sentences.chinese: 你怎么会被她说服去做这种蠢事，我实在是无法理解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 理解， 理解力， 领悟； 理解力测验

sentences.chinese: 街头乞丐

sentences.chinese: 写下以下信息：产品名称、型号、购买日期和价格。

sentences.chinese: 她不想打开门，但那男人硬是把它推开了。

sentences.chinese: …高达40摄氏度的日间气温。

sentences.chinese: 克里斯要去国外工作。

sentences.chinese: 这次展览重点展出毕加索的画作。

sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.chinese: 在风中东倒西歪的树木

平的；固定的；漏气的；平淡的；沉闷的；浅的

sentences.chinese: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.chinese: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.chinese: 在机场看到保罗时，我的心猛地一跳。

detailed_translations.english: if your heart leaps, you feel a sudden surprise, happiness, or excitement

sentences.english: a waterproof jacket
sentences.chinese: 防水上衣

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.chinese: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing water to enter

sentences.chinese: 爸爸把我拽到当地理发师奥托跟前，让他把我的头发剪短。

detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to cut men’s hair and sometimes to  shave  them

name: precise
trans: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的

sentences.english: precise sales figures
sentences.chinese: 准确的销售数据

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.chinese: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
detailed_translations.english: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

name: sensible
trans: 明智的； 合情理的； 有知觉的

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 明智的； 合情理的； 有知觉的
detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

name: objection
trans: 反对， 异议； 反对的理由

sentences.chinese: 她反对的理由是他太小。

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 异议； 反对的理由
detailed_translations.english: a reason that you have for opposing or disapproving of something, or something you say that expresses this

name: dispute
trans: 争论， 争执； 对…表示异议

sentences.chinese: 书中的主要事实从未遭到质疑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

sentences.english: From their direct observations, children absorb a model of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 儿童通过直接观察来理解某一种婚姻的模式。

detailed_translations.chinese: 注意， 观察； 言论， 评论； 观察资料
detailed_translations.english: the process of watching something or someone carefully for a period of time

name: tremble
trans: 颤抖； 摇晃， 摇动

sentences.english: His lip started to tremble and then he started to cry.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴唇开始颤抖，接着就哭了起来。

sentences.english: I will never forget the look on the patient's face, the tremble in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 我将永远不会忘记那病人脸上的表情和他颤抖的手。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly in a way that you cannot control, especially because you are upset or frightened

detailed_translations.chinese: 颤抖； 摇晃， 摇动
detailed_translations.english: Tremble is also a noun

sentences.english: The two men were convicted on the basis of some highly suspect evidence.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子被定了罪，而定罪证据尚有很大疑点。

detailed_translations.english: not likely to be completely true
to think that something bad has happened or is happening
someone who is thought to be guilty of a crime

name: apologize
trans: 道歉， 谢罪， 认错

sentences.english: I’m so sorry, I do apologize.
sentences.chinese: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉， 谢罪， 认错
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are sorry that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: a city of six million inhabitants
sentences.chinese: 有600万居民的城市

detailed_translations.english: one of the people who live in a particular place

name: fraction
trans: 小部分； 片断； 分数

sentences.english: The students had a grasp of decimals, percentages and fractions.
sentences.chinese: 学生们掌握了小数、百分数和分数。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小部分； 片断； 分数
detailed_translations.english: a part of a whole number in mathematics, such as ½ or ¾

sentences.english: The water in the tank is constantly filtered.
sentences.chinese: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.english: The ozone layer filters harmful UV rays from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 臭氧层过滤掉有害的太阳紫外线。

detailed_translations.english: to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
something that you pass water, air etc through in order to remove unwanted substances and make it clean or suitable to use

sentences.english: The water sparkled in the bright sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 水面在灿烂的阳光下闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: (= came in large amounts ) through the windows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光从窗户流泻进来。

sentences.english: a shaft of sunlight
sentences.chinese: 一束阳光

detailed_translations.english: natural light that comes from the sun

sentences.english: an archaeological site
sentences.chinese: 考古现场

detailed_translations.english: a place where something important or interesting happened
to place or build something in a particular place

name: emotion
trans: 情感， 感情； 激动

sentences.english: Her voice was full of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.english: Kim received the news without showing any visible sign of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 金接到消息时丝毫不露声色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 情感， 感情； 激动
detailed_translations.english: a strong human feeling such as love, hate, or anger

name: massive
trans: 大的， 大而重的； 大块的； 大量的， 大规模的

sentences.english: The bell is massive, weighing over 40 tons.
sentences.chinese: 那口钟非常大，有40多吨重。

sentences.english: the castle’s massive walls
sentences.chinese: 城堡高大厚实的围墙

detailed_translations.chinese: 大的， 大而重的； 大块的； 大量的， 大规模的
detailed_translations.english: very large, solid, and heavy

sentences.english: The things people will do for charity never cease to amaze me (= I am always surprised by them ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们的慈善义举总是让我感到惊讶。

sentences.english: The rain ceased and the sky cleared.
sentences.chinese: 雨过天晴。

detailed_translations.english: to stop doing something or stop happening

name: assess
trans: 对估价； 评价， 评论

sentences.english: The test was to assess aptitude rather than academic achievement.
sentences.chinese: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 对估价； 评价， 评论
detailed_translations.english: to make a judgment about a person or situation after thinking carefully about it

name: asset
trans: 资产， 财产； 有价值的特性或技能， 优点

sentences.english: the value of a company’s assets
sentences.chinese: 公司的资产价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 资产， 财产； 有价值的特性或技能， 优点
detailed_translations.english: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

name: owe
trans: 欠； 应把…归功于； 感激， 感恩

sentences.english: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.chinese: 我该付你多少钱？

detailed_translations.chinese: 欠； 应把…归功于； 感激， 感恩
detailed_translations.english: to be successful because of the good effect or influence of something or someone

name: scarce
trans: 缺乏的， 不足的； 稀少的， 罕见的

sentences.english: Food was often scarce in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 冬季常常粮食短缺。

sentences.english: There was fierce competition for the scarce resources .
sentences.chinese: 对这些紧缺资源的争夺非常激烈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺乏的， 不足的； 稀少的， 罕见的
detailed_translations.english: if something is scarce, there is not very much of it available

sentences.english: The minimum number of students we need to run the course is fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们开这门课程最少要有15个学生。

sentences.english: The minimum age for retirement is 55.
sentences.chinese: 最小退休年龄为55岁。

detailed_translations.english: the minimum number, degree, or amount of something is the smallest or least that is possible, allowed, or needed
the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary

sentences.english: You’ll have to join the queue.
sentences.chinese: 你得排队。

detailed_translations.english: to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere
a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move

sentences.english: mathematical analysis
sentences.chinese: 数学分析

sentences.english: the development of mathematical skills
sentences.chinese: 数学技能的发展

sentences.english: a mathematical genius
sentences.chinese: 数学天才

detailed_translations.english: relating to or using mathematics

name: apology
trans: 道歉， 认错， 谢罪

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉， 认错， 谢罪
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

sentences.english: a book of magic spells
sentences.chinese: 一本关于魔法的书

sentences.english: a magic sword
sentences.chinese: 一把魔剑

detailed_translations.english: in stories, a magic word or object has special powers that make the person using it able to do impossible things
the power to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special actions

name: argument
trans: 争论， 辩论； 理由； 说理， 论证

sentences.english: We need to provide a convincing argument as to why the system should be changed.
sentences.chinese: 我们得提出有说服力的论据，证明为何要改变体制。

detailed_translations.chinese: 争论， 辩论； 理由； 说理， 论证
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two or more people disagree, often angrily

name: reveal
trans: 揭露， 泄露； 展现， 显示

sentences.english: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.chinese: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.english: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.chinese: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

detailed_translations.chinese: 揭露， 泄露； 展现， 显示
detailed_translations.english: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown

sentences.english: The research involves collecting data from two random samples.
sentences.chinese: 该项研究需要从两个随机样本里收集资料。

detailed_translations.english: information or facts

sentences.english: theoretical physics
sentences.chinese: 理论物理

sentences.english: Aristotle’s theoretical model of the universe
sentences.chinese: 亚里士多德有关宇宙的理论模型

sentences.english: She has theoretical knowledge of teaching, but no practical experience.
sentences.chinese: 她有教学方面的理论知识，但没有实际经验。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the study of ideas, especially scientific ideas, rather than with practical uses of the ideas or practical experience

name: adequate
trans: 足够的； 可以胜任的

sentences.english: Farmers have been slow to make adequate provision for their retirement.
sentences.chinese: 农民们迟迟没有为退休做好适当安排。

sentences.english: Some creams we tested failed to give adequate protection against UV light.
sentences.chinese: 我们检测的有些防晒霜不能提供足够的防紫外线保护。

sentences.english: The standard of his work is barely adequate .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作水准勉强合格。

sentences.english: The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
sentences.chinese: 该公司对其行动仍未作出充分解释。

detailed_translations.chinese: 足够的； 可以胜任的
detailed_translations.english: enough in quantity or of a good enough quality for a particular purpose

sentences.english: That’s utter nonsense!
sentences.chinese: 真是一派胡言！

sentences.english: This company treats its employees with utter contempt.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司对其员工不屑一顾。

sentences.english: I watched in complete and utter horror as he pulled out a gun.
sentences.chinese: 我惊恐万分地看着他拔出枪来。

sentences.english: fifteen years of utter confusion
sentences.chinese: 15年的大混乱

detailed_translations.english: complete – used especially to emphasize that something is very bad, or that a feeling is very strong
to say something

sentences.english: Chop the onions finely.
sentences.chinese: 把洋葱切碎。

sentences.english: red onions
sentences.chinese: 红皮洋葱

sentences.english: home-made onion soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的洋葱汤

detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or white skin and many layers. Onions have a strong taste and smell.

sentences.english: The floor was vibrating to the beat of the music.
sentences.chinese: 地板随着音乐的节奏在颤动。

sentences.english: As air passes over our vocal cords, it makes them vibrate.
sentences.chinese: 气流通过我们的声带，使之产生振动。

detailed_translations.english: if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements

sentences.english: I could hear the rain drumming against the windows.
sentences.chinese: 我听到雨滴有节奏地打在窗上的声音。

sentences.english: Lisa drummed her fingers impatiently on the table.
sentences.chinese: 莉萨不耐烦地用手指嗒嗒地敲桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to make a sound similar to a drum by hitting a surface again and again
a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

sentences.english: pork sausages
sentences.chinese: 猪肉香肠

detailed_translations.english: a small tube of skin filled with a mixture of meat, spices etc, eaten hot or cold after it has been cooked

sentences.english: The vote is a hopeful sign that attitudes in the church are changing.
sentences.chinese: 投票结果是个好兆头，表明教会的态度正在转变。

detailed_translations.english: believing that what you hope for is likely to happen

name: tremendous
trans: 极大的， 非常的； 精彩的， 了不起的

sentences.english: Suddenly, there was a tremendous bang, and the whole station shook.
sentences.chinese: 突然一声巨响，整个车站都晃动了。

sentences.english: She was making a tremendous effort to appear calm.
sentences.chinese: 她竭力表现出平静的样子。

sentences.english: She praised her husband for the tremendous support he had given her.
sentences.chinese: 她称赞丈夫给了她巨大支持。

sentences.english: Sales have been tremendous so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年到目前为止，销售额十分惊人。

sentences.english: This plan could save us a tremendous amount of money.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划能给我们节省一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极大的， 非常的； 精彩的， 了不起的
detailed_translations.english: very big, fast, powerful etc

name: condense
trans: 冷凝， 凝结； 浓缩， 压缩， 简缩

sentences.english: the mist which condensed on every cold surface
sentences.chinese: 每个冰冷的表面上凝结的水汽

detailed_translations.chinese: 冷凝， 凝结； 浓缩， 压缩， 简缩
detailed_translations.english: if a gas condenses, or is condensed, it becomes a liquid

name: barrier
trans: 栅栏； 检票口； 屏障； 障碍， 隔阂

sentences.english: He advocated the removal of trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 他提倡消除贸易壁垒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 栅栏； 检票口； 屏障； 障碍， 隔阂
detailed_translations.english: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

name: realistic
trans: 现实的； 实际可行的； 现实主义的； 逼真的

sentences.english: Is this a realistic target?
sentences.chinese: 这个目标能够实现吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 现实的； 实际可行的； 现实主义的； 逼真的
detailed_translations.english: judging and dealing with situations in a practical way according to what is actually possible rather than what you would like to happen

name: justice
trans: 正义， 公正； 司法

sentences.english: No one doubts the justice of our cause.
sentences.chinese: 没有人怀疑我们的事业是正义的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正义， 公正； 司法
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being right and deserving fair treatment

name: create
trans: 创造； 引起， 产生

sentences.english: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.english: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造； 引起， 产生
detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

sentences.english: Experts cannot agree on the causes of criminal behaviour .
sentences.chinese: 专家对犯罪行为的原因不能取得一致意见。

sentences.english: I was sure he was involved in some kind of criminal activity .
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他在从事某种犯罪活动。

sentences.english: She has not committed a criminal offence (= a crime ) .
sentences.chinese: 她没有犯罪。

sentences.english: He was arrested and charged with criminal damage (= damaging someone’s property illegally ) .
sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控犯有刑事损坏罪。

sentences.english: The doctor was found guilty of criminal negligence (= not taking enough care to protect people you are responsible for ) .
sentences.chinese: 这名医生被判过失犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: relating to crime
someone who is involved in illegal activities or has been proved guilty of a crime

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc
to attach a tag to something

sentences.english: He brought out a notebook and pen from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出了一个笔记本和一支钢笔。

detailed_translations.english: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes

sentences.english: Puppies are naturally curious.
sentences.chinese: 小狗天生好奇。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to know about something

sentences.english: Losing weight is an indirect result of smoking cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟间接导致体重减轻。

sentences.english: The indirect effects of climate change may be profound.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化造成的间接影响可能是深远的。

detailed_translations.english: not directly caused by something

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

name: resource
trans: 资源； 财力； 应付办法， 谋略

sentences.english: Canada’s vast mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 加拿大丰富的矿产资源

sentences.english: a country rich in natural resources
sentences.chinese: 自然资源丰富的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 资源； 财力； 应付办法， 谋略
detailed_translations.english: something such as useful land, or minerals such as oil or coal, that exists in a country and can be used to increase its wealth

sentences.english: a very ugly man
sentences.chinese: 非常丑陋的男子

sentences.english: the ugliest building in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最难看的建筑

sentences.english: Nick’s dog is as ugly as sin (= very ugly ).
sentences.chinese: 尼克的狗难看得要命。

detailed_translations.english: extremely unattractive and unpleasant to look at

sentences.english: He could be a bit of a nuisance when he was drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他喝醉时会是一个有点令人讨厌的人。

detailed_translations.english: a person, thing, or situation that annoys you or causes problems

name: tax
trans: 对…征税； 使负担重， 使费尽力气

sentences.english: No-one enjoys paying tax.
sentences.chinese: 没人喜欢缴税。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you must pay to the government according to your income, property, goods etc and that is used to pay for public services

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…征税； 使负担重， 使费尽力气
detailed_translations.english: to charge a tax on something

sentences.english: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.english: The city is in an earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden shaking of the earth’s surface that often causes a lot of damage

name: excitement
trans: 刺激， 激动， 兴奋； 令人兴奋的事， 刺激的因素

sentences.english: We were both new to the excitements of life in the big city.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都是初次感受大城市多姿多彩的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激， 激动， 兴奋； 令人兴奋的事， 刺激的因素
detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being excited

name: nightmare
trans: 噩梦； 可怕的事物， 无法摆脱的恐惧

sentences.english: a recurring nightmare
sentences.chinese: 一再出现的噩梦

detailed_translations.chinese: 噩梦； 可怕的事物， 无法摆脱的恐惧
detailed_translations.english: a very frightening dream

name: cord
trans: 细绳， 粗线， 索； 灯芯绒裤

sentences.english: The robe was held at the waist by a cord.
sentences.chinese: 在袍子腰处束了根细绳。

sentences.english: He pulled explosives and some tangled cord from his bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从他的包里掏出炸药和一些乱糟糟的绳子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 细绳， 粗线， 索； 灯芯绒裤
detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick string or thin rope

name: ending
trans: 结尾， 结局； 死亡

sentences.english: Verbal nouns have the ending -ing.
sentences.chinese: 动名词以-ing结尾。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结尾， 结局； 死亡
detailed_translations.english: the way that a story, film, activity etc finishes

name: core
trans: 果实的心； 核心， 要点

sentences.english: Remove the cores, and bake the apples for 40 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 去除果心，然后把苹果烤40分钟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 果实的心； 核心， 要点
detailed_translations.english: the hard central part of a fruit such as an apple

sentences.english: the council for civil liberties
sentences.chinese: 公民自由委员会

sentences.english: the UN Security Council
sentences.chinese: 联合国安全理事会

detailed_translations.english: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice

name: enforce
trans: 实施， 执行； 强制， 强迫， 迫使

sentences.english: Parking restrictions will be strictly enforced.
sentences.chinese: 停车限制将会严格执行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 实施， 执行； 强制， 强迫， 迫使
detailed_translations.english: to make people obey a rule or law

name: embassy
trans: 大使馆； 大使馆全体成员

sentences.english: the American Embassy in Paris
sentences.chinese: 美国驻巴黎大使馆

detailed_translations.chinese: 大使馆； 大使馆全体成员
detailed_translations.english: a group of officials who represent their government in a foreign country, or the building they work in

name: departure
trans: 离开， 起程， 出发； 背离， 违背

sentences.english: There are several departures for New York every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有好几个班次去纽约。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离开， 起程， 出发； 背离， 违背
detailed_translations.english: an act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

sentences.english: Olive dashed into the room, grabbed her bag, and ran out again.

sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.chinese: 布告中的名词“盎司“怎样发音?。

sentences.chinese: 座位共有10种票价，现有8种可售。

sentences.chinese: 威廉斯的风格不能轻易归入爵士乐的范畴。

sentences.chinese: 实际上他是我的竞争对手。

sentences.chinese: 大风刮断了树枝和输电线。
